reviews.comments:
The stay was excellent.
The room was clean and had a great view. It was exactly as described and shown in the photos. All the promised services, such as transfer, were also included. The host was friendly and responded quickly to messages. This is not my first time staying at the resort, and I can definitely recommend this room.
Thanks for hospitality!

Don't hesitated booking this place you will love it.  We loved the view, balcony, and having a kitchen was great.  Very quiet also, and having a washer and dryer was really nice.  Both pools are amazing, and plenty of sun beds, chairs and bean bags at the pools and beach.  staff is really friendly.  The host is super responsive and helped us with every request.  We would gladly come back.

수영장뿐 아니라 내부외부시설 모든 부분이 너무너무 좋았습니다.
에어비엔비에서 예약했던 숙소중 최고였습니다.
호스트의 응대뿐만 아니라 숙소의 직원분들도 모두 친절하고
주변 환경은 더할나위없이 좋았습니다.
가족들이 만족만족 대만족하는 숙소였습니다.
다음에 간다면 꼭 또 방문하겠습니다.

We were happy to stay at Trang’s place.
Even though we booked her place last minute after returned from Danang International Fireworks Festival late, she accepted our reservation and welcome us in person.
She was such a nice host, gave us a tour and recommendations around the area.
Her place was matched with the photos and description, spacious and cozy, and we felt like home after a tired night at the festival.
We would love to stay more at hers but today we want to stay at the Hoian downtown.
We highly recommend her to everyone.
Thank you Trang.

숙소에서 바다가 보이고 주방이용이 가능해서 조식이 없어도 요리를 해먹을수있어 좋았어요~!
수영장 2곳도 무료에 오후엔 그늘이 생겨 아이들이 놀기 좋았고
세제 챙겨가서 빨래도 가능해서 정말 좋았습니다.
주변 편의시설 부족한거랑 안방비치를 걸어가기엔 힘든 거리라는것만 빼면 너무 좋고 완벽한 숙소였어요!
Tất cả thật tuyệt vời. Sẽ quay trở lại đây.

super résidence en bord de mer, accès aux piscines sans payer de supplément.
nécessite d'avoir une moto ou un véhicule pour aller a Hoi An ou Danang.
Very clean place, Hoi an old village is very close and a great place to spend a vacation.
This was great deal we loved it it’s so modern and clean.
Amazing place will definitely be back
Magnifique endroit

We really enjoyed our stay! The apartment is cozy, clean, and very well located — just a short walk from the center of Hoi An, but still in a quiet and peaceful area. Everything we needed was provided, and the host was very friendly and helpful. It was easy to get around, and we loved being close to the old town, restaurants, and shops. Thank you for a great stay — we would happily come back!

I had a great stay here. Lanni always responded to me very quickly with any questions. I could walk anywhere within 10 mins so I loved the location. It had lots of cute cafes and spas around it. The hostel (?) across the street was a bit noisy but only until 8pm so it was manageable. I would recommend this place!

I had a great stay at Lanni's place. The room is cozy and clean and in an ideal location for exploring Hoi An. The area is walkable and very safe and has lots of amazing restaurants nearby. It's not too loud at night and is in a peaceful area. Check in was very easy and the stay was comfortable. I highly recommend!

We had an awesome stay at Lanni’s place - a great base for exploring Hoi An, in a great location. Close to amazing cafes, restaurants, laundromat, and easy to get a grab to the beach! Balcony looking out onto the street was so wonderful in the nice weather. Highly recommend this location - plus there are brand new pickleball courts available to rent just down the street 👟

We loved this place. It actually was very nice and peaceful. The only two complaints I had was that the Projector does not actually work for Netflix as the projector was not updated to a new enough version to run Netflix. As well, the neighborhood gets loud at 6am with traffic, horns, music from cafe, yelling, etc. overall we did enjoy our stay and it was super clean and the host was very kind. Thank you!
Phòng ở gần trung tâm, rất tiện để đi ra phố cổ. Phòng sạch sẽ, khá tiện lợi và dễ thương.
性价比很高，房间在二楼，一楼就是素食餐厅，正对面是一家味道很不错的咖啡店，走之前去喝了一杯，很舒服～
The space is beautiful, comfortable and well maintained. The bed was so comfy and I slept brilliantly. Many thanks.

Lanni’s place was simply perfect. I would stay here again anytime. The room is spacious (bigger than it looks on the photos) and perfectly located. Lanni was always available and made sure I had a fantastic stay. Thank you so much for everything!

Tolles AirBnb für alle, die Hoi An erkunden und kennenlernen wollen. Tolle Strasse mit Essen, Cafés, Shopping, Restaurant im Haus und echtes Leben. Das Zimmer war tiptop mit allem wie beschrieben. Toller Balkon. Wir haben uns richtig wohl gefühlt! Unsere Empfehlung für Hoi An!

Fantastic host, always quick to respond! Old town was only about 5-10 minute walk down the road! Room had a projector with streaming services on which was nice when the weather was bad! Great place to stay!

lanni 人特别好～
入住有任何问题询问都很快解决回复💕
房间整洁舒适～
Lovely room, great service, amazing location, overall great stay. Only downside for light sleepers is, that the windows aren’t canceling any street/bar noises.
Beautiful room with balcony and close to Hoi An Old Town. Downstairs there is a great vegetarian restaurant where we enjoyed dinner several times.

One of the nicest airbnbs I’ve stayed in! A bargain for what you pay for. About a 10 minute walk from the centre. Lovely restaurants around the Airbnb. Staff in the restaurant downstairs also lovely. We would definitely stay here again!
Super Lage, sehr freundliche Kommunikation und sehr gutes Preis-/Leistungsverhältnis!
Sehr schönes Zimmer in der Nähe von der Altstadt! Gastgeber war immer erreichbar und sehr nett🤗
Thanks for spending great time at the place! Enjoyed a peaceful chill.
Très bon logement, avec un joli balcon, cependant très bruyant le soir je recommande tout de même

Der Aufenthalt war sehr schön, die Lage ist super und das Zimmer mit Balkon richtig schön. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt und der Gastgeber hat uns bei jeder Frage weitergeholfen. Absolute Empfehlung!

Ha sido la mejor estancia por el momento en Vietnam! El sitio era muy tranquilo y la habitación daba era acogedora y agradable. Debajo tienen un restaurante maravilloso. He cenado allí todas las noches. Recomiendo muchísimo este alojamiento!!

Alloggio vicinissimo al centro.
Lanni è stato sempre reattivo e rapido nelle risposte, molto gentile e disponibile per tutte le nostre richieste.
È stato anche flessibile sull’orario del check -out dandoci la possibilità di lasciare i bagagli lì per l’intera giornata

I loved staying at Lanni’s homestay. There are three things that I loved about the place:
(1) The room. It is spacious, very clean, the balcony was great, the dutch door is a nice addition, and the bed was comfy. I had the best sleep during my trip at Lanni’s place.
(2) Location. The place was strategically located in the center of Hoi An, just 5-10 mins of walk away from the Old Quarter. The street is considerably quiet. Also, it is exactly above An Hy’s vegetarian restaurant. As a Muslim, this is a life saver :).
(3) Service. Lanni’s was very accommodating, able to provide essentials such as laundry, car rental service, and bike rental. You can even pay for all of those services through Airbnb, so everything is a breeze!
Will recommend Lanni’s place to anyone! (:

Une petite chambre bien placée pour visiter Hoi An. Tout était propre, le frigo et l’air conditionné fonctionnent très bien. L’arrivée et le départ sont faciles et le café d’en face est super pour le petit déjeuner.
Seul bémol, nous avions la chambre côté rue et avons été dérangés par le bruit tôt le matin et le soir. Ce n’est pas rédhibitoire mais éventuellement prévoir des boules quies!
Phòng đúng như ảnh, rất xinh và sạch, chủ nhà hỗ trợ nhiệt tình, rất đáng để trải nghiệm

Phòng ở sạch sẽ, ngăn nắp và ấm cúng. Cảm giác ấm cúng như ở nhà, có bếp, lò nướng, lò vi sóng, tủ lạnh, máy giặt,… nhiều tiện nghi. Vị trí trung tâm, gần nhiều cửa hàng và quán ăn. Chủ nhà nhiệt tình, phản hồi tức thì và hộ trợ nhiệt tình 😊😊

The place was nice! It’s a walking distance from almost everything. The beach, the river, local market around and great coffee shops.. everything is closely accessible.
Linh was also very cooperative and nice.
Highly recommended
今回1人旅で利用しました。お部屋は写真の通りで、水回りもすごく綺麗でした。価格を考えればかなりコスパいいと思います。また利用したいと思います！
門のキーパッドの反応が悪く、毎回苦戦していました。建物の内装は写真の通りでよかったです。また、近くにおしゃれなカフェがいくつかあったのも嬉しかったです。チェックアウト後も荷物を預けることができました。私の部屋の洗面は水はけがよくなかったですが、それ以外は特に問題ありませんでした。
位置非常方便，周边很多美食和咖啡店，店主回复非常及时和友好，很漂亮的民宿，里面的设施很完善，性价比很高，非常完美的硬件设施，经营不易，一定监督好卫生问题，相信会更好的
Linh is a great host and this place is beautiful. Everything is a convenient walk away. Gym is right around the corner. Quiet at night. Very clean. Calm and tranquil space. Highly recommend
늦은 시간 체크인 했지만, 빠르고 정확하게 응대 해주셨습니다. 감사합니다.

Stayed at this lovely house in Da Nang and it was a total win—especially if you’re a foodie! The location is perfect, with tons of amazing restaurants, street food stalls, and little hidden gems all within walking distance. I basically ate my way through the neighborhood.
The house itself was super clean and comfortable—exactly what you want after a long day of exploring (or, in my case, eating). The host was incredibly helpful, always responsive and full of great local tips.
If you’re visiting Da Nang and want a clean, convenient spot with a great vibe and easy access to incredible food, this place is a solid choice. I’d happily stay here again!

걸어서 한시장부터 핑크성당 콩카페 등 주요 관광지 다 갈 수 있고 용다리랑 강가랑 가깝다보니 동네 산책만 나와도 맛집 카페 수두룩 해서 좋더라구요.
숙소 컨디션은 다낭에서 지내본 곳 중에 최고! 명시된 서비스 내역과 정확히 일치하고 룸컨디션 너무 좋아서
다음에 다낭오면 여기서 연박하려고요.
공용공간까지 완벽하게 준비되어 있어 더 편하게 지내다 갑니다~
저희가 방문했을 땐 공사를 해서 낮에는 소음이 좀 있었는데, 저녁에는 아주 조용해서 푹자고 아늑하게 지내기도 좋았어요^^

테라스 있는 룸을 할까 했지만 다낭에서는 돌아다니느라 숙소에 있을 시간이 얼마 없을 듯해 일부러 작은 방으로 예약했습니다. 캐리어 펴기 조금 애매하긴 하지만, 욕실이 넓고 깨끗해서 좋았어요. 나무 문이라 바깥 소음에는 취약하지만, 그거 외엔 다 만족스러웠어요.
위치가 너무 좋습니다. 한시장에서 10분, 용다리 근처입니다. 그리고 동네가 이뻐요. 분위기 좋은 카페와 맛집도 근처에 많고요.
1층 세탁기도 사용이 가능했고, 직원 분도 친절하십니다. 저희가 일찍 도착했는데 짐 보관도 가능했습니다.
이 방은 혼자 여행하시는 분에게 좋을 듯 해요. 다음엔 둘이서 오면 테라스룸으로 예약해보려구요.
非常感谢Linh女士，他让我在岘港的旅行非常顺利和愉快！她不仅为我提供了非常好的住宿，还额外的为我建议到会安、美山等地的司机。由于我不懂外语，她一遍一遍的利用爱彼迎的沟通平台给我指导。总之，Linh女士不仅是个“漂亮女人”，还是一个热情，善良的房东，我为能在她的民宿入住而感到荣幸，我会向我的朋友推荐她的！

We stayed in 3 places over our 5D4N trip in Da Nang/Hoi An, and Linh's place was by far the best. The room and linens were spotless, the bathroom was beautiful, fancy appliances (kettle, microwave, toaster all in a beautiful retro style). And most importantly, the bicycles were almost new! Compared to the bikes at our 2 other places, these were really good condition and made our adventuring around Da Nang so easy and convenient. There are a lot of good restaurants just up the street. Location is good for nearby places like Con Market, but you will probably need to Grab to the beach. Distance from Son Tra Night market was walkable - we crossed the Dragon Bridge and it was an easy walk back. 100% would recommend for this price.

Lihn's location was pretty central and easy to get to various locations around Da Nang. We only stayed a night, so the single room and bed was more than enough for our stay. Lihn was communicative and spoke to us days in advance of us arriving.

Linh’s place was a great find for us! It was very close to restaurants, spas, and lots of other things to do. The place is easy to find, and the room is very comfortable. Linh was also very friendly and quick to respond to our requests. The only reason that I gave 4 stars was because the construction noise during our stay from 2-6pm that caused us to not be able to rest. Linh had construction at her place, and knowing our luck, her closeby neighbour also had construction. We would appreciate knowing this in advance whatsoever so we could be able to plan better.
The host being very nice and helpful! Everything was provided and especially washing for free x will definitely come back!!!
Great location for your stay in Da Nang. Everything is centrally located and you can just walk yourself to an amazing evening.

Linh's place is a gem! It is 5 minutes walk from the Dragon Bridge and the Cham Museum, with many cafes dotting the neighborhood, making it easy to grab a coffee at almost anytime of the day.
Finding it is easy. With clear step-by-step instructions, checking in is breezy. The place is clean I feel at home from the moment I stepped in. The room and bathroom are spotlessly clean with big bed and high quality mattress and pillows. As the place is not facing a main road, I had uninterrupted sleep throughout my stay.
Linh is very friendly and responsive. I will definitely choose to stay here again during my future visits to Da Nang.

I am so happy with my stay here. This space is so cozy, clean and comfy! I felt very at-home and safe here.
I really like Da Nang and I loved walking around the area. In fact, from this Airbnb, you could take a walk or run across the dragon bridge and around to the Cau Song Han bridge and back and it's about 5km total. Super nice!
So many lovely cafes and restaurants around. My favorite cafe for Vietnamese feeling was Tiệm cà phê Cậu Út, right across the street. For working, I loved Ge or Wonderlust cafe.
To the beach is only about 10 mins away by Grab bike.
Linh was super responsive and helpful. I would recommend this place to anyone looking for a cozy stay in Da Nang.

Heel moderen en mooi ingericht huis met alles erop en eraan. Host reageerde snel op alles en was enorm behulpzaam. Locatie was ook goed, verschillende zaken op wandelafstand. Beach moet je een scooter huren of grab gebruiken. Ik raad men verblijf hier zeker aan! :) top

Linh’s place is a great find! We stayed for a few nights and found the location to be a perfect spot in town for us! Very close to the dragon bridge, and tons of storefronts and cafes! We are on a long trip around Southeast Asia, so finding a place with a large kitchen and washer/dryer combo was the highlight for us, definitely made us feel at home with all of those conveniences! The rooms are a decent size, with a private bathroom, desk, mini fridge big bed and wardrobe closet in them (and the air con works very well too!). We thought that the rooms were also pretty well spread out too, as we hardly ever heard the other guests when in them. The common space that you share with the other guests is VERY well maintained and has a homey feel to it, there is an outdoor patio on the ground floor along with a rooftop one! The instructions to get into the house are very clear, which was nice since we arrived quite late into the night. Would ABSOLUTELY recommend this spot and plan to return!
各方面都很好，但是一早7:30就有人唱KTV被吵醒，還有房間裡有非常濃的人工香精味，通風也不太好，有窗戶但沒陽光，所以休息的不是很好，適合短居一兩日。房東很和善，公共空間美麗。

great place to stay in da Nang. so much amazing local food nearby. they also have all the amenities you could possibly need, from washer dryer, to adapters for chargers. room is very clean, as well as the entire place. ac works great too!
look no further if you're searching for a place to stay in da nang!
部屋は写真通りで、快適な生活が送れました！
Very nice place next to the center of Hoi an (15min of walk). Bikes are available. The room is great and clean. The host is amazing very friendly and helpful thanks for that !
Chúng tôi có trải nghiệm tốt tại đây, rất hài lòng, nhân viên thân thiện.

We had an awesome experience here. This was the only place that had 3 single beds and for a great price. We didn’t go swimming but their pool looked very nice. When you walk into the lobby there’s a beautiful wooden table with benches where we ate breakfast every morning. It was very clean and they had filtered water there that we could drink. They also helped us carry our suitcases up and down the stairs. It’s in a great location and has bikes you can take to the rice fields, beach or the market. You can also order a grab for about $1 usd.

We had a very comfortable stay here! The room layout was adequately spacious, and we found the beds comfortable. Our room looked exactly like the photos!
It is also convenient to book Grab to get to places like the beach and old quarter! Although it’s possible to walk to these locations, we opted for grab as the weather was quite warm.
I would like to thank Thuy for helping us to arrange for transport to the airport fairly last-minute! We were in need of a taxi and had to leave in 15min, but Thuy was very accommodating and arranged it for us almost instantaneously, which was amazing!
I would stay at this Airbnb if I visit hoi an again!
전반적으로 가격대비 나쁘지 않은 청결도이며,  무엇보다 직원분들이 매우 친절했고, 문의에 대해 신속하게 대처해주었습니다. 주변에 사람이 붐비지 않는 괜찮은 스파들도 많아서 좋았습니다

Nice place to stay while hanging out with the boys.
Free bicycle, easy to explore around the area.

Great stay !
Location is 20min from the old town.
We had a lovely night and communication with Thuy was perfect.

They were so nice at the 1993 homestay. They let check-in early for free :)
We were given cycles to go around Hoi An which was very helpful as all the places are close by. It felt home.
Even the rooms were very neat and clean, the bathroom itself was very huge.
No complaints!
Would definitely stay here again.

Overall we really enjoyed the stay. Room was very spacious clean and stylish… owner offer free bikes which we ride to the old town every day.. great way to explore Hoi Ann on a bike. There’s a restaurant just opposite the place which makes it easy to have a quiet breakfast and wait for the pickup..
Overall great experience!

Parfait, logement propre, équipe attentionnée, petit déjeuner parfait, scooter et vélo parfait , piscine parfaite
Tout parfait merci !! Je reviendrai
great place, nice location. super clean . Nice pool outside.

From the moment we arrived, everything about our stay was exceptional. The host’s attention to detail truly sets this place apart—every little thing was thoughtfully arranged to make our stay comfortable and enjoyable. The home was spotless, beautifully designed, and had everything we needed (and more!).
The hospitality was outstanding—the host was always available, responsive, and went above and beyond to ensure we had a great experience. From local recommendations to small personal touches, it was evident that they genuinely care about their guests.
The location was perfect, making it easy to explore the city while still offering a peaceful retreat at the end of the day.
If you’re looking for a place that combines comfort, convenience, and top-notch hospitality, this is it! We couldn’t have asked for a better experience and would absolutely stay here again.
Thank you for an unforgettable stay!

An amazing place to stay in Hoi An. Our room was spacious and very clean with amazing natural light. The location was perfect too. About >10min motorbike ride or > 15min bike ride to the main area. The rice patties are also very close >5min bike ride for those like me who like to wake up early and explore, super convenient! There is also a convenient store around the corner that has everything you need. Thuy was very responsive and replies to my questions within a few minutes! She was an amazing host, helping us with our laundry, biking and other requests. We really appreciate her help and hospitality. I highly recommend her Airbnb if you’re looking for somewhere comfortable and convenient in Hoi An!
入住很方便，附近也很漂亮，泳池很干净
좋았어요  침구류도 깔끔하고 깨끗했어요
Hat alles gepasst, sauberes schönes Zimmer mit täglicher Putzfrau. Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis unschlagbar

Logement très propre et hôte très accueillant, aucun problème pour une arrivé tardive si retard de vol.
Mention spéciale pour la salle de bain que j’ai beaucoup apprécié.
Je recommande.
Good stay
good
Very nice place
Hospitable. Would recommend.
really nice place!
Lovely homestay, great room for 3 travellers. Location was great, close to old town but outside the busy centre. Thuy was really helpful and responsive. Would recommend!
Thuy’s place is perfect for us, 20mins walk to old town. The room is cozy and tidy, with good noodle restaurant and cafe garden nearby.

Beautiful 2 story apartment that is modern and very clean. It is on the 12th floor on a busy street but it was very quiet. One bedroom is downstairs and the other is upstairs, both with full baths. We had a really nice stay and the host was great because we booked it in the evening. Had all the needed amenities. Great stay!

We had a pleasant stay. The host was welcoming and personally made our check-in process easy. The place was very clean, with daily housekeeping and fresh water bottles provided each day. It's conveniently located near the airport. I highly recommend this place to anyone visiting Da Nang.

Couldn’t thank you host more - The place was clean and cleaned daily, the house was very clean and tidy at all times. Acommdated requests without question, would 100% reccomend and will be staying here again in future!
Thanks again.

Amazingly clean and beautiful apartment. Stayed here with my wife, daughter and infant son for 3 days. had no issues at all. Definite value for money. If i come back to Danang, will book again for sure.
정말 깨끗한 숙소입니다. 호스트분도 신속하게 응답해주시고 불편한 사항은 없는지 늘 확인하여 주셨습니다. 다만 위치가 공항 근처라 관광을 하기에는 가깝지 않지만, 날씨가 더우니 그랩을 잡아 이동하면 되기에 큰 문제가 되지는 않습니다. 다낭에 다시 오게 되면 꼭 머물고 싶은 숙소입니다.

We had a comfortable stay at Hang’s place.  Apartment is beautiful and Hang was very cooperative and caring Host ensuring a phenomenal service. It’s perfect if u wish stay closer to the airport. Beach is just 4kms away.
다낭 공항 인접한 아주 깔끔한 복층구조의 숙소. 사진과 똑같고 집이 너무 아늑하고 좋습니다. 한시장 및 맛집들은 그랩으로 5-10분 거리로 위치도 만족합니다. 그리고 호스트님의 빠른 응답으로 불편함 없이 지냈습니다.

Being a tourist not aware of locality Hang was so helpful to book the day tour and very easily communicate with Hang.  I would prefer stay in the same accommodation again if ever I visit Vietnam again. Highly recommended.

Super appartement!
Je recommande vivement, tout est organisé à la perfection 👌emplacement idéal pour sillonner dans la ville et tout près de l’aéroport.
Vivement recommandé!

Our stay at this Airbnb was absolutely perfect and truly deserves a 5-star rating!
From the moment we arrived, the service was exceptional, the host was very responsive and went above and beyond to ensure a smooth and enjoyable experience.
The apartment itself was immaculately clean, sparkling from top to bottom, making us feel instantly comfortable and at ease. We especially loved the aesthetic minimalist decor, which created such a serene and stylish atmosphere. Every detail was thoughtfully considered, contributing to a truly relaxing and delightful stay.
We can't recommend this place enough!"

This is the nicest apartment I've stayed at in Da Nang. It's basically brand new and is a loft style layout with floor to ceiling windows offering an excellent view of the airport, allowing you to watch the planes take off. The sound insulation is good and unlike many of the buildings closer to the beach, there are no issues with humidity/dampness.
The apartment is on the top floor of a mixed-use building on a main street that makes it easy to go all the restaurants and cafes in Hai Chau. It's also really not that far from the beach side of the river either. If you want to enjoy Da Nang but not have to deal with the craziness and traffic of My An in the high season, this is a really good spot.
The hosts are friendly and very responsive.

Our family had an absolutely amazing stay. The space was incredibly spacious, spotlessly clean, and perfectly maintained; ideal for me, my wife, and our kid. The accommodations were top-notch, making us feel so comfortable and at home. A special shoutout to the cleaning ladies—they were incredibly friendly, thorough, and accommodating, taking care of all our needs and keeping the place absolutely pristine. The host’s service and communication were exceptional, always prompt and warm, ensuring a seamless experience from check-in to checkout. This was one of the best stays we’ve ever had, and we can’t wait to come back! Highly recommend to anyone looking for a fantastic place to stay. Thank you for everything!
Had a very pleasant and comfortable stay! The host was helpful and made sure everything went smoothly. Would definitely recommend to friends.
it’s a nice place. just like the photos. only regret was not staying there long enough! a rebook spot for sure.
迅速に対応してくださりました。またお願いします

Hai Hang ,,
We are extremely happy for having choosen your place for our stay .. The house was as per our expectations.. Nevertheless was Ur response to all our queries.. Felt right at home .From the check in to check out you was one of the best host I've experienced so far. U really did recommend all tourist attractions else we would have missed a few places to see .. House was super clean and the main point is that house keeping was done daily to ensure cleanliness.. Pictures posted in Airbnb was exactly the same !! Property is easily accessible and it's just 5 mins from the airport.. Hang was an amazing person .. Her support throughout our stay made our trip an memorable one .. Will definitely recommend to my friends and cousins .. Hoping to come back again to stay in this property .. Thank you So much Hang !!
다시 오고싶은 숙소입니다.
設施新淨，住所乾淨，而且地方夠大
I had a great stay here! The host has been very helpful

A fantastic place! The place itself was amazing and exactly as described, but Nhu was attentive, responsive and so kind throughout. Even on the last night when we had some issues with the power (due to a power loss in the area) Nhu was responsive and communicating constantly. The outside pool is wonderful, warm and special. Would 100% recommend for couples! Thanks Nhu 😊
Loved the Zen theme. The plunge pool was a particular highlight. Our host was so lovely and so sweet and helpful. The zen house was so comfortable and we had an amazing time.

nhu is sweet and friendly, greeted us before check in time and held our backpacks.
the house is as in the photos, very nice, clean and tidy. the pool view tub is as in the photos, even better.
the house is a few minutes walk from old town, very convenient but in quiet place.
the day we left nhu was super nice and held our backpacks until we left.
if i go back to hoi an i will definitely stay here!

We loved our stay at the Zen House, it is a lovely Japanese style house and the outdoor bath tub and pool were perfect to relax and cool off in after exploring the old town. Great location for getting to the old town, and Nhu was very helpful in organising our transport and recommending places to eat and explore. Highly recommend!

We loved our stay at the Zen House, highly recommend for anyone visiting Hoi An.
Nhu is so lovely and gave us a lot of recommendations for local eateries etc.
Safe and private little villa, great air-con to cool the room and with a refreshing rock pool, I can see why this place is often booked!
We hope to stay again one day when we return to Vietnam.
Thanks Nhu!

We had an amazing time at Nhu's property. it was a beautiful place and is only a short walk to the centre of the old town.
the outdoor jacuzzi was a great touch and Nhu was very helpful and communicative.
There was some construction taking place next door which was a bit loud during the day but it would stop by 5pm and didn't impact our experience here.

This Japanese style house is so cozy and is an experience within itself in Hoi An. As first time visitors, the owner Nhu made check in very easy and was also super helpful in recommending places and things to do. The house comes with everything you need, such as bikes, a mini bar, and even a cute little rock pool that has lighting and massage settings. The location is very good, so you can walk or bike to most things and aren’t far from the busy spots. We spent lots of time in the rock pool, which is so relaxing and such a treat to have. We loved our time here to wind down and explore the area
The house was wonderful, clean and incredibly lovely.  The pond truly brings zen and you can rest in it for hours!  Nhu was incredibly nice and helpful throughout our entire stay.

숙소도 이쁘지만 무엇보다 호스트님의 친절에 두번세번 감탄하고 갑니다. 세심한 호스팅을 해주시고 늘 신속히 응답을 주시며 게스트를 위해 하나하나 섬세히 배려해주십니다.
호이안 야시장까지 도보로 걸어다닐 수가 있을만큼 가까우며, 즐길거리가 많으며 숙소 주변은 조용해 매우 추천합니다.
다낭에서 즐겁지 못했던 숙박 경험을 호이안의 이 숙소와서 말끔히 잊고 지냈으며 그정도로 즐거운 숙박 경험이었습니다.
첫 해외여행에 이 숙소 호스트님을 만난것은 행운🍀입니다 감사해요❤

Absolutely gorgeous stay at this beautiful accommodation. Everything was perfect to the note!
Nhu was so kind and friendly, possibly the best air b n b host we’ve ever had! The rock pool was such a highlight and so amazing to cool down in.
Perfect stay. Couldn’t have asked for better

Tout simplement incroyable ! On est venus avec notre bébé de 5 mois et on a été très bien accueillis par Nhu. Elle est très disponible et serviable si l’on a besoin. Le logement est superbe et le bruit de la rue largement supportable (notre bébé a très bien dormi) et le plus est clairement la petite piscine - bain tellement japonisant et appréciable après une journée dans la ville de Hoi An!
On reviendra! Merci beaucoup Nhu. 🥰

This place was absolutely stunning! The location couldn’t have been better—everything I wanted to see was within walking distance, and they even had bicycles available, which made exploring super convenient and fun. The scenery was gorgeous, and don’t even get me started on the jacuzzi and bathtub—they were seriously next-level. So dreamy! It was the perfect spot to just unwind and relax. Highly recommend for anyone looking to recharge in a beautiful, peaceful setting.

Nhu went above and beyond to make sure our stay was amazing. She gave us the best recommendations for food, tailoring shops, and activities to do and we will definitely be back again to visit. I highly recommend for anyone to stay here if you get the chance. We felt so welcomed and she was so flexible in terms of our check in time.

Nice stay for one night to extend our time in Hoi An. Responsive host. The outdoor rock pool and bath were really lovely - although beware there is little privacy. The location was great, in a quieter but still almost central location but as described kids start making noise early. Nhu gave us a great restaurant recommendation, we had a great time.

A very individual space, tucked out of the way, and yet a short walk to the Old Town.
The bed was comfortable, there was a full sized fridge with plenty of beer, water and coke.
The outdoor rock pool was just lovely after a hot day.
It was noisy at times but it was the sound of children playing.
Nhu was a wonderful host. When she knew I would be arriving late she bought me a Banh Mi!

Amazing time at Nhu’s place. Nhu was extremely helpful and provided lots of amazing  recommendations. The room was extremely clean and comfortable with a great location. We had the best time! Thanks Nhu!

Un bel oasis de tranquilité à HoiAn qu'est ce logement. Le jacuzzi entouré de verdure est un gros plus. La douche et le bain extérieur également. l'emplacement était parfait . vraiment que du positif à dire.  De plus les hôtes Nhue et son mari furent très accueillants et flexibles. merci

Nhu helped make our first time in Hoi An a smooth and pleasant experience. Her restaurant recommendations were all so good and she gave clear instructions on how to get around the town. Her place was also very clean and walking distance from Ancient Town.

The most beautiful Air BnB experience one can have.
Nhu is extremely kind , I was inspired by the hospitality. This place is worth well over 150$ a night , the price Nhu is giving it for is a deal from God themselves.

Great stay! The place was clean, comfortable, and exactly as described. Nhu was super friendly and responsive, making check-in easy and the whole experience smooth. Would definitely stay again—highly recommended!
The place is great with all the facilities like private pool, bath tub, fridge and everything. Also everything is nearby and also they rent bicycles which is really great.

The place feels like an oasis, walkable to old town and has a great tub and jacuzzi. The bed and pillows were a but uncomfortable for me but that could be personal preference as I do not like memory foam beds and pillows

Le logement est très agréable et typique. Il est à proximité du centre sans être dans la foule touristique. L’hôte est très amicale et réactive, elle propose de nombreuses choses aux alentours.
Comme la plupart des autres commentaires, il ne faut pas avoir le sommeil léger avec l’école à côté qui démarre à 6h30. Il y avait aussi une maison en travaux juste à côté ce qui ne nous a pas permis de dormir paisiblement.

Die Unterkunft ist schön im japanischen Stil hergerichtet. Es bietet eine gute Möglichkeit um entspannen zu können und man kann dort gut schlafen. Die Gastgeber sind sehr freundlich und extrem Hilfsbereit. Wir bekamen sehr gute Tipps für die Umgebung. Und sie waren immer da wenn wie etwas benötigten.

My time at Hai's villa was a memorable and luxurious experience. Perks included a daily apartment clean, an on-site spa and a delicious breakfast. The convenience of a free bike made my exploring safe and special, but local amenities were varied enough that you could spend a day in the local neighbourhood too. All the staff were friendly and approachable. Thank you for a pleasant, peaceful stay in this beautiful place.

5 stars doesn’t do this place justice. The rooms themselves are clean, comfy and spacious. The place itself is so pretty with a beautiful pool and loads of bonsai trees. It’s well situated to get into the old town and they lend you bikes to use. The staff are great, even after check out they let us use the pool and store our bags. I couldn’t recommend this place enough. Hai is also super helpful and responsive.

Wow. This has been my favourite accomodation in Vietnam and now that I have left, nothing compares. The workers, especially the security guards and house keepers were so lovely and were always greeting me with a big smile. The room itself was so spacious and clean. The pool and gardens were lovely. You are a bit out of town but it’s nice and quiet because of this. I loved this air bnb and I will definitely stay here again when I return to Hoi an! Thanks for having me :)
One of the best Airbnb’s we have stayed in! The complex is beautiful and very peaceful and the rooms are super clean. The staff were very kind and helpful. Can’t recommend this place enough!!

Couldn’t be happier with this place. It is worth every dollar. The place was clean and beautiful. The staff was amazing and helpful at all times. Room was incredibly comfortable - didn’t want to leave. Location is near the riverside and walkable to old town

We had a wonderful stay at Hai’s beautiful property. Everything was as described and even more amazing in person! The location is so beautiful, set amongst lush gardens and a relaxing pool area. We even had access to bikes which we used to cycle to the beach! Close to some lovely cafes also (highly recommend tropical cafe).
We couldn’t recommend this place enough!

I came to Hoi An because I needed to relax and I couldn’t have picked a better place. Better Garden Villa is so calm yet not far away from the animation of the old town. The entire property is a luxuriant garden very well maintained and with care.
The stuff is the kindest they’re always there to assist you and I have felt nothing but pampered.
Thank you for the wonderful experience

We spent 11 nights here and loved it. The room is very large and comfortable. The hosts/staff are friendly and accomodating. The free bikes are great to explore Hoi An on. You can also rent a scooter, which was great. The pool and grounds are beautiful and are kept in very good condition.
I highly recommend this accomodation and will definitely be staying here again next time I am in Hoi An.

We where after a comfy accommodation away from tourist Central but still walkable. This is perfect. Staff friendly, helpful with activities. The breakfast was reasonablely priced and variety and a great recommended restaurant very close and Mini mart.

Absolutely fantastic! Spotlessly clean, great responsive hosts who sorted taxis and trips out for us, great breakfast, beautiful gardens and lovely pool. There were a number of good restaurants nearby so that we didn’t need to go into the old town to eat. Nhan’s kitchen round the corner was good and we also ate well at other local restaurants towards the river. We could not have asked for more. Thank you.

This was by far our favourite place we stayed in Vietnam! It looks even more beautiful than the pictures and is peaceful and quiet while being walkable from the old town. The hosts are extremely helpful and kind! I could not recommend staying here more!

One of the best Airbnbs I have ever stayed in. The pool area is really beautiful- full of plants and the pool is large enough for a proper swim. The room was really spacious, clean and with a great bathroom. Slightly out of town but we actually preferred this as it’s an easy walk/ cycle into the town or beach. Everyone was very friendly and helpful and I would definitely recommend!

Hai and his staff were all incredibly friendly and welcoming, this place is just as beautiful as the photos! It’s nice and peaceful but also only a 10 min walk to the shops and cafes. There are also free bikes you can take out for the day. The bed was comfy and bathroom was clean and spacious! Would recommend!

We stayed with Hai for 2 nights. Room was as described and more spacious than we imagined. It’s in a great location, a 5-10 minute cycle to the famous night markets and 10-15 in the other direction towards the beach. They have breakfast at great value and even managed to provide us pick up/ drop off service cheaper than grab! Overall, lovely stay when visiting Hoi An.

we loved staying here while in Hoi An. all of the staff were very friendly and helpful and the atmosphere was relaxed and informal. the breakfast was delicious and a great start to the day and the pool provided a delightful end to a day of exploring Hoi An. it’s close enough to walk to old town but is in a quiet section of town that gives one a break from the hubbub and noise of old town. highly recommend!!
We have really enjoyed our stay here. It’s a lovely home which was very clean with an amazing pool. We would highly recommend anyone to stay and it’s also very close to the old town.

Ci siamo trovati molto bene nella struttura di Hai. Appartamento molto grande e pulito, personale disponibile al 100% e grande piscina per rilassarsi.
Per spostarsi all’interno della città è possibile richiedere le bici che la struttura fornirà gratuitamente.
È possibile prenotare tour per le isole Cu Lao Cham Islands direttamente all’interno della struttura.
Se dovessimo mai tornare in Vietnam ci torneremo sicuramente! Soddisfatti al 100%
4박5일 지냈는데 정말 만족스러운 시간이었습니다. 직원들 모두 친절했고,  쾌적한 시간을 보냈어요. 수영장도 마음에 들었습니다. 재방문 의사 100%
정말 이번 베트남 여행에서 최고의 숙소 선택이였다 생각해요. 체크인 - 체크아웃 이후 서비스는 가히 완벽하다 말씀드릴 수 있습니다. 수영장도 넓어서 다른 투숙객들과 함께 이용을해도 좁다는걸 못느꼈어요 :)

Ce séjour fut excellent et extrêmement reposant. Dès notre arrivée, notre séjour a été placé sous le signe du repos. Nous sommes même arrivés plus tôt que l’heure prévue initialement et notre chambre était déjà prête. Nous vous en remercions énormément ! De plus, le prêt de vélo est vraiment un plus pour se rendre dans le centre du vieux quartier ou à la plage.

This place is absolutely beautiful and has impeccable service. This is one of the few places I would not hesitate to stay again. There are only a handful of rooms and it’s located in a quiet part of town so it’s peaceful and great for a calm and lax stay.

Die Unterkunft ist wunderschön - eine richtig idyllische Oase mit einem wunderschönen Garten & einem riesigen Pool. Mit dem Fahrrad, welches kostenlos auszuleihen ist, kannst du innerhalb von 10min in die Altstadt fahren. Der Weg ist direkt am Wasser und du fährst unter den leuchtenden Laternen entlang!

Great stay, matched the pictures, has everything you need at the place, free bike and we hired the mopeds right from the Airbnb. They have a laundry service which helped us a lot. Great stay highly recommend.

写真通りのとても美しい場所です。
日常を忘れてゆっくり過ごしました。
部屋や水回りも清潔でした。
スタッフもみんなフレンドリーです。
徒歩圏内にレストランやカフェ、コンビニもあります。

Couldn’t have asked for more. A clean and comfy space for us to stay which also felt so homely. Tony was so accommodating and helped us with anything we needed and met us as soon as we got off to boat at the port so it was a very stress free experience :) Mama Hai fed us very well and was a good laugh. not to forget the fishing trip and snorkelling Long and friends took us on - very local and cute experience. Thankyou all!

Mama Hai was a really lovely Host!
It felt kinda like Home for us and i could really recommend this Homestay! Everything matched the descriptions and they gave their best to make our stay as easy and comfortable as possible.
We got upgraded (one more room) and they helped us out with the FerryTickets and every different Problem.
Just the best for them!

We just stayed for a week here and had a great time!  Having every meal in front of the ocean with mama and papa waiting on us was amazing. The home stay is close to a few beaches and we arranged motor bike taxi to the others. Staying for more than a few days allowed for ultimate relaxation and a great local feel!!
What an absolute gem!!! All of the family and staff are beyond welcoming and kind. They gave us the most authentic and comfortable experience in such a stunning area. Thank you ❤️❤️❤️

The place Tony and his parents set up is just fantastic. They made it feel like home from the start. Airbnb showed us 4 bedrooms but it turned out to be 4 beds and 2 rooms. However it was not an issue at all. The beds are so comfortable and we all had an amazing stay. Definitely recommend!

Tony and his parents were welcoming and loving from the first second we arrived.
Mama let me use the kitchen when I wanted to cook my own food, but they also have a menu if you prefer that.
Rooms were spacious and cosy
Highly recommend if you want to stay in Cham island, we stayed for 4 nights :)
Thank you Tony!

Tony e la sua famiglia ci hanno accolto con molta serenità e disponibilità. gestiscono un ristorante e offrono  delle stanze dentro la loro casa, proprio davanti al mare. la location è fantastica. Loro sono gentilissimi e Tony è una persona disponibilissima e proattiva, capace di muoversi sull'isola con efficacia e rapidità nel rispondere alle necessità. è possibile  prenotare escursioni per snorkeling, pesca e noleggio scooter. è un posto molto genuino, un'isola ancora non invasa dal turismo di massa, dove si sta bene in una casa semplice e unica per la sua semplicità.

Very simple, local homestay on the southern part of the main island run by a very friendly and sweet family. Tony, the adult son, is proficient in English, and will be your best contact point. He helped me rent a scooter, which I highly recommend for getting around the island as there isn't a ton within walking distance of the homestay. Plenty of fresh seafood, and the homestay has all the food, water and drinks you need at reasonable prices. Highly recommend the nearby Ray Ong Bang Cafe and Monkey Beach Bar. Room is about as basic as they come, but the air conditioning works very well and the shared bathroom is functional. You can request a key to lock your door when you leave. Great for a super laid back experience living with a local family in a sleepy little fishing village at a very good price. Thank you so much!

Had the most wonderful time. So friendly and welcoming! Mama Hai cooking is amazing!! Will defiantly be back next time we come to Vietnam.
Thank you mama Hai and Papa long for our wonderful time!

Si vous souhaitez une ambiance familiale sincère, telle que décrite dans l'annonce, cela n'est pas le cas. Ils vous chargent a la moindre occasions de frais supplémentaires (ticket de bateau, eau, nourriture). Jai pris un petit dejeuner chez eux franchement décevant... jai donc décidé de prendre mes repas en dehors, ce qui a déplu a la mama. Au moment du check out, elle a voulu me refaire payer la chambre et le moto taxi.
Tôi thấy hài lòng

Es war wirklich traumhaft schön auf den Cham Islands. Wir hatten einer sehr gute Zeit! Der Homestay und die Familie sind ganz liebe Leute!
Wir haben in einem einfachen Zimmer mit AC und Mosquitonetzen geschlafen, das Badezimmer haben wir mit anderen Gästen geteilt. Es gab tolles Essen und Empfehlungen für die traumhaft schöne Insel. Danke für die schöne Zeit!

Un paradiso 🌞
Abbiamo adorato la famiglia, l’isola, il cibo, TUTTO
Gli host propongo anche delle esperienze molto divertenti
È stato bellissimo passare qualche giorno con loro e spero davvero di tornarci in futuro
Grazie Tony ❤️
Sehr herzliche und entspannte Familie. Es wird sich um alles gekümmert, wenn man Hilfe braucht. Eine bessere Lage ist schwer zu finden. Wenn wir wieder auf der Insel sind, bleiben wir länger.

This homestay might be the highlight of our whole trip. The homestay is located in the smaller town on the island, which made it feel very local and quiet. The people in this town are amazing loving people, which was also the reason why we ended up enjoying our stay. Mamma Hai and Mamma Nhi (two sisters with their own homestays working together) were such nice people and made us feel like we were at home. Hai’s son, Tony, is the person behind the whole “operation”. He is very kind and helpful and quick to respond if you need anything. The homestay also offers different private activities, and I would definitely recommend taking their snorkeling tour, instead of the touristy ones you find in the main harbor. This is a place I will remember for life, and our experience here is very special for us. Thank you to everyone for giving us these memories.

Es war eine außergewöhnliche Erfahrung in diesem Homestay, die Gastgeber sind super freundlich und man fühlt sich direkt in der Familie aufgenommen :). Wir haben super Empfehlungen bekommen für Sehenswürdigkeiten auf der Insel. Das Dorf schien mir auf jeden fall auch wesentlich angenehmer und entspannter als der Hauptort, wir wurden von allen fröhlich und herzlich bergrüßt und teilweise eingeladen einen Kaffee zu trinken und Karaoke zu singen.
würde auf jeden fall wieder kommen !!!!!!
Very nice, friendly and helpful family. We enjoyed our stay at their place. They drove us there from the port and back.
Vielen Dank für die schöne Zeit und die tollen Tipps und Hilfen :)

Pros:
A wonderful family!
Beautiful, peaceful setting.
Tony was wonderful to deal with & very helpful.
Feeding the many very cute little monkeys around the back of the village was the highlight of my trip!
Loved that the beds had mosquito netting, but there were very few when we were there.
Cons:
No hot water for showers! They will heat up some water in a bucket for you to dip into to wash if you wish. There was nothing mentioned about this & we were quite unprepared for that.
As you are supposed to remove your shoes when going inside,
going barefoot into the 1 bathroom (the other has sandals to use) was gross, & the floor was frequently wet. It's best to bring some inside sandals.
Bedroom doors aren't locked from the outside unless you bring your own padlock.

We had a fantastic stay with Hai, Long and Tony. Their spot is right on the beach in a beautiful authentic fishing village. The kids had a ball and enjoyed ‘mama’s cooking’. Tony helped us with ferry tickets and scooters to get to the house (no cars on Cham Island). I would recommend leaving your larger bags and hard cases with a hotel on the mainland and only take the essentials.

Beautiful, authentic Vietnamese homestay with amazing hosts in a beautiful remote island. As the reviews and description, the hosts don’t speak much English but this didn’t stop us loving the experience, they were smiley, welcoming and couldn’t do enough for us! Would definitely recommend staying here.

Our host and his family made our Cham Island trip unforgettable. They arranged snorkeling trips, helped us rent a bike, and served delicious food (with generous portions!).
The peaceful retreat by the sea was pure bliss.
In summary, I recommend this place if you are looking for tranquility and authentic island vibes.

We had an amazing stay here! The hosts were so lovely and really accommodating. They made great food and organised an incredible snorkelling trip for us. It is such a peaceful village with wonderful views better than any photo can show.
They booked our ferry tickets for us and picked us up from the harbour on motorbike.
I couldn’t recommend staying here enough!

Très belle famille discrète et accueillante dans un petit village de pêcheurs très animé mais paisible ! Des paysages fabuleux sur cette petite île des merveilles..
Juste l'absence de fenêtre dans la chambre et les lits un peu durs pour les européens que nous sommes.. Mais ce petit port est comme un trésor ! Envie de revenir une autre fois ! Merci à Tony pour sa bonne cuisine et à ses parents si attentionnés !

Nice and cozy apartment
Very clean
Walkable distance to restaurants and beach
Host very helpful
Thank you again

RIGHT outside the airport, walked here for about 7-9minutes at 12am right after my flight. A simple, clean and comfortable stay. Host was SUPER helpful and proactive with helping us book a taxi for a good price to our next destination after our check out!

I love that it looks exactly like in the pictures. My partner and I loved it even for a one night stay before our flight. It was a quiet place and the neighborhood was great. If we ever come back to Vietnam, we will definately stay here again. 6/5 ⭐️

This is our second time staying at this location and binh is always so helpful as well as the other staff in the hotel. The staff has always gone above and beyond to help myself and my elderly mother even helping her walk up the stairs late at night as he walks the local neighborhood. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a great bang for the buck such a quiet neighborhood cannot say enough good things about this place.

항공사 문제로 인해 다낭으로 출발하는 비행기의 지연으로 예정시간 보다 3시간 후에 도착해서 체크인을 AM 6:00 즈음에 했어요. 하지만 그 시간에도 친절하게 안내를 해주었으며 깊은 감사를 느꼈어요. 비록 여행 일정 때문에 오래 숙소에 머물지는 못했지만, 체크아웃할 때 직원의 인사가 인상적이었어요.
저처럼 새벽에 도착하는 사람들에게 매우 추천드립니다.
my mom and I have stayed here before and this room was even more beautiful than the last, we will definitely come back as soon as possible. thank you

공항근처라 접근성이 용이함
주택가라 소음이 적다.

Nằm ở một khu biệt lập nên rất yên tĩnh và trong lành, đi bộ ra cánh đồng lúa, tuy nhiên việc thuê xe đạp hay ra trung tâm sẽ không thuận tiện bằng. Phòng đẹp hơn mong đợi, giường nằm rất thoải mái và sạch sẽ, có cả máy pha cà phê và cà phê được chuẩn bị sẵn. Chủ nhà rất đặt tâm trí vào ngôi nhà và chu đáo. Highly recommend

Căn hộ rất đẹp, mới, hiện đại, nhiều tiện nghi và sạch sẽ. Decor đẹp.. Tôi rất thích không gian yên tĩnh, nhiều cây xanh ở xung quanh. Tuy nhiên việc đi đến các điểm du lịch (bãi biển an bàng, phố cổ) thì khá là xa. Chủ nhà rất thân thiện. Tôi sẽ quay lại nếu có dịp.

One of the best stays I’ve had in Hoi An! The 2-bedroom villa is beautifully designed – modern, cozy, and feels just like home. The space is quiet, surrounded by greenery, and filled with natural light. It’s just a few minutes by car, motorbike, or bicycle to the Ancient Town. The ride takes you through peaceful rice fields where you might even see some Vietnamese water buffalo along the way – such a unique experience! The host was incredibly kind and helpful. I’ll always remember this lovely home and will definitely come back next time I’m in Hoi An.
Phòng rất xinh, đầy đủ những thứ mà tụi mình cần. Sau quay lại Hội An mình sẽ book lại.

사진과 일치했고
시설 침구 정말 마음에 들었습니다.
빠른 응답과 안내
평화로움 그 자체였습니다.
편안히 잘 쉬다 갑니다~

The place was really nice and comfortable for the 4 of us. Everything was really clean. The place was really accessible too but at times it may take awhile for us to advise the Grab driver how to make their way to our place. But overall, it was a really pleasant stay!

Echt een prachtig verblijf! Hele fijne communicatie met host! Het zat op een afgesloten park, wat wel wat buiten de stad was, dus moet taxi naar centrum pakken. Ook moest je betalen voor zwembad en word daar zwemles gegeven.
숙소 깔끔하고 셋이서 잘 이용했습니다. 도보로 이동은 어려워 그랩으로 이동했어요
整體體驗十分良好，退房後漏了東西，旅居主人也有提醒我們，並且配合我們把東西寄回給我們。
Very peaceful surroundings away from the hustle of the city. Luxurious apartment. Thanh is a great host! Would recommend renting a scooter or bycicle if staying in this area.
This stay was amazing. The hosts were always responsive and adapted to any needs we had. The location was great - just a short taxi to Old Town.
Thanh is as lovely as her place. She gave clear instructions and was very responsive.
整个房间非常好，如果我再来会安玩儿，我会再次选择住在这里。
Great stay. Very serene by the river. The host was very responsive.

Thanh’s apartment was beautiful - surrounded by verdant palms and peaceful waters the area is a delightfully tranquil retreat away from the hubub of old town.
The apartment is astoundingly furnished with luxurious sofas and probably the most comfortable beds I have slept on. Spotlessly clean and fresh.
Finally, Thanh herself was endlessly friendly and gave excellent recommendations for the surrounding area.
A perfect retreat for anyone, could not recommend highly enough.
A great place and worth a stay
Nice stay! Good location. Highly recommend!
great host, great location. will come back for more
Schöne Unterkunft abgelegen vom Trubel, direkt gegenüber ist ein Schwimmbad. Alles super hoher Standard, es hätte nur paar mehr Küchenutensilien geben können.

Merci a Thanh et Annie pour leur réactivité et leur aide.
le logement était superbe et idéalement placé 👍👍
We very enjoy in here, and also we will come back if we visit again.

Exceptional host and an unforgettable stay!
Our family had an incredibly comfortable and enjoyable trip, thanks to the outstanding hospitality of the host. They went above and beyond to ensure we had everything we needed and were even flexible enough to offer an early check-in based on room availability. The villa was immaculate, thoughtfully designed, and equipped with everything to make guests feel at home. The host’s meticulous attention to detail and genuine care truly made our stay unforgettable. Highly recommend this villa to anyone seeking a seamless and delightful experience!
Best regard,
Lan Uyen
It was a great stay!!
Mooi verblijf! Aangename en vlotte communicatie.

1 căn phòng trong 1 ngôi nhà gần biển ở Đà Nẵng.
Căn phòng đầy đủ tiện nghi, có gian bếp nhỏ phù hợp cho các bạn.
Hơi bất tiện 1 chút là đường nhỏ nên chỗ để xe không được thuận tiện cho lắm nhưng đây vẫn là một nơi đáng đến nghỉ ngơi nhe.
Sẽ quay lại nếu có dịp.
Phòng sạch sẽ, còn mới
Tuyệt vời
good
Superbe logement très bien aménagé !
Ok

Chỗ ở cực kì yên bình.
Đường vào đủ chỗ cho 1 xe ô tô lưu thông, phù hợp với các gia đình đi 1-2 xe.
Tôi đã rất vui! Cảm ơn bạn đã đối xử tốt với tôi!
Tôi đã rất vui! Cảm ơn bạn đã đối xử tốt với tôi!
마치 동화 속에 들어온 듯한 기분이었어요. 숙소는 조용하고 평화로워서 머무는 내내 마음이 편안했습니다. 곳곳이 예쁘게 꾸며져 있어서 사진 찍는 재미도 쏠쏠했고요. 아침에 먹는 반미도 정말 맛있어서 하루를 기분 좋게 시작할 수 있었어요. 바쁜 일상에서 벗어나 여유를 즐기기에 정말 딱 좋은 곳이었습니다. 호이안의 매력을 제대로 느낄 수 있는 숙소였어요

spent the most aesthetic and peaceful couple days at pham's bnb, hosts were all so friendly and helped handle our bags in between check in and check out times with care :) kittens were soso cute too! would definitely visit again

Didn't expected a homestay to be this peaceful and beautiful. will definitely comeback soon! recommend to my friends as well since this is really a must if you will visit hoi an. love the breakfast, the ambiance and the friendly host.

This stay has been the best experience of our life, from the wonderful breakfast, the daily swim, the immersive nature and the wonderful staff. Everything about little pie hoi an has been a magical experience, truly almost like we are in a beautiful ghibli movie.
We truly appreciate the attention to care and detail and hope this place will exist forever.
You guys made our stay perfect!
With lots of love,
Binh and Momo
小而美的法式復古風民宿，我們在這裡受到了良好的招待，離會安古鎮雖然有一段距離，但非常幽靜，整體很不錯，可惜入住當天天氣太冷，沒享受到游泳池～

Little pie hoi an is the place that i follow on IG for 2 years and wish to stay here someday and my dream comes true , I really happy all the time during i stay here , I cooked some thai and akha food for them to try , we have a great time together , soooo happy to be here , I love here already :))) the homestay is very cute !! 💛

ホイアン滞在の際に利用しました。
ロケーションやホストの対応含めて全てが最高の時間でした。
時間来る際にも利用したいです。
In love with the vibe so much! Although we arrived very late night, but the host still kindly welcome us 😊 We can feel hospitality and warmth in this place. I hope I will come back here soon!❤️
Charming, cozy, and full of character, the Little Pie House is a true hidden gem. Every detail feels thoughtful, making it the perfect escape for a peaceful and memorable stay.
정말 아름답고 기분좋은 숙소였습니다. 이 숙소는 제가 호이안에 방문하게된 이유였어요. 기대한 것 이상으로 만족했습니다. 아침에 수영하고 맛있는 조식을 먹는 순간이 가장 기억에 남네요.살다가 지칠 때 또 방문하겠습니다. 감사합니다.

とても素敵な空間でした。
朝食もとても美味しかったです。
ありがとうございました。

The days I have stayed here was a really wonderful experience I have had ever. I couldn’t wait for getting up in the morning and eating their breakfast as well. It was raining when I stayed there, but it still made me feel so comfortable. The room was clean and well organized, the host was all kind and gentle, and their communication was very good. It's a wonderful place that makes you feel like you're going home when you come back from Hoi An. It became such a place that I would definitely like to come back soon!

Great experience!
The decoration is awesome!
But there was no bathtub in my room even though bathtub is listed in ammenaty.

チェックインの時間も柔軟に対応してくださったり、タクシーの手配やウェルカムドリンクも提供してくださり、とても親切で素敵なところでした。
ホイアンに行った際はぜひまた利用したいです。

民宿很漂亮，不管是环境还是装修的细节都很让人心动，不敢想象每天住在这里该有多么幸福。
最让我意外的是民宿的位置其实是一个当地的村子里，周围是村里的民居和菜地，在这里grab bike去会安古镇也很近，民宿里的工作人员都比较内向的样子，不是那种很热情很主动的跟客人寒暄的类型，对我这种内向的人来说反而感觉很舒适😋 早上的早餐特别好吃，而且餐具也很精致漂亮。唯一的遗憾是我入住的那天下了雨，天也冷，院子里那么漂亮的游泳池我没能游一游，如果以后还有机会来，我一定要在那个漂亮的泳池里游泳😌
love this place, i'll be back for sure
너무 예쁜 숙소~또 오고 싶어요!!
Everything is perfect🙂👍

reviewer.firstName: ⁨นรินทร์ทิพย์⁩

reviews.comments: เป็นที่พักที่ทำให้ฉันอยากมาเที่ยวที่เวียดนามบรรยากาศดี สวยมาก
This is the best Airbnb experience I’ve ever had. They were so nice, house very cleanly and breakfast really great. I will come back in future for sure.
lovely place with amazing decoration, the hosts responded to our questions timely and provided thoughtful services
nice

What a fantastic find! The house is even more beautiful than the pictures, with a truly thoughtful design. We loved the stylish decor and found the location to be perfect for exploring the area. The host was also great to communicate with. We would definitely stay here again.

Hieu was super helpful and accomodating during our time in Hoi An which we really appreciated. The property was lovely, clean and well-kept. We also loved the front patio. Hieu also was super helpful in organising fairly priced airport transfers.

OBSSESSED!!! The only word for this place. Not only you have a place feel like home but also feel luxury, but the owner also provide you an assistance that would help you with plan visiting Hoi An. They would help you from picking you up from the airport to help you booking tours and places you wanna experience in Hoi An! Never have seen and experience such a service like that! Trust me, with this reasonable price, you will get more than what you expected!

A beautiful and comfortable stay just a short walk away from the beach! The interior design was perfect and made the stay even more enjoyable. Great communication and help with recommendations from the owner. Would stay again in a heartbeat!

The place was private and exactly as described, and it turned out to be even more spacious than we expected. Hieu was wonderful to communicate with and kindly arranged a car to the airport for us when we checked out, which made everything so easy.
4 beds와 2 restrooms이 필요하신 가족 분들은 위층 (Pine Beach)와 아래층 (Indochine)을 전부 예약하시면 전체 하우스를 렌트하실 수 있습니다. 저희는 3 가족 (총 7명) 모두 불편함 없이 편한하게 쉬었습니다.
Peaceful fishing village vibe. Accessible to cafes and bars, quite a private location as it sits in a small alley. 2 minutes walk to An Bang beach. We love out stay here x

A beautiful and exceptionally clean and stylish ground floor apartment in An Bang.  It’s a great area as 3 mins walk to the beach and plenty of restaurants around but it’s down a quiet and peaceful path. The host and the team who look after the place were really helpful and maintained the place to a very high standard. We were there for 5 weeks and they offered complimentary weekly cleaning which was a delight. I can’t recommend the place enough

I had a really lovely stay at this homestay — everything from the check-in experience to the cozy decor and cleanliness was on point. The atmosphere was peaceful, the hosts were kind, and the location couldn’t be more convenient. Definitely felt like a home away from home.
The only thing that held me back from giving a full 5 stars was the blanket — it felt a bit… underdressed? 😅 Almost like it forgot to show up with its stuffing. A fluffier one would’ve made those chilly nights 10/10!
But overall, I would totally come back and recommend it to friends. With just a little upgrade in blanket department, this place would be chef’s kiss. 💫
Has a great experience for the whole stay. We's started planning for our next stay already.
투베드가 필요하신 가족 분들에게는 아주 좋은 옵션입니다.
Very clean house and super helpful host. Would highly recommend this place to stay in
Great stay, amazing location, house was very nice and very clean, host was so helpful with everything!

Apartment integrating with excellent taste and style, everything is as described, nice location at a small lane meanwhile one could easily reach nice cafes, restaurants, spa and mini market. Very nice village with the right size that one could enjoy the beach and find everything needed, meanwhile being authentic. It felt very safe as well.
We are a family traveling with a 4 months old baby, the host was kind enough to set up a baby crib in the room.
The apartment is nicely constructed, everything functions very well. Some small issues were resolved very fast by the concierge lady Thuong proactively.
We’d love to stay there again during our next holiday in Hoi An. And we’d love to spend holiday at the village around An Bang beach again.

This place is a beautiful new apartment, with such nice design. The art, the colours, the location. My friend and I shared for a week, during a nomad festival that was held locally. The area was so quiet and a nice sanctuary to go back to after long days. Only a couple of minutes to walk to the beach. Plenty of food options (hit up Thom’s Sourdough!) and it’s a very walkable area with chill vibe.
Despite it being a new apartment, there isn’t an exhaust fan in the small bathroom, so it ends up like a steam room and gets really wet. The humidity of Hoi A picked up this week as well and it was evident by the end of the week that there was mould spores. We had mould growing on a few of our belongings, so hopefully they are able to get on top of this.
Thuong was really easy to communicate with and was proactive with this.
Overall, we loved our stay and wished we could have stayed longer. Would stay there again if they address the potential mould issue.
Perfect stay.
Very nice place
Phòng rộng rãi, sạch sẽ mà giá phải chăng, có dịp sẽ quay lại ạ.

Nguyen was a very great host.  She responded quickly to any questions I had, and was patient with me.  As for the room, it looks exactly like the images provided.  It looked and felt very clean, I would recommend this spot to any solo traveler or couple

The house is really modern and good, just some small issues.
As written from the listing, there is car noise from the motorway.
The owner is responsible and available for everything.
The complex it is outside the city, so every time would require rent motorbike or grab.
Chỗ ở sạch đẹp, dễ tìm
very happy with this accommodation, great area though you do need transport, taxi's or motorbike. highly recommend, I would stay there again and again. See you next year!
highly rcm

We had such a lovely stay – thank you for being a warm, thoughtful, and responsive host. The apartment was clean, well-equipped, and in a great location, but what made the experience truly special was your kindness and hospitality. We felt very welcomed and at ease throughout our stay. Wishing you all the best, and we hope to return one day!

Linh is great! She welcomed us and recommended a lot of activities to do.
Beds are comfortable, there are two rooms separated by a wardrobe, you can heard everything from the other room.
Drain in the bathroom is not great
Overall it was ok for us for a couple of days.

The hosts were very helpful and let us know about upcoming events in the area and gave us recommendations. It was convenient that they had large bottles of purified water that we could use for around $1 USD each and the location is close to a convenience store.
返信も早く、困ったことがあるとすぐに助けてくれました。安心して滞在できる場所です🙌海にも近く、何度もビーチに遊びに行きました！おすすめします！

It was an absolute pleasure staying here! From the moment I arrived, the host provided a very warm welcome and was incredibly supportive throughout my stay. Any questions I had were answered with a quick response, which was so helpful. The room itself was neat and tidy, providing a comfortable space to relax after a long day of exploring. The location was also fantastic – it was easy to get around and explore the local area. I would highly recommend this Airbnb to anyone looking for a comfortable and convenient stay with a wonderful host!
Căn hộ gần trung tâm tiện di chuyển

Van Binh and his sister were very welcoming and responded quickly to messages. The apartment in general is worth the money. The air conditioner works well. The rooms are separated by a wardrobe, so be prepared for the fact that everything will be easily heard.
Chỗ ở rộng rãi, sạch sẽ, chủ nhà rất thân thiện và hỗ trợ nhanh chóng. Sẽ giới thiệu cho bạn bè.
Một căn hộ tuyệt vời. Không gian yên tĩnh, thoáng mát và cực kì sạch sẽ, internet tốc độ cao.Xứng đáng để mọi người trải nghiệm khi thuê phòng.
ローカルとしてその地域に滞在しているかのような平穏さと便利さがあります。徒歩30秒でコンビニに着くのはとても便利でありがたいです。ホストの問い合わせ対応もとても早いです。
Mọi người rất thân thiện và cởi mở. Lần sau mình sẽ ghé lại. ❤️

Aurora and the team were fantastic hosts — incredibly responsive and attentive throughout our entire stay. Any minor issues that came up were addressed almost immediately, which made us feel really well looked after.
Great location - right across the street from a gym, walking distance to several fantastic cafés, and in a generally peaceful area. The dryer in the building was a huge bonus for us and made our stay even more convenient.
The apartment was very clean when we arrived — the cleaners did an excellent job. While it wasn’t quite as polished as the photos made it look, it was still comfortable, well-kept, and excellent value for money. The walls are a bit thin, but the building itself is usually quiet and has a relaxed, friendly atmosphere.
Overall, a great stay, wonderful value, and we’d happily book again!
The hosts were really helpful and accommodating. The place was clean and close to the beach.

It was our first time in DaNang and after much consideration, we book Linh's Airbnb.
It was a big place, you could fit more people in it but I respect that they're limiting it to 4. You have two bedrooms, one is so big you can literally dance around it. The place is clean, worth the price and comfortable.
It's also near Bac My An Market where avocado ice cream was sold and a lot of commodities. Literally just 10 steps away was a 24/7 convenience store, and 2 blocks away is a pharmacy and also sense coffee which we had to visit 3x because their mousakka was so good, we literally ate it 3 days straight (and the pizza + coffee)
We will recommend them to our friends and everyone who's going to ask about a nice place to stay.

Great spacious apartment for its budget!
Super useful recommendations from the host! Thank you 👍

We had a fantastic stay at this staycation house! From the moment we arrived, the owner was incredibly welcoming and made sure we felt right at home by assisting us to self check-in. It’s clear that they genuinely care about their guests and take pride in providing good service.
The place is spacious and well-maintained, offering spacious of room to relax and room around, If you come in a group of 10 but booked only for 4, you can do that you just have to ask for extra matres. The amenities comes as what has been written in the list like free drinking water, hot bath, washing area– everything you could possibly need is right there. Whether it’s the fully-equipped kitchen, fast Wi-Fi, cozy lounge with balcony area, everything exceeded my expectations.
We also appreciated how clean and comfortable the rooms were, making it easy to enjoy my time there. The location is also convenient.
Overall, we would high-recommend this place to anyone looking for a relaxing and hassle-free stay.

Staying at this place was a wonderful experience! Not only the home was cozy and well-maintained, but the Host went above and beyond to ensure we had everything we needed. Their local recommendations were great, and check-in/check-out was seamless.

This is a great apartment – spacious, comfortable, and well-equipped!
It’s the best we could find for our budget.
The location is 20 minutes from the beach and the center – unfortunately, there is not much to do and visit here. There is a construction work around, it is quite noisy, with barking dogs and screaming roosters.
But the host made everything they could to make our stay perfect – super responsive and hospitable. All or requests were served in no time.

All good. There was an issue with the cold water, which was beyond the host's control but was promptly solved. They moved us to another location that was really nice. The host was attentive. I highly recommend booking with them. Thank you!
Bra boende, rekommenderas starkt om man vill ha en fräsch lägenhet att bo i! Boendet är lite utanför stan så var medveten om det vid bokning men värden är super hjälpsam.
Great hospitality
That was great experience staying with the accommodation in Da Nang. With their helps, we got enjoyed staying there. Thank you!
Easy communication and spacious accommodations. Thanks!
友好、便利、周到。

It’s a great location on the main street, right in the heart of Danang, near Dragon Bridge (so it is noisy in the daytime because of the vehicles). The room is spacious, the bed is comfy. The host is friendly and helpful.

I had a fantastic stay at this place! The space was spotless and exactly as described in the listing.
The location is perfect—just a 5-minute walk from downtown and close to great restaurants. Sarah was an excellent host, responding quickly to any questions. I’d definitely stay here again!
Location was great and communication with the host was very good

Tôi vừa có trải nghiệm tuyệt vời tại một homestay dạng biệt thự sân vườn gần gũi với thiên nhiên. Không gian rộng rãi, yên tĩnh, được bao quanh bởi cây xanh và hoa cỏ tạo cảm giác thư giãn, dễ chịu. Phòng sạch sẽ, đầy đủ tiện nghi, được chăm chút tỉ mỉ. Chủ nhà thân thiện, chu đáo và luôn sẵn sàng hỗ trợ khi cần. Mỗi sáng thức dậy giữa thiên nhiên trong lành là một điều thật đáng quý. Đây chắc chắn là một nơi lý tưởng để nghỉ dưỡng, tạm rời xa thành phố ồn ào. Rất mong có dịp quay lại!

It’s a beautiful oasis not far from the beach and Hoi an- highly recommend this place to relax and get away from the hustle of the cities. Great outdoor area including hot tub. Nature and water, calm besides other tenants and a bit of laughter from the pool area. Security guards on the property, feels very safe for a solo traveler.

The place was super clean and exactly like the photos, no surprises. The environment was peaceful and quiet, which made it perfect for relaxing. Very comfortable overall. Would definitely stay here again!
Absolutely beautiful, the place is stunning. Cannot recommend enough. Location wise you’ll need a motorbike to get around. Interior is amazing and it’s so nice to have a jacuzzi on the terrace!

This was probably one of my favorite Airbnb's I ever stayed in.  It was clean, modern, and details at every corner.  It was a very special stay and I would recommend this home to anyone in the Hoi An area.
강을 바라보며 쉴 수 있어 정말 행복했습니다. 사진보다 훨씬 넓고 깔끔했고 특히 해가 질 때랑 해가 뜰 때 멋진 뷰를 볼 수 있었습니다😍😍 호스트는 엄청 친절하시고 빠르게 응대해주셨어요~ 다만 강 근처라 그런지 작은 음식 부스러기라도 떨어져 있으면 개미가 생겼습니다 😭😭 그래도 그냥 개미 죽이고 잘 쉬었어요 ㅎㅎㅎㅎ

밤에 모기가 있으니 모기 퇴치제 휴대 하세요 그외 식당은 근처에 있으나 손님이 없고 그다지 추천 드리고 싶지 않습니다
이틀동안 한끼를 제외하고 그랩으로 주문해서 먹었습니다
베란다에는 앞동의 빌라와 마주 보고 있어 사생활이 보장 안됩니다
비교적 가성비 대비 만족합니다

100% recommend this place! It’s way bigger and more comfortable than I expected. The vibe is a perfect blend of peaceful countryside and upscale resort. Super secure too—gated with a guard and outposts around the property.
There’s a jacuzzi (I think), but one of the valves was missing so I couldn’t get it working as a jacuzzi. Still used it as a nice tub though. Honestly, the place is already a solid 10, but a working jacuzzi after a long day exploring Old Town Hoi An would’ve made it a 100 lol.

Amazing haven located by the river with lots of greenery, we spent amazing and relaxing time. Quiet, close to nature, everything is new in the apartment, it was a great choice to stay in Thanh’s place

I cant wait to stay again in this place. It’s so beautifully designed and appointed and more luxurious than most five star resorts. The hosts are amazing people and they have added so many thoughtful touches everywhere. The surroundings are absolutely beautiful and contributed even more to an absolutely heavenly stay. I can’t recommend it enough!
Very good apartment. Really clean and cozy. Really recommend this place for a nice get away.

Een onwijs fijn verblijf gehad! Het appartement is helemaal nieuw, groot, en heeft bijna alles wat je nodig hebt, en dat allemaal voor eem kleine prijs.
Het contact was ook heel fijn, bij elke vraag was er binnen een korte tijd antwoord en van te voren kreeg je genoeg informatie voor de incheck.
Ook mochten we zelfs langer blijven dan de oorspronkelijke uitchecktijd was.
De hottub is echt geweldig.
En tot slot is het niet midden in de Old Town, maar dat is juist lekker rustig. Je bent binnen 10/15 minuten met een taxi daar voor heel weinig geld.

The apartment is newly constructed and the images are a true representation of its current condition. The furniture is of a high standard and the view from the terrace is excellent. Overall, I would have no hesitation in recommending this accommodation.
alles super! Tolle Unterkunft! Strand & Altstadt jeweils in 10 Minuten mit dem Grab/Taxi zu erreichen.
Great place to stay recommend to anyone
I loved this stay and will keep coming back! ☺️ The hosts are extremely helpful and responsive. Highly recommend this stay!
Simply amazing.
Chỗ ở rất tuyệt vời, thuận tiện khi đi nhiều nơi gần đó. Tôi đã ở đây vài lần cảm giác lúc nào cũng muốn quay lại.

I recently enjoyed staying at this wonderful home again, and I can’t recommend it enough! From the moment I arrived, I was impressed by the beautiful décor and the cozy atmosphere. Quynh was friendly and helpful throughout my stay. The price is reasonable, making this place suitable for both family vacations and trips with friends.

We were flying out of DaNang and Quynh’s place couldn’t have worked out better. So close to the airport (walkable even with luggage). The place was huge and spotlessly clean.
It was the perfect place for downtime before our flight… with a key board and a guitar that our teenage daughters enjoyed playing. There was also a great bahn mi stall right in front of the gate, perfect for a quick snack!
Next time we are in Da Nang, we hope to stay longer.
Wonderful host and a great house, with beautiful furniture, great appliances, close to everything in Da Nang. Mrs. Quynh was very helpful in my medical emergency. I highly recommend this place.
Had a great stay! The place was super clean and well-maintained. What really stood out was the unique architecture of the house — it gave the space so much character. Highly recommend!
Close to the airport, but didn’t had any problems with the noise. The house was beautiful and clean! Really enjoyed the place with my friends. Communication was also great!

Quynh couldn’t have been a better host!  We loved our stay and would definitely be interested in returning on subsequent visits to Da Nang.  Beautifully-designed property, super layout, great location…with musical instruments as a delightful bonus.
The place is literally walking distance from the airport. And the host was super helpful too. We had an early morning flight and she was really helpful in accommodating us.

Very convenient place very close to airport
Away from the hustle and bustle of the big city
Home is very neatly done and kept very clean. The host is very prompt in answering your questions

Loved our stay at the property!
It was really close to the airport and was convenient to travel around Da Nang.
The property was very comfortable and we felt right at home.
Highly recommend.
Quynh was very accommodating with our need to store our luggage for a late flight as well as allowing us to check in early because the previous guests had checked out early.

I had an incredible stay at Quynh’s place! The house was spotless, beautifully designed, and had everything I needed for a comfortable stay. The location was perfect—close to the airport, and main attractions in Da Nang.
Quynh was an amazing host, always responsive and helpful. The check-in process was smooth, and the apartment felt like a home away from home.
I highly recommend this place to anyone visiting Da Nang, and I would definitely stay here again!😇

We stayed at this charming bungalow and had a mixed experience. The host was very responsive and helpful, which truly stood out.
However, several issues affected our comfort.
1. The ground floor toilet's flush tank didn’t work.
2. We were greeted by black ants on arrival. A dead cockroach was found in the bedroom, pointing to the need for pest control—tropical climate shouldn't be the only excuse.
3. Bedroom AC units cooled slowly, and without a centralized system, the living room became too hot to enjoy.
4. A dressing mirror is missing in the upper bedroom; the small one in the bathroom isn't adequate.
5. Musical instruments add a lovely vibe, but the heat makes it hard to enjoy them for long.
The property has great potential with its spacious layout and creative touches. With better attention to maintenance and cooling, it could easily become one of the more comfortable and enjoyable stays nearest to Airport area. Close proximity to Airport is a big plus. Thankyou 😊
The home was clean, cozy, and well-equipped. The host was very responsive and helpful, making our stay easy and comfortable
Absolutely stunning place to stay, very peaceful, host was kind and friendly. Only my second place I have stayed on Airbnb and very impressed so far.
特别精致是一套别墅，里面有钢琴，架子鼓和吉他，厨房用品一应俱全，一楼一个干净的房间和卫生间，二楼是另一个房间带卫生间，三楼是露台可以晒衣服，客厅挑高很宽敞，布局合理，房东热血提供建议，为我们提供了足够的饮用水，洗浴用品，门口的热狗非常好吃，周围有餐厅和超市非常便捷，而且在主干道上，距离机场很近，我非常喜欢这套别墅，希望自己也有一套这样的别墅

In overall, I would definitely recommend everyone to stay here, mainly due to:
1. The owner is superbly responsive, polite and welcoming.
2. Aesthetic layout.
3.location wise, very strategic. 5 mins from Danang airport and got few cafes nearby.
Cons:
1. No aircond in the living hall. Probably Quynh can consider to install air conditioner.
