Quynh was the best host I ever meet. She support us everything we need. The house were good take care, bedsheet clean, toilet clean, kitchen clean. Location nearby airport. Feel like home when I stay here, center area but peace inside.  I highly recommend to all guest.

Wao.. its too beautiful one of the best place I visited yet.. its just mismerising .
Perfect. Everything is just so perfect every corner of the place is designed and cute.
Huge space. And the most important thing is that music instruments that kept there was just amazing we had a great time at place. Thanks for giving us such a wonderful experience. Will surely visit this place next time. Hoping to keep remains same. ❤️❤️❤️🇻🇳🇻🇳

Great place for our stay, it’s not even 5 mins from the airport. Spacious with full amenities. The host was very responsive and gave us recommendations on a great tour company. She even offered late checkout free of charge so it was great. Definitely recommend.

Chị chủ siêu nhiệt tình với trợ giúp bọn mình khi tới ở rất nhiều ❣️ Nhà đẹp, tiện nghi, gần sân bay,  nhìn chung sạch sẽ,  trước nhà có quán bánh mì ngon mà rẻ xỉu ( recommend mọi người ăn thử nha ).  Sẽ ghé lại home nếu có dịp vào Đà Nẵng lần nữa 🫶🏻

Responsive host even at midnight
Nice set-up
Impress by the architectural design
Looks like your in rural area even at the heart of city
Also near airport
Solid selection for a group of 4. It’s right outside the air port when you need somewhere quick to sleep. A beautiful home that has a traditional yet modern feel.

공항에서 도보로 10분 걸려요! 한시장도 그랩 타고 10분거리라 위치 좋은것 같습니다.
집주인분께서 친절하시고 물도 준비해주셔서 좋아요. 도마뱀이랑 벌레가 가끔 나오는데 주택이라 감안하셔야될것같아요~ 칫솔,치약,샴푸,바디워시는 있는데 린스가 없어요!! 챙겨오세요

Everything was wonderful. Host was available within minutes every time I messaged. Bungalows were so adorable. Pool was cold, kitchen was stocked well. Beers and cold water in fridge. Extra shower, every bungalow had private bath and only 5 bungalows kept it so quiet and private. Everything was amazing, several beaches nearby. AC got nice and cold.

The host was so responsive, and always happy to help. Was so friendly and was always happy to give recommendations and here about our stay😊
They were also really great with our check in, as they allowed us to come slightly earlier as we’d just got off a sleeper bus all the way from Ninh Binh! So definitely appreciated their hospitality🫶

Our stay was very nice! The houses of cocohut are really very cute and romantic. It is recommended to rent a scooter, because cocohut is located in a quiet neighborhood where construction is still going on. Certainly in the low season there are a few less facilities than in the rest of Hoi An. But with the scooter / grab you are everywhere. And the host helps very nicely with arranging everything. We got a nice small scooter for rent via Johana that tourists can also ride well ;) Our laundry was done very quickly. And Johana is also a very friendly sweet host!

This was a nice place to stay, looks as the photos show. If you have a lot of things, there is little room for it all. It is a little far from old town but only a 5-10 minute drive. There is a building behind the Coconut hut that is rather loud at night time so keep this in mind if you want to go to bed at a decent time. The host was communicative and nice.

It was an amazing experience staying in the eco huts. Very innovative and beautiful. The host was extremely warm and helpful at all times. She helped out with everything proactively. The location is very peaceful. The beach and amazing restaurants are at a walkable distance. We had a very comfortable stay. 🌸

Unique little homestay if wanting a nice place to relax near the beach! John is always very responsive and eager to check in making sure everything is ok. There are some restaurants and bars nearby and a little shop so everything you need for a couple days.

本当に本当におすすめです！体調が悪くなったのですが、薬を届けてくれたり、
チェックアウト時間を伸ばしてくれたり、薬局やスーパーを教えてくれたり、とても丁寧に色んな対応をしてくださった。本当にありがとうございました！みんな泊まった方がいい！！！旧市街までバイクで10分の距離で、宿の周りも散歩すると楽しいし、宿のプールも綺麗で、泊まってる人たちも話しやすくて、楽しいコミュニケーションをとることが出来た！みんなにおすすめしたいです！！！！ぜひ！！！

très fidèle aux photos, l'espace est magnifique et paisible et les hôtes adorables, toujours disponibles et prêts à vous aider...
les logements sont des petits cocons très agréable, impeccables à l'arrivée et tous les services sont compris (linge, scooter, etc....)
merci encore à john et johanna pour ce magnifique et doux séjour !

Nous avons passé un excellent séjour.
Les huttes sont très bien agencées avec un lit très spacieux sur la mezzanine.
Il y a également de très belles plages à proximité et une très belle nature.
Les hôtes sont très réactifs et d’une grande gentillesse.
Au final, je n’ai que du bien à dire de ce logement, calme et relaxation garantie 😊

Le logement proposé par Johanna et John comme sur les photos, est juste sublime. Il y a tout ce dont on pourrait avoir besoin pour un séjour inoubliable. De plus Johanna a su se montrer très disponible et toujours aux petits soins afin que nous ne manquions de rien. Je recommande à qui passe à Hoi An de séjourner à Cocohut Homestay sans hésiter !

This was truly one of the best air bnbs we’ve ever staying in. The host was incredibly helpful and responded to all our questions within minutes. The check in was simple and went as smoothly as it could’ve gone. Johanna didn’t hesitate to help us with anything we needed and was always friendly and welcoming. Only thing that wasn’t great was that the neighbors seem to be very fond of karaoke but that’s got nothing to do with the air bnb itself. Overall this is a really great deal and I recommend it wholeheartedly.

Honestly this place is gorgeous!! Such a good way to spend a first night here. A lot of love has been put into this place, that much is clear.
I would recommend staying here, it's cozy, cute, peaceful and the pool is a massive bonus in this heat!

The huts were a beautiful place to stay and relax. The host was extremely helpful with suggestions on activities in the nearby areas - even going so far as to help booking various guides !
Would recommend!

Es un lugar muy tranquilo, rodeado de plantas. La cocina está equipada con lo necesario. La piscina está muy limpia. Las cabañas son muy bonitas, pero algo pequeñas. La escalera para subir a la cama es empinada, lo que dificulta el acceso. La cama es muy cómoda.
Johana siempre estaba disponible para ayudarnos y resolver nuestras consultas.

One of the most authentic local experiences I had in Hoi An. The hut was so cute and peacefully located near the beach. John and the team recommended a day trip to Cham Island, and it was fabulous. You shouldn’t miss this place if you’re looking for peace and a taste of local life.

Comfortable stay! Location is great and close to the beach. They helped us with scooter rental and laundry. Very effective at that. Super easy to check in by yourself. Overall a lovely experience and an amazing host. 5 stars ⭐️

A peaceful oasis located 5 mins from the beach & tucked away from the business of Hoi An. I loved this stay and would recommend it to anyone! The eco huts are beautifully designed and bigger than I expected! I loved the loft bedroom, with aircon above the bed to stay cool. The bed was the comfiest bed I’ve had in all my travels! Beautiful pool surrounded by many plants. The hosts were responsive and very kind - even helped me when I needed to go to the hospital. Thank you so much!

I have no words for how beautiful Cocohut was. Surrounded by beautiful trees and plants. Exactly as described, AC in the huts and perfect cozy space for 2 people. We rented motorbikes and in 10 mins you are in the heart of hoi an town. 1 min drive to closest beach. Couldn’t ask for more. Would 100% recommend and come back :)
Thank you!
I had a really cozy stay in the hut. The pool was nice and close to the ocean. City Center with bike or motorbike like 15min away. But I came to chill and for that it was perfect. Highly recommend

Le cadre est magnifique malgré qu’il soit étroit entre les logements. La chaleur dans les cabanes 🥵
Le logement se situe à 15min du centre-ville de Hanoï et en bord de mer

L'hébergement est insolite.
Ce n'est toutefois pas le lieu idéal pour se reposer car très bruyant du fait du quartier. Il n'y a personne sur place, il faut bien demander à l'avance les recommandations et process.

Nous n’avons passé qu’une seule nuit mais nous ne l’oublierons certainement pas !
L’arrivée était très flexible et autonome, parfait pour nous, le logement était vraiment agréable et très cosy. Nous avons pu prendre un bain dans la piscine fraîche avant d’aller nous coucher.
Le matin le lever de soleil était magnifique, le cadre est idyllique.
John et Johanna étaient extrêmement réactifs et à l’écoute !
Merci pour ce séjour et ces recommandations !

Zeer fijn verblijf gehad in deze unieke oase van rust. Ideaal om het drukke centrum van Hoi An even achter je te laten. Super lieve hosts. Ze vragen dagelijks hoe het met je gaat en doen er alles aan om je helemaal thuis te laten voelen.

I really enjoyed the unique and fun experience of this stay! It definitely lived up to expectations—sweet, quirky, and very cool overall. The design was charming and made for a memorable stay.
That said, it's worth noting that the walls are quite thin, so you can hear a lot of noise from outside and from neighboring huts. The space is also pretty tight, which can feel a bit claustrophobic, so I’d only recommend it for a short stay.
The host was very responsive and made the whole process smooth and pleasant. If you’re looking for something different and don't mind close quarters or a bit of outside noise, it’s a great pick!

Một Đà Nẵng trọn vẹn nơi đây, với những chuyến đi Healing thực sự.
Có những bữa cơm gia đình dành cho những người thích nấu nướng. Rất gần chợ và hoa quả ngon rẻ với dân Raw Vegan.
Không gian mở, gần thiên nhiên, host thân thiện gần gũi.
Một tuần thấy vẫn thiếu có lẽ ở một tháng mới đủ.
Còn duyên hẹn gặp lại!!
P/s: Cho mình gửi lời chúc sức khỏe tới bác gái nhé. Bác rất tuyệt vời.

thật là 1 nơi đáng để nghỉ lại! nó vô cùng yên tĩnh, không khí thoáng mát, nơi ở sạch sẽ, chủ nhà vô cùng thân thiện và luôn giúp đỡ khi có yêu cầu. và điều đặc biệt chỉ mất khoảng 12 - 15 phút chạy xe là ra bãi biển và vào trung tâm thành phố. Nếu có dịp nơi này sẽ là ưu tiên số 1 để chọn khi đến Đà Nẵng
房东一家人非常的热心，房子也非常非常非常非常的漂亮！！！简直就是我的梦中情房！！！每天在这样的屋子里醒来真的很放松很开心～房东还赠送了入住饮品，水果，给了旅行建议，还可以和房东租电车，不用去外面租非常方便。下次来岘港我还住这里🥰🥰🥰🥰
虽然没有入住，但真的是我的梦中情房，和房主的沟通也很开心，下次来岘港，一下飞机就直冲过去，大家千万不要错过，相信我，非常值得
房源非常漂亮，很温馨，在一栋当地人的别墅，主人一家人都非常友好，有欢迎饮品，如果想深入体验当地人的生活，这是很好的选择
Tuyệt
是我第二次入住了 他们很热情 房间也很干净 房间周围环境很漂亮 很喜欢坐在阳台看外面风景

Cicada was incredibly kind, responsive, and understanding from the very beginning. She went above and beyond to assist me and showed great hospitality. I truly appreciate her support and hope to stay at her place next time. Highly recommended host!
Super friendly host, nice peaceful location with a very comfy bed everything was great!
Nhà mới, sạch sẽ, tiện nghi, host suppot nhiệt tình, rất phù hợp với gia đình 4 người. Sẽ quay lại nếu có cơ hội

3박 동안 머물면서 불편했던 점 하나 없이 다낭에서 정말 편하게 지내다 갈 수 있게 해주셨어요!
요청사항이 있으면 답도 빠르게 피드백 해주시고, 모두 친절하게 대해주셔서 감사했습니다. 늦은 밤에 이루어진 체크인에도 친절히 알려주시고, 체크아웃 후 짐 보관도 도와주셔서 다낭 여행이 정말 편했습니다!
경비원?분들이 상주하고 계셔서 숙소도 정말 안전하고, 너무 깨끗하고 넓은 곳이였어요! 그리고 더운 다낭 날씨에 에어컨이 정말 정말 시원하여 잠도 푹 잘 수 있었습니다! 숙소를 오가며 지나갈때 인사도 해주시고 감사하게도 많이 무거우셨을텐데 짐도 옮겨주셨습니다!
다음에 다낭에 오게 된다면 여기를 꼭 이용할거에요~~
공항 옆이라 조금 시끄러우면 어떡하지 걱정했었는데 걱정할 필요없이 조용하고 좋았습니다! 다낭 시내랑도 엄청 가깝고 위치가 좋았어요~!
수건 교체 그리고 쓰레기도 잘 배출해주시고 청소도 잘해주시는 곳입니다! 귀중품도 안전하게 숙소에 믿고 두고 갈 수 있었던 숙소였습니다! 감사합니다.

여기는 일단 신축입니다 신축인거에 말다한거같네요..
그렇기때문에 너무 깨끗하고 시설이 좋구요.
매일마다 낮에 외출시
호텔처럼 청소 및 침구정리 및 일용품들을 계속 체크해주십니다.
또한 여행기간중 에어비엔비로 Q&A 소통도 굉장히 답변이 빠르고 24시간마다 체크해주시는것 같아요.
첫 베트남여행 아주 만족스러웠습니다.
다음에 또 기회가되면 방문할게요 ㅎㅎ 재방문의사 1000% 입니다! 감사합니다

Extremely happy with flawless service, very responsive and amazing apartment.
3 min from airport but no disturbance of the flight flying.
I must say the view was stunning..
definitely coming back with family to stay one more time.
다른 모든것은 좋았습니다. 호스트분도 매우 친절했습니다. 단 개미가 좀 있어요. 그것만 해결된다면 매우 좋은 숙소입니다.
This is very impressive and clean apartment. Beautiful view, good vibe and full all mordern conveniences that I need. Highly recommended!! I’ll definitely choose this place again when I’m back! 💎
We loved this property a lot! Super cute and cozy. Very close to the airport so makes travelling easy.
we like this place, and extended more and more. The host was helpful,  help us with earlier check in, and everything that we needed.  very good service and communication.
Số 1 Đà Nẵng
Amazing host. Fast replies and very helpful. Would definitely go back to this airbnb or others owned by them. Super pleased with the stay and how lovely the apartment was. Would definitely recommend
Equipped with a stunning view of the city and Son Tra Mountain, this property is a rare find if you are looking for luxury accommodation for your family vacation.
Really spacious and cozy apartment. It is very clean and tidy, really a bargain in Danang.
很喜歡入口的保安大哥貼心引導，每次回來也都會打招呼，確實很有家的感覺
We enjoyed every moment in Da Nang, The apartment was 5 minutes away from the airport and 25 minutes walking to the Dragon bridge.

Perfect experience!
We were picked up at the airport with a name sign and a private driver — a very thoughtful touch, especially considering the apartment is close to the airport.
The location is convenient and everything is nearby. Inside, it was incredibly clean with beautiful interior design and quality shower products.
The hosts were extremely attentive and fulfilled all our requests, including extra dishes, drinking water, and even laundry capsules — all provided promptly.
Cleaning was flawless — truly hotel-level quality.
If you’re looking for comfort and genuine care, this is definitely a place worth coming back to!

It's hard finding a spacious place in Da Nang that actually matches the photos. We had a string of bad experiences on Airbnb with other listings in Da Nang but this one was very good. The host was communicative and fixed issues (both bathroom shower drains did not drain properly over multiple days) when we told them. There is a distinctive sewer smell that comes from the drains at random times during the day and night but this is to be expected in the cities where there is no sewer gas cover. We closed the bathroom doors and it was fine. High reccomend this place if you're working remotely or need some room to space out. The location was far from beach / better areas of town but you can easily rent a scooter or get a Grab cheaply.

الشقة افضل من الصور انها جميلة جدااا ومريحة وجديدة وصاحب الشقة لطيف جدا ومتعاون
قصياً وقت ممتع في الشقة
ساكرر السكن هنا
اشكر كل الطاقم اللطيفين

Một nơi nghĩ dưỡng thật yên bình. Tôi gần như giải toả mọi căng thẳng để hoà mình vào thiên nhiên. Mọi thứ rất sạch sẽ, ngăn nắp. Chủ nhà chu đáo, họ đã chủ động liên hệ riêng tôi để hướng dẫn và gọi ý vài địa điểm đi chơi, quán ăn địa phương. Hẹn một ngày không xa, có dịp tôi chắc chắn quay lại.

Lovely accommodation in a great location in Hoi An, in between the old town and the beach. The staff were lovely, great at communicating and always helping us with a smile. The accommodation was clean, and exactly as described. I would definitely recommend staying here!

Me and my partner had a lovely stay at crony villa. The staff were kind and attentive and gave the best recommendations ! It’s a beautiful villa and super chilled out but only a 5 min drive to the centre. Really enjoyed!

Nice villas. It’s a short drive away from the main attraction Pho Co, however, it’s peaceful and quiet. I especially like the laundry service here since laundry has been challenging in Asia during the rainy days for us. Lovely host and loads of local recommendations if you ask.

All of the workers were so incredibly friendly and helpful, staff even waited up for us to check in after midnight. Massage in your room was incredible by Sara at Coconut House and had an airport pick up too. We would highly recommend people stay here and we will definitely be back!!
Good budget hotel. The staff are lovely and helpful- very smiley. Chuck the manager is a great help and is an expert when it comes to Vietnam. It’s a little bit rundown but good for what you pay.

Я через Airbnb подарила своему брату пребывание на этой вилле. Мой брат остановился в соседнем номере и был восхищен атмосферой и тишиной. Завтрак ему понравился особенно! Мы могли добраться до любой точки Хойана. Когда мы уезжали, нам организовали комфортный трансфер до Дананга. Огромная благодарность организаторам, они всегда были на связи.

Wir waren nur eine Nacht hier, aber waren sehr zufrieden!
Wir mussten am nächsten Morgen früh zum Flughafen und es wurde sehr spontan ein guter und günstiger Fahrservice vom Personal organisiert. Danke dafür !
Gorgeous Villa, pool area was the most relaxing place and the coconut coffee was the best I’ve had in Vietnam! Room was great too.
Great place to stay. Kind staff, beautiful pool and the accom was comfortable. Would recommend
All great and Staff are lovely. Only downside is the noise from residents and the balcony view isn’t the same as the pictures. But overall a great stay !!
We enjoyed our stay, and if we were back in hoi an we could come back. We had to do laundry on a short notice and the staff were very accommodating.

Nathan and the team at this hotel are lovely, kind and accommodating, even organising a car to collect me in Danang (a bit cheaper than Grab) and also handy since the hotel is down some very narrow lanes and no turning room (I had 3 grab drivers cancel on me after my checkout as they wouldn't come down the lane).
The pros: very budget friendly price, friendly, accommodating staff who even agreed to my (multiple) date change requests!
cons: room smelled of damp/mould/ likely needs the air conditioner and air vents cleaned out; perhaps a deep clean of upholstery, curtains etc. the shower drain is clogged so the water overflows and likely this doesn't help the mould smell. the air conditioner is right above the bed so is uncomfortably blasting in the face. I slept with my feet at that end, but it's still a bit uncomfortable. the room is very small, so I would only recommend a short stay.
Again, it's great value if you're on a budget, but I would recommend paying more for something bette

Я провела 2 чудесных дня на этой вилле. С первых минут хозяин со мной связался через личные сообщения и помогал с любыми вопросами. Очень красивый вид с балкона и прекрасный рассвет. Тишина сочетается с удобствами. Бассейном можно пользоваться круглосуточно, он с подсветкой. Кресла-качели под деревьями очень умиротворяющие. Соседские птицы так мило болтают. Ресторан работает во время завтрака и вы выбираете все, что вам понравится из предлагаемых вариантов. Ванная комната безупречно чистая. Простыни белоснежные. Если вам что-то нужно, не стесняйтесь спросить, девушки на ресепшен добрые и милые.
Prima! We dachten eerst een andere kamer geboekt te hebben maar dit werd gelijk de dag erna aangepast. Fijne locatie en zwembad op 10 min van het oude centrum.
Molto gentili e disponibili, la camera era silenziosa e dotata di tutti i comfort. Ci hanno saputo consigliare e darci informazioni utili. Grazie 🙏🏼
Sehr schönes Appartement mit Balkon, sehr nette und freundliche Menschen, wirklich gute Tipps! Ein toller Aufenthalt!
The people at the front desk were lovely and helpful throughout our entire stay.
Très bon séjour, piscine superbe. Service de location de scooters bon marchés. Je recommande

Thank you so much!
Great Place !
Just book!
Really nice host
À bit noise but no problem
Plus que parfait excellent rapport qualité/prix le meilleur qu’on ai pu trouver au Vietnam jusque maintenant 🙏🏻
We really enjoyed our stay here, They are very helpful.
Really lovely staff and a beautiful place.
Great place to stay, can only recommend!

Great apartments, equiped with a desk and comfortable to work.  Everything sparkling clean. Amazing location. The host speaks english and is super attentive. I checked in a little early and left my lugguage stored for a few hours the day I checked out. Everything was easy and always  great communication with Hoan. Highly recommended.

Everything was just perfect, Hoan was a great host and always contactable for any questions asked, very comfortable apartment with nice kitchen remote lighting and even a remote toilet that was very special, I had a lovely relaxing bath, I have booked Hoang apartment again for another week in Danang…highly .
The airbnb is located in a quiet place and all the essential amenities are provided, including a separate washer. The host was very responsive and helpful. ^^
Good place, nice vibe, smart home functionality
생각보다 좋았던 숙소, 2명이 여행온다면 이보다 더 좋은 선택은 없다고 생각합니다. 자율적인 출입, 그리고 관리인이 상주하고 있어서 불편함없이 잘 쉬다 갑니다.
Very amazing staff, very helpful and can’t wait to choose their spot as the place to stay again!!
it was good for family short stay (1 week). There is not much natural sunlight in the appartment. If you don't mind i recommend.
房间挺大的，唯一的缺点就是主卧床头无法充电
Very quiet space, pool directly in front of the door. Just 5min with scooter to beach.
very good hosting
It's our best place we stayed in Vietnam. Every floor has its own bathroom and toilet. Beautiful interiors. Stairs can be problem for older people. But overall, we love to stay here.

Easily one of the best stay during my trip in Vietnam. Very worth it for the prices, we got a whole 4 storey house with kitchen and 3 big bedrooms. The place is very clean and aesthetic even better than hotels, they also has free water and amenities like toothbrush, soap etc. The room also has projector with connected smart TV. Location is also very near airport. Highly recommended to stay in Da Nang!

앞으로 3인 이상 다낭에 올 일이 생긴다면,
무조건 이 숙소에서 머물 겁니다.
호텔이 아니라 '머물고 싶은 집'이라는 말이 딱 맞았습니다.
넉넉한 공간, 완벽한 청결, 그리고 무엇보다도
주인분의 세심한 배려 하나하나가
여행의 피로를 녹여줬습니다.
숙소 위치도 조용하면서 중심지와 가까워
이동이 편리했고, 근처에 맛집과 카페, 마트까지
모든 게 갖춰져 있어 정말 불편함이 없었습니다.
함께 간 친구들 모두 '다음에 또 여기 오자'며
숙소 얘기만 한참 했습니다.
진심으로 감사드리며, 다시 만날 날을 기다리겠습니다.🌿
地理位置很不错，旁边还有一个集市，距离便利店也很近，如果住的时间比较长，还可以在厨房做简单的烹煮，不过浴室的喷头与马桶的距离略近，洗完澡后马桶上就会有水，除此之外，一切都很完美。

Nous avons beaucoup aimé notre séjour chez l’hôte. Tout était parfait et impeccable que ce soit au niveau de la maison et de la communication avec l’hôte.
Les chambres sont parfaites et très propres. L’emplacement est idéale !
Je vous recommande vivement. Nous reviendrons très si nous serons des passages à Da Nang !
Merci pour tout, c’était inoubliable !

동화 속에 나올 듯한 그림같은 집에서 너무나도 멋진 하루를 보냈습니다. 창문을 열면 보이는 바람에 살랑이는 나무와 다낭의 스트릿풍경이 잊혀지지않아요. 🥹기억에 오래도록 남을 것 같아요. ♥️함께한 친구들도 너무 좋아했어요. 저는 다음번에는 가족과 함께 방문하려구요. 많은 방과 침대, 프라이빗한 개인룸들이 너무 좋았어요! 깨긋하고 넓은 공용주방까지 최고였어요 🙂 다시 돌아가고싶네요. 덕분에 친구들과 멋진 추억 남겼습니다. 감사합니다
love the interior design and the stay very comfortable, multi story building and great!
It’s one of the cutest and most cozy airbnb I have been in - we love our rooms and the projector
Good location convenient to many places we wanted to visit in DaNang. Host communicated promptly to our needs

很好的民宿！在岘港住得最好的一家！地理位置很靠近机场，车程几分钟就到，附近还有一些吃饭和喝咖啡的地方。
民宿是法式装修风格，很精致，看得出房东很用心而去审美很到位！
这个价格下来，真的性价比很高，下次来还回继续选择住这里！
ที่พักเหมาะสมกับชาวแก้งค์ ทำอาหารได้สะดวก มาก ตรงปกสุด เหมือนบ้านในpinterest
Amazing place. Felt like home.

“Exceptional Stay at Da Nang Camellia Home!”
We had a truly wonderful experience staying at Da Nang Camellia Home! The property is beautifully furnished with three spacious bedrooms, each with its own attached washroom, ensuring plenty of privacy and convenience for our big family. The home was equipped with everything we needed, and the internet connectivity was excellent throughout, which was a big plus for everyone.
What made this stay extra special was the incredible hospitality of the host. They went above and beyond to make us feel welcome, even arranging to pick up our large family upon arrival, which was such a thoughtful gesture. Their care and attention to detail made us feel right at home, and they were always available to assist with any questions or requests.
The location was also ideal — peaceful yet close to all the key attractions in Da Nang. We couldn’t have asked for a better experience. 5⭐️

We stayed at this 4-story house for nearly a week, and everything exceeded our expectations. The house features 3 bedrooms, 5 beds, 3 bathrooms, 1 restroom, and a beautiful kitchen and dining area that looks even better than the pictures.
The house is cozy and thoughtfully designed in a modern Euro-American style, offering all the necessary amenities you could think of. The attic room, designed for children, has bunk beds and a bit of noise from the water pump, but all the other conveniences made our stay so comfortable that any minor inconvenience was quickly forgotten.
The location is central, making it easy to get around, and it’s near the airport without any noise disturbance from airplanes. Every detail of the house is meticulously decorated, from the dishes and glasses to the flower vases—it’s as beautiful as a painting.
The host was incredibly supportive and attentive throughout our stay. If I could, I would give her 10 stars! Highly recommended for the family or group.

Hai's place is located on a peaceful area.
The friendly lady at the building was always welcoming with a big smile and helpful. The laundry in the fourth floor have everything you require for washing and drying the laundry.
Highly recommend this place if you are looking for a place in Da Nang.

The host was very responsive and replied quickly to all my messages. The place was clean and tidy, and the location was okay – close enough to everything I needed, when you grab a taxi. Overall, a smooth and pleasant stay!
Thank you Hai :)
屋主願意溝通聆聽，很熱心幫助，整體居住體驗不錯。
worth to stay & enjoyable. nice host, nice place & clean. we can find food easily. above of all I'd like to thank the old lady who's very kind & very helpful to us.

My stay was quiet and relaxed. It was also a good distance to tourist spots (e.g, hoi an, dragon bridge, sontra)
15-30 mins away.
15 mins away from airport.
Hai and his family were great and helpful. I definitely want to stay here again when I come back to Da Nang. His family are very sweet. Thank you.
Selve lejligheden levede op til billederne men den var på ingen måde rengjort efter andre gæster.
Loved our stay would recommend for a local experience
Nice place, easy to find and friendly host
Its a peaceful neighborhood, good chance to breathe and get away from the city noise. Close enough to get to places, and far enough for peace.
Hai was very helpful. he got us a motorbike and his mom helped us do laundry

Hai is an extremely friendly, understanding & accommodating host. This place is easy to get to and from! They were kind enough to show us three different spaces and let us pick (we had to ask but it was no problem!). They were all great, but one had a strong smell of mildew and there was some mold in the freezer. Otherwise very clean and such lovely responsive host and staff. Also some cafes nearby so you don't have to walk everywhere!

very clean and modern. rooms are slightly different from what is picture i.e. the round black structures but the aesthetics are still the same. Good location if you have a bike. perfect for us to travel as its positioned between center danang (10 mins bike ride) and hoi an (30 mins bike ride). the hosts were extremely helpful and very responsive. fast internet, laundry room & dryer, complimentary water. great bathroom anemeities. would defo recommend staying here
Highly recommend cho các bạn ghé chơi Đà Nẵng. Chủ nhà siêu cấp nice, nhiệt tình và tốt bụng. Phòng có đầy đủ tiện nghi, thoáng mát, sạch sẽ. Mình vô cùng hài lòng khi chọn đây làm điểm dừng chân 🥰

I stayed at Hai’s place a second time. I chose his place again because of my excellent experience during my previous stay. Hai and his family are great hosts. They try their best to make guests comfortable and their stay enjoyable.

ダナン空港へ行く前日に一泊しました。
オーナーのお母さんがチェックインアウトをしてくださいましたがとても親切でした（╹◡╹）4Fにはフリーの洗濯ができるスペースがあります。私達はそこで洗濯をして1時間程度食事へ出かけました。帰ってきたらきっとオーナーのお母さんだと思いますが、私たちの洗濯物は綺麗に洗濯スペースに干してあった時は彼女の親切さにとても感動しました！！
周りはとても静かでお部屋も写真のままとても綺麗。空港にも15分くらいで到着するのでおすすめです！
Ở ba đim 26-27-28
El lugar está en las mejores condiciones calidad vs. precio. no encontrarán mejor lugar. Solo consideren que está algo retirado del centro de Dsnag, fuera de eso, vale mucho la pena.
This apartment is great for those looking to visit both Danang and Hoi An! Clean, spacious and has everything you need!

Thank you so much for hosting us. We had a great time here. Everything was perfect.  They provide money exchange, Bije for rent at affordable price. The place also has dedicated reading and coffee space. The hosts are super flexible and friendly. The place is well managed, decorated to detail. A truly delightful experience. Highly recommend.

I had a most wonderful stay at Hai's place. It was indeed one of my best experiences staying at an Airbnb property. Hai and his entire family were very welcoming and thoughtful hosts. They went out of their way to make my stay as comfortable and enjoyable as possible. I stayed at Hai's place for almost three weeks and could explore Danang and its surroundings with his help and have a very productive business trip.

Thankyou so much for hosting us.
Total value for money.

This is a very modern accommodation. The communication is very prompt. This is the most hospitable place I have ever stayed at. The entire family is there for your every need. Great Cafe on the premises. There are also laundry facilities. I highly recommend this accommodation. Well done!

If you want you chill and do some work at comfy place, this hostel apartment would be great choice.
It has everything to stay. Further more they have laundry service with dryer for free.
Marble mountain is only 5 minutes from the apartment. It was great place to stay before leaving Danang

This was the definition of hospitality. The moment we arrived, we were greeted by the host who showed us around. It appeared that they did not have a pan big enough for us to cook dinner yet. 30 minutes later they had purchased a new pan for us and delivered it personally. The place itself is also great. It has everything you need for a long-term stay. We had a great stay and would recommend it to everyone.

Wonderful apartment in a perfect location! The street was quiet during the night, so you can get a good rest. There are plenty of good restaurants and things to do in the area. Also, the host was very friendly and helpful. Definitely recommend!

The apartment was clean, stylish, and very comfortable. The location was quite, calm and not right in the centre.
Nevertheless shops and great restaurants are really close.
The hosts were extremely friendly and helpful, always quick to respond to any questions. Check-in was smooth and easy, and we really appreciated the little touches like fresh towels everyday.
We would definitely stay here again.

My mum and I had the most wonderful stay here. The apartment is beautiful, new, spacious and clean. It’s less than a 10 minute walk to the beach and nearby so many great restaurants and cafes. The hosts were extremely helpful and responsive. The internet worked fantastically for my work. Really can’t be beat for the price would definitely stay here again!!

Thank you to Erica and the team for such a. Amazing stay.
Erica helped with everything including last minute reservations at one of the most popular restaurants saving us an 1 hour wait.
Definitely worth booking if you are looking to be close to the expat area but more secluded.

방 2개에 침대 2개라 각자 편하게 잘수 있고 주방에 조리도구도 다 있어서 요리도 가능하고 세탁기 있어서 너무 잘썼어요
날이 더워서 땀 많이 흘리고 들어오면 바로 세탁해서 깔끔하게 보관하기 좋아요
관리자 분 응답빠르고 친절하고 궁금한거 답변도 해주시고 여행에 도움이 많이 되었습니다
샤워기 필터도 사용안했는데 물도 깨끗해요

Loved the apartment! It’s very well located in the buzzing neighborhood of Da Nang, surrounded by plenty of cafes, restaurants, and bars. Nathan was a friendly and helpful host, quick to solve any problems. The beach is super close - less than a 10-minute walk. I would definitely stay here again

Мы жили в квартире 11 дней. Erica заботилась о нас во время всего нашего пребывания. Мы очень благодарны за отзывчивость и теплоту. Жилье находится в хорошем районе.  В пешей доступности множество уютных кафе и ресторанов. Мы были с маленьким ребенком, нам требовалось около 12 минут чтобы дойти до пляжа. Сама квартира новая. Очень удобно что в есть стиральная машина с сушилкой. Хорошие кровати и кондиционер. Мы хорошо высыпались, так как было достаточно тихо. Если резюмировать это отличное соотношение цены и качества.

Es war die beste Unterkunft und der beste Service den ich in Vietnam erlebt habe.
Unglaublich zuvorkommender Service. Das nächste mal werde ich wieder diese Unterkunft buchen. Danke für alles 👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼

very convenient location to the My Khe beach (7mins walk) and also near lots of good food.
Place was clean, with the listed amenities. The hosts were also super helpful and responsive!

The apartment is in a fantastic location, just a few minutes' walk to the beach, and I could enjoy the beautiful surroundings. There are also many great restaurants and eateries nearby, which was very convenient. The host was very thoughtful and friendly, making my stay truly comfortable. I’d definitely recommend it to my friends.

We had a fantastic stay! The apartment is centrally located and within easy walking distance to Da Nang’s best cafes, local eateries, and all the amenities you could need. It was the perfect base for exploring the city and nearby beaches.
The unit itself was immaculate—clean, simple, and compact, yet very comfortable and well-designed for 2–4 people. The washer and dryer in the unit were a huge plus for longer stays, and the air conditioning was powerful and reliable—a lifesaver during the heat wave!
The hosts were responsive, friendly, and provided excellent local recommendations that really enhanced our trip. Overall, a great stay—highly recommended for anyone looking for convenience, comfort, and a seamless experience in Da Nang. Thanks team! 😊

Estupendo alojamiento con una ubicación excepcional. Cerca de todo, pero fuera de la zona más masificada por el turismo.
Los anfitriones excelentes. Siempre atentos y respondiendo enseguida. Mejor imposible.
¡Gracias por todo!
Dịch vụ tốt, cảm giác lưu trú thoải mái, chủ nhà thân thiện

I am a very skeptical person so seeing how nice it was with not many reviews threw me off but I took the chance and I’m so glad I did! I ended up trying to extend my stay as well.
Nathan and his team are very communicative and respond very quickly to your needs.
I will definitely be staying here again!

I had amazing experience staying at this apartment! The location is incredibly convenient, just a few minutes walk to the beach. The host is extremely kind and helpful. If you're looking for a comfortable place to stay near the beach, I recommend this apartment
Apartment is located in nice quite place, rooms is clean and full equipment. Everything was pretty nice.

彼たちはとても親切で、私たちは幸せな時間を過ごすことができました。全面のサポートをしてくださり、何より返信が早いことがとても安心しました。
そして、初めてのguestとして招待していただきましたが、何一つ不便なく、快適に過ごせました。ありがとうございました(T . T)♡
숙소가 너무 깔금하고 좋았습니다!
Great place, very clean! Host very responsive and helpful with local recommendations!
new and clean housing. the hosts are always in touch. quiet street. We had a pleasant two days here.
good
房东很热情，周边很方便，非常满意
very good accomondation

Căn hộ tại Wyndham Resort mang đến cho tôi trải nghiệm tuyệt vời với nhiều tiện nghi hoàn hảo. Có điều hòa không khí mát mẻ, máy giặt và cả bếp đầy đủ tiện nghi trong phòng. Tôi cảm thấy rất thoải mái và tiện lợi, đặc biệt sau những lúc vui chơi tại bãi biển. Ngoài ra, chủ nhà rất thân thiện và hỗ trợ tôi rất nhiều. Tôi sẽ quay lại!

Trải nghiệm tại Căn hộ Wyndham Resort hoàn toàn vượt mong đợi! Thanh Huyen rất chuyên nghiệp và thân thiện, luôn sẵn sàng hỗ trợ. Cơ sở vật chất được đầu tư tốt, phòng ở rất ấm cúng và cho tôi cảm giác như đang ở nhà. View từ phòng tôi thật sự đẹp, tôi đã có những khoảnh khắc thư giãn tuyệt vời!
Tôi sẽ trở lại!

Tôi vừa trải nghiệm tuyệt vời tại căn hộ và không thể không chia sẻ. Dịch vụ ở đây thật sự xuất sắc; nhân viên rất thân thiện và luôn sẵn sàng hỗ trợ. Cơ sở vật chất thì hiện đại và mới, phòng ở rộng rãi và sạch sẽ, tạo cảm giác thoải mái như ở nhà.
Điểm đặc biệt nhất chính là view tuyệt đẹp từ ban công, nơi tôi có thể ngắm hoàng hôn thơ mộng. Đây thực sự là một nơi lý tưởng để thư giãn và tận hưởng. Tôi chắc chắn sẽ quay lại trong tương lai!

Đây là căn hộ mới nằm trong Wyndham Resort. Trải nghiệm tại đây hoàn toàn vượt mong đợi! Nhân viên rất thân thiện, luôn sẵn sàng hỗ trợ. Cơ sở vật chất được đầu tư tốt, phòng ở rất ấm cúng. View từ ban công thật sự đẹp, tôi đã có những khoảnh khắc thư giãn tuyệt vời!

This was probably the best place I stayed at during my trip in Vietnam with four different stops. The host was incredibly friendly and understanding, letting me check in a bit early and check out later, and was always happy to help with anything, including laundry. The room was comfortable, with a soft bed and clean sheets, and having a private beach and pools was a huge plus. Highly recommend if you’re looking for a relaxing and welcoming stay!

Huyen's place is even better that we expected. Nice furniture and modern bathroom and kitchen. The check-in process was so easy even though the unit is inside a resort. We had access to the pools (the resort has a kid pool) which we really liked but didn't use because of the weather. The place is off the center, close to the beach. The host was helpful and responsive to all of our questions. We'd highly recommend this place.

Đây là lần đầu tiên tôi đến nghỉ dưỡng tại nơi này . Từ sảnh đón khách sang trọng và ấm cúng, đến không gian phòng nghỉ rộng rãi, thoáng mát và sạch bóng. Căn hộ tôi đặt được chủ hỗ trợ rất nhiệt tình.
Điểm nhấn đặc biệt khiến tôi luôn mong muốn quay lại chính là view nhìn ra hồ bơi tuyệt đẹp. Ngoài ra, tôi cũng rất ấn tượng với khu vui chơi dành riêng cho trẻ em tại nơi này. Các trò chơi được thiết kế an toàn, phù hợp với nhiều độ tuổi, giúp các con của tôi thoải mái
Với dịch vụ chất lượng, cơ sở vật chất hiện đại và tiện ích đa dạng, chắc chắn chúng tôi sẽ tiếp tục lựa chọn nó trong những chuyến đi sắp tới và giới thiệu cho nhiều người khác.

Fantastic stay the place was exactly as pictured. Clean, quiet, and well-located. Thanh Huyền was responsive and made check-in smooth. Definitely recommend for anyone looking to stay in the area. Would stay here again without hesitation.

The space is located within a resort and includes access to multiple pools, a private beach, restaurant etc. It is also about a 25min walk from the lively An Bang beach area where lots of restaurants, bars and stores are located. The room looks exactly as pictured and the host is very responsive and helpful.

I’d say this is one of the best Airbnbs in Hoi An. With a super affordable price, you get to enjoy resort-level facilities like a swimming pool, beach club, private beach, and more. Plus, the neighborhood is really serene and peaceful.

다낭보다 벗어난 호이안이였지만 안방비치ㆍ숙소 근처레스토랑에서의 식사는 다낭에서는 비교도 안될정도로 가성비최고!!!!!
후식으로 다낭에서 2만동짜리를 서비스로 갈때마다 주셔서 너무 좋았네요

ilk gün giriş yaptığımızda oda çok temiz değildi ama evsahibine haber verince tekrar temizlik yapıldı.Oda havuz manzaralı değil bu konuda abartmışlar balkona çıkıp sola doğru dönüp aşağıya uzanmanız lazım. Schöne Unterkunft, nette Gastgeberin. Das Zimmer ist in einem riesigen Hotelkomplex, was Vor- und Nachteile hat.
We we’re moved into another room because this room had problem but the overall quality is till fine. Nice resort with pools, worth the money I’d say!
Place is clean, light and full of features. Self checking is convenient. Amazing quality for the price
Amazing stay! Would definitely stay here again!

Such a wonderful room in a resort with all the amenities, plus feeling like home! One of our highlights is the kitchen (we missed cooking for ourselves) and and air fryer (which you need to have an adapter for as it doesn’t plug into the wall, luckily we did!). They had a water purification system that was clean and did not make us sick! Thanh Huyên was responsive and helpful during our stay. I have nothing but good things to say about this place and its surroundings! An Bang beach was a 25-30 minute walk away which had a lot of different restaurant options. Loved the 3 different pools, private beach access, and of course happy hour from 3-5 PM where you can buy 1 get 1 free for draft and basic cocktails! If we ever get the chance, we will be back.
Everything was perfect

Our stay was fantastic! The host kindly allowed us to check in early, and the apartment was spotless, beautifully decorated, and even included noodles for late-night snacks—a thoughtful touch.
The resort offered plenty of amenities to make our visit enjoyable. Every morning, a breakfast buffet was available. While it wasn’t included, it was well worth the price and stayed open until late. The resort also had two restaurants, a sky bar with stunning views, and a small pub where you could unwind with drinks, play pool, table soccer, or table tennis.
The gym was accessible to all guests, and the beach was just a short walk away—easy to access and perfect for a sunny day (though we couldn’t enjoy it due to the weather). The resort also featured multiple pools, including a kiddies pool for families with young children.
The host communicated promptly, was gracious throughout our stay, and made everything seamless. I’d absolutely stay here again and highly recommend it!
Perfect
Worth it

Dành một đêm ở tại Đà Nẵng mà chúng mình rất hài lòng khi chọn home của chị Quyên. Căn nhà nằm ở cuối hẻm dễ tìm.
Khi đến nơi, có con trai của chị chủ rất thông minh và tận tình hướng dẫn chúng mình cách check in, nhận phòng, giới thiệu cả quán ăn của chị chủ và còn giúp đỡ chúng mình mang vali lên phòng nữa.
Phòng rất xinh, ấm cúng, sạch sẽ nên chúng mình có một giấc ngủ siêu ngon kiki chị chủ còn rất tốt bụng nữa ạ.

Gia đình chủ home rất nice, nhiệt tình và luôn tạo điều kiện tốt cho khách. Phòng nghỉ dù không to nhưng rất đẹp, rất wao, nhất là khi có ánh nắng chiếu vào. Điểm trừ duy nhất là đệm hơi bị lún, chắc do mình nằm không quen nên bị đau lưng 🥹
Xung quanh là 1 hẻm yên tĩnh,home có ban công siêu chill và có 1 cái sân thượng rộng nữa. Để có 1 nơi nghỉ ngơi sau những chuyến đi dài hợ thì đây hoàn toàn là sự lựa chọn chỗ nghỉ chân hợp lí
Homestay nằm trong hẻm 37 Lương Thế Vinh , hai vợ chồng chị chủ thân thiện , phòng nhỏ xinh đủ dùng , có máy giặt dùng chung , có bếp dùng chung .
1 căn homestay nhỏ xinh giữa thành phố khá tiện nghi , gần các địa điểm ăn uống mua sắm nên ko lo đi xa để mua đồ . Chị chủ nhà rất nhiệt tình và rep ib nhanh

This is a nice stay in Da Nang! Quyên and her husband welcomed me in and recommended me a lovely restaurant to go to. The room and home is lovely - located in a peaceful neighborhood. I would absolutely recommend this stay :)

I had a very nice stay in Felix's home! It's a very quiet area, and a lot of things are within walkable distance. I would recommend it to anyone looking for a more authentic and peaceful experience.
The location is perfect although you have to walk into an alleyway. Most markets are accessible from the location and it is surrounded by nice spas which is a plus point!

Le logement est très bien placé et le rapport qualité prix est excellent. Great place to stay in Da Nang! Only stayed one night but it was perfect for our needs. Great location, close enough to walk to the beach, lots of restaurants around. The place was clean and easy to check into. Would recommend!

Our stay at this homestay was great. It's located on a calm street, yet it’s still just a short walk or quick Grab ride to the beach. The bed was very comfortable, which was a rare find during our trip. It truly felt like home – clean, cozy, and with a lovely room setting that made us feel relaxed from the moment we arrived. Hot water was available to shower.
The host was very responsive. For the price, this homestay offered amazing value. We would definitely stay here again and highly recommend it to anyone looking for a comfortable, homey, and convenient place to stay.

I was back before leaving in this trip to Da Nang and I will probably be back in the following ones. There’s not many places that clean and neat around. Also the kitchen has loads of equipment so you can cook a nice meal! Thanks again, see you soon!
Quyen’s place was excellent for the short term stay and behind reasonable for the price. The room was exactly as pictured, the AC and washer worked well, and communication was smooth. Recommended.

Die Stadt ist deutlich größer als wir ursprünglich gedacht hätten, zu Fuß dauert es deshalb schon seine Zeit um zu Hotspots oder zum Strand zu gelangen, aber mit dem Moped ist es ganz bequem. Quyên ist super zuvorkommend gewesen und hat uns sehr geholfen! Große Empfehlung :)

Sehr freundliche Gastgeberin, gutes Preis-Leistungsverhältnis und ruhige Lage.  Leider hat es aber geschimmelt und dementsprechend gerochen. Sobald das behoben ist, würden wir die Unterkunft aber weiterempfehlen :)

The host was very pleasant and the room was clean. It is a good deal for the money paid. It is at the end of a rather long, narrow alley and there is no way to be dropped off at the door with luggage. I suggested having two positions to hang the bathroom mirror as it is far too low for an adult male North American. Working around the door in the bathroom is a bit of a nuisance, but considering how little I paid, I just accepted it.
Phòng xinh, sạch sẽ lắm. Host rất dễ thương, nhiệt tình nữa

Trinh and Linh are amazing hosts! They made us feel so welcome and their apartment was perfect. It was spotless and very well-equipped. The big balcony was a huge plus, giving us a great space to relax and unwind. We felt so comfortable and relaxed here. Thank you for a fantastic stay!

The place is nice and pretty good value. The location is extremely near the airport, there's strong airconditioning and a netflix account is provided. There's some construction going on beside the hotel which is beyond the control of the hosts but it didn't affect my sleep quality.

We enjoyed our stay. Very clean. Close to the airport. We have everything that we need in the room. Then we have a shared kitchen on the main floor with a second additional kitchen with a washer, dryer, and extra small appliances like a rice cooker, microwave, extra utensils and cookware.
Excellent Location....Less than 2 kms from the airport....Supportive Staff....Easy Check-in .....We had a great stay at this place.... definitely recommended.....
Very nice apartment matched the pictures and descriptions. The staff are super friendly and always there to help. Has a washing and dryer machine which is very handy.

Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt in der Unterkunft. Bei jeglichem Anliegen wurde uns sofort geholt / innerhalb weniger Minuten über Airbnb geantwortet. Wir waren sehr zufrieden mit unseren Aufenthalt im Oriental Da Nang und haben daher um 1 Nacht verlängert (ging ohne Probleme). Wir kommen sehr gerne wieder !

Ich hatte einen sehr angenehmen Aufenthalt in dieser Unterkunft. Die Zimmer sind modern, sauber und gut ausgestattet, sodass es an nichts gefehlt hat. Besonders positiv hervorzuheben ist das freundliche und hilfsbereite Personal, das jederzeit für Fragen und Anliegen zur Verfügung stand. Oriental Danang is located in a super convenient spot - near the airport, ATMs, banks, and food is just around every corner. The staff are lovely and very accommodating. They even gave me a list of go-to places to eat ❤️ They clean the rooms every day and they change the towels too. The room was spacious and you can connect your phone/device to the TV and speaker. Even if it's beside the street, I didn't get bothered by the honk of the cars early in the morning (well, I worked at around 5am so I'm wide awake when they start coming! so if you're sensitive to the bustling noise of traffic, maybe request a room that's not facing the street. overall, I loved my stay and would definitely book here again when I come back to Da Nang ❤️

very nice location, near to the city and airport.

I had the pleasure of staying at this stunning homestay in Hoi An, and it exceeded every expectation. I was welcomed with warm hospitality. The owners were always available to help with anything – from booking tours and transportation to offering great local recommendations. I felt like staying home.
The location was perfect, very close to the old town, walkable to everywhere but enough to feel peaceful and private.
If you’re planning a trip to Hoi An and want a relaxing, peaceful and authentic place to stay, look no further. This homestay is a hidden gem, and I can’t wait to return!
Die Unterkunft ist sehr schön eingerichtet. Die Eigentümer sind super nett und hilfsbereit und helfen einem gerne weiter :)

The villa was so nice and was decorated with good sense. The neighborhood was kind and quiet. The host was friendly and rented us a motorbike. The beach nearby the villa is beautiful with few visitors. It would be a good choice when traveling with family or friends.

Ngan is one of  the kindest human beings I have ever met. She was very helpful during my stay. Ngan is respectful, had the condo well prepared for me. It’s in a nice location, quiet yet still close to many things. I will stay again if I reckon Da Nang!

Staying with Jin is like staying with family. the house is immaculate and clean and has everything you need for a great stay in da nang. the neighborhood is very quiet and peaceful both during the day and at night. it is an easy 10 minute taxi or motorbike ride from downtown and a 5 minute walk to the beach. Jin is always helpful and gives great restaurant recommendations and points of interest to make your stay in Da Nang the best ever! i would highly recommend her place to anyone and i can’t wait to go back! ❤️

Jin’s place was as advertised: clean, accessible, and very homey! My parents and I enjoyed 5 days here!
Even more than the place was the host. Jin was so welcoming and made sure we had all we need. She had us taken from the airport (with a small fee) and checked us in even when it was late at night. She gave me recommendations on nearby restos, massage places, and accessible beaches :) She answered every query swiftly, and she was so kind about it 🥹
The price is worth it! Easily accessible by grab, too. And Jin’s neighbor Than became a friend as well as he took us to several places on his taxi (with a fee ofc). Hope to meet them again!

저는 가족과 함께 3명이서 숙박했어요. 일단 방이 넓어요! 침대방 2개, 거실과 화장실의 구성으로 되어있는데 샤워하는 곳과 욕조가 따로 나뉘어 있어서 씻을 사람은 씻고 욕조에서 족욕할 사람은 족욕하는 식으로 효율적이었습니다. 그래서 각 공간이 좀 작아도 괜찮았어요. 공항 픽업 서비스도 저렴하게 해주셨고 주변 맛집추천, 볼거리 추천도 해주셔서 좋았어요. 제 여행 계획에 맞춰서 추천 해주는 게 너무너무 좋았고 고마웠습니다. 또, 오늘은 어땠는지 밥은 먹었는지 등등 소통을 열심히 해주셨고 제가 부탁하는 건 바로바로 해주셨어요. 베트남 첫 여행에서 좋은 호스트를 만나 좋은 추억 쌓을 수 있었어요. 감사합니다!

Had an amazing stay at this location. All thanks to the host, she was very helpful and very kind to us. A nice cozy villa and amazing recommendations from the host. Will definitely visit again whenever I’m back in town.

I had an absolutely fantastic stay with Jin and Kim! From the moment I arrived, they went above and beyond to make me feel welcome and comfortable. Their hospitality was truly exceptional—they treated me more like family than just a guest.
The space was spotless, well-maintained, and had everything I needed for a relaxing stay. But what really made my experience special was their kindness and attention to detail. Whether it was offering great local recommendations or simply checking in to make sure I had everything I needed, they truly cared about my experience.
If you're looking for a warm, welcoming place to stay in Da Nang, look no further. I can't recommend Jin and Kim enough and would gladly stay here again!
