Chỗ ở giá tốt so với địa điểm cho thuê, nhóm bạn mình rất ưng ý vì không gian đẹp, chỗ rộng, có trang thiết bị đầy đủ bao gồm đèn và karaoke, có chỗ nướng bbq, phòng ngủ đều trang bị thêm chăn trong trường hợp cần thiết. Phòng vệ sinh sạch sẽ và rất rộng. Có một điểm lưu ý là chỗ để xe trên sân đá với cỏ sẽ hơi khó dắt và di chuyển, nên cẩn thận khi đi xe.

Đường đến home dễ đi lắm, mọi người  search tên home trên gg map rồi đi theo là đến ạ. Home siêu tiện nghi và sạch sẽ, xuyên suốt nhà đều có tinh dầu thơm thoang thoảng dễ chịu. Chị chủ support nhiệt tình và nhanh chóng. Đáng để quay lại ạ.

Chỗ nghĩ thanh bình, tiện nghi mang lại sự dễ chịu tuyệt vời cho nhóm mình. Có thể đến đây để thư giãn cuối tuần, home có đầy đủ những gì bạn cần hơn cả hình ảnh hiển thị. Không gian xinh xắn với sắp xếp chỉn chu, ấm cúng. Mình đã có khoảng thời gian tuyệt vời, chắc chắn sẽ quay lại.

The host was so responsive and helpful before coming and during our first 2 days of stay in the villa. But she got busy I guess during our last night that she wasn’t able to respond to our messages. I hope she’s okay, and nothing bad happened. Thank you so much for letting us stay in your beautiful villa!

I had a fantastic time at this Airbnb. It was exceptionally comfortable, making it easy to relax and feel at home. The place was also very nice to stay in, with everything clean and well-maintained. Would definitely book again!

I had a great experience in Nissi's home ! beautiful home ! sparkly clean , very homely and cosy ! I loved the bathroom outside with the washing machine! fantastic idea !
Nissi is a wonderful host ! Always quick response and ready to help !
5 stars hosting ! I wish I could stayed longer ! super safe with a very cute garden ! 😍 A true gem !

With only 5-10 minutes drive to Ba Na Hills this is the perfect place to stay when visiting Sunworld or playing golf. The quality of the house is really good, especially if you take in to consideration that the house is located out in the countryside. You have all that you need in the house, but there are only a few small and really local shops and restaurants nearby so you might consider to bring your own food to the house or be prepared to use Grab or similar for home delivery. The hostess is really friendly, replies quickly, helps with transport and other things you might need or have questions about.

Nissi was just the most accommodating and gracious host.
She truly went above and beyond in helping us with the transport facility from the Da Nang Airport.
If you’re looking for a peaceful stay a little away from the main Da Nang city but really close to Sun World Bana Hills, look no further.
A word of caution though, it’s in a village and can get a bit quiet in the night.
All in all a fantastic option!
A special thank you to Nissi for all the help and a squeaky clean house .
Best stay in entire Ba Na hills, dont go for a second option, if you see this stay available for the planned dates, just book it, dont think twice.

Perfekt um die Hills zu besuchen.
Insgesamt bräuchte die Unterkunft mehr Pflege. Zb Bad oder auch die Küchenutensilien um weiterhin mindestens die 4 Sterne zu bekommen.
Die Kommunikation war gut und das Ein/Aus checken war einfach.

It was good for the price paid. Took a while for the hot water to heat up in the outside bathroom and only one light was working. There were also a few creepy crawlies and a mouse running around but besides that, it was an ok stay. Convenient location if you want to stay near the Sunworld theme park.
Beautiful homestay, with a lovely helpful host couldn’t ask for more.
nice private 2 bed bedroom with outdoor bathroom, responsive host
Was a nice place but noisy surrounding.  Roosters crowing 🐓  at 4 am in the morning and had a difficult time sleeping after that.
place is so beautiful and peaceful. So close to ba na hills. and whoever would like to visit ba na hills and looking for closest stays, we highly recommend this place.

The home had the wrong address and map on the listing. We were offered a pick up but then told the price and it was twice as expensive as a Grab so we declined. Took a cab and we were alone in the middle of nowhere in the pitch dark for 30 minutes i safely walking around fields. Luckily a local family saved us, helped us find the real address on google and took us there on bikes. Nissi wasn’t contactable at the time. When we arrived we realised the house is in front of a garbage dump and smells bad at night. The house itself is ok, towels weren’t good and the toilet and shower is outside also the kitchen is like a shop with lots of things for sale not complimentary. We were rented a bike which saved us one day but we cut our stay short because we felt it didn’t match the description. The address is probably deliberately off by 5km so you don’t check the local area
Nissi was lovely, very helpful and responsive to messages. Her home is beautiful 😍 Loved it.
Great will stay again

Fantastic host, very helpful and proactive with organising transport and tickets. 6 min drive to bana hills and 20 min drive to the hot springs. Place looks like pictures and is very clean. In a nice little village among the mountains with local eateries. Was a nice experience waking up to the sound of chickens.
Only thing is that the bathroom is not connected to the main building.
Ihana maaseutu villa!
Was a nice location but needs maintainence.
Very funky, peaceful, beautiful property.
The owner was very friendly and helpful. The house is nice.
Nice and relaxing stay. Highly recommend

Giá phòng khá rẻ mà vị trí phòng rất thuận tiện vừa gần biển vừa gần trung tâm, xung quanh thì nhiều tiện ích. Phòng sạch sẽ, chăn ga êm ái, đầy đủ tiện nghi cơ bản. Nhân viên của Home cũng rất thân thiện và nhiệt tình. 10/10 ạ

Phòng ấm cúng, sạch sẽ, đầy đủ tiện nghi ở siêu thoải mái luôn.Vị trí thuận tiện vì xung quanh nhiều quán ăn và cửa hàng tiện lợi. Chủ nhà nhiệt tình hết sức,chỉ dẫn tận tình nữa. Highly recommend!!!🥰

Great stay in Danang! The location is amazing — super close to the beach and right in the city center, so it’s really easy to get around. Huy is such a helpful host, always trying to make sure everything was good for us. The place has 2 rooms that fit 3–4 people, and the price is very reasonable. Definitely recommend if you’re looking for a comfy and convenient spot!

Very affordable 2 bedrooms ! The kitchen is at another floor which makes 2 separates environment ! The location is perfect, near a 24/7 café, 5minutes walking to get to the beach, few minutes walking from good restaurants !
The host is very kind and flexible, I recommend this place if you are planning to be active in Da Nang !

The surroundinga was much better than expected per Google street view or photos provided on Google map. Pharmacy on rhe first floor (by the way the pharmacist is super friendly and nice), and 10 sec walk to mini mart. Rental bike is 20 sec walk where very nice and affordable bikes available.
On top of that, super clean rooms, nice mini fridge, enough amenities available, nice washer and dryers, comfortable king size bed, secure smart lock for the entrance and the door of the room, really highly recommend place to stay with family or friends for internationals!

Definitely one of some favorite homestay in Danang. Host is so friendly and kind. Convenient store, drugstore, restaurant, cafe ..is very near. 500m walk to the beach, love it and surely comeback next time

это был прекрасный опыт. хозяин жилья был очень отзывчив и организовал раннее заселение, что было очень здорово после долгого перелета. до пляжа 5-7 минут пешком, рядом очень много ресторанов и массажных салонов. в доме есть лифт что будет очень кстати для заселения с багажом. это жильё стоит своих денег на 100%. рекомендую
p.s. дома есть немного мелких муравьев, но это абсолютно не беспокоило нас.
A cozy place to stay in Da Nang, conveniently located near from the beach. The host is friendly and always ready to assist you.
A cozy place in Da Nang, conveniently located within walking distance of the beach.
Excellente chambre, quoi qu’un peu coûteuse mais je pense que c’est le cas partout à Da Nang. Hôte très gentil !
Excellent location with amazing price.
非常好，推荐
Okela

Mình và gia đình vừa có kỳ nghỉ rất dễ chịu tại đây. Nhà sạch sẽ, gọn gàng, đúng như hình. Vị trí thuận tiện, siêu gần biển, trung tâm du lịch, dễ tìm.
Chủ nhà rất nhiệt tình, thân thiện và hỗ trợ nhanh chóng từ lúc đặt đến khi check-out.
Cảm ơn bạn rất nhiều vì đã tạo nên một không gian ấm áp, dễ chịu như vậy. Nếu có dịp quay lại, mình sẽ tiếp tục chọn chỗ này!
Phòng sạch sẽ, giá rẻ, trung tâm khu vực thuận tiện khi đến Đà Nẵng, mọi người đi đông có thể trải nghiệm thử
Chủ nhà thân thiện, không gian thoải mái
good location with lots of restaurants, only 5 minutes to the beach. Mira and her husband are very responsive to messages.
good location for staying  and valuable when you in danang.
Great apartment with highly responsive host. Really enjoyed our stay. Would highly recommend to anyone.

Căn hộ cực kì sạch sẽ , chủ nhà siêu thân thiện trả lời rất nhanh , từ ban công tôi có thể ngắm được hoàng hôn rất đẹp , ở đây có 2 hồ bơi và 1 bãi biển riêng rất sạch , xung quanh có các quán ăn của địa phương
Phòng mới , sạch sẽ, căn hộ nằm trong khu resort ,  cảnh đẹp , có 2 hồ bơi và biển , Biển ko sâu và rất sạch ,nó là bãi biển riêng .
Quá thoải mái và thư giãn
호스트가 응답이 빠르고 친절합니다 저렴하게 리조트를 이용할수있어서 좋았어요! 개꿀ㅋ 또 방문할게요🥰

We really loved our stay in Hien’s place . We didn’t expect the amenities & beach to be this beautiful! We even ended up skipping some of our tours just to relax at the beach & pool. This is a luxury hotel and we felt lucky to book it while still enjoying the same amenities as hotel guests. We stayed for 3 days and 2 nights, but honestly, it felt too short. I wish we had adjusted our itinerary and stayed longer.
Even though I knew the king-size bed might be a bit tight for the 3 of us, I still chose this place because it’s a beachfront at a very affordable price. It would have been nice if there was a sofa bed, though.
There were some minor issues like the room key card not working, getting charged for a towel that got stained & a small hiccups when our Grab dropped us off at the hotel entrance we weren’t informed that our lobby was in the last building. But all of these were outweighed by the overall wonderful experience at Wyndham Resort and I still give it a 5 star rating⭐️

I stayed at this resort for one night and it was a wonderful experience. The host was very responsive and helpful, which made the stay even more enjoyable. I was warmly welcomed with complimentary coffee — although I’m allergic to caffeine, I truly appreciated the kind gesture.
The room was very new and clean, and the overall atmosphere of the resort was peaceful and private, located right by the beach. One small note is that guests need to bring their own towels when going to the swimming pool, and the washing machine couldn’t dry my clothes — or perhaps I didn’t know how to use it properly.
Overall, I really enjoyed my stay and would love to come back again if I have the chance.
Nice Beach, Fire local Food around the Hotel, everything you need
최고에 숙소였어요
쾌적한 2박이었습니다. 고급 리조트를 저렴하게 이용해서 좋았습니다.
Best airbnb Hoi An❤️❤️❤️❤️🥰
좋아요

Très bel endroit où passer une ou plusieurs nuits. Le airbnb n’est pas tout à fait dans le centre de Hoi An (5 mins du centre en scooter) ce qui permet de couper avec la foule et de se reposer.
Le logement est décoré avec beaucoup de goût.
Nos hôtes ont été très accueillants et nous on partagé pleins de belles recommandations pour visiter et profitez de Hoi An.
Je recommande !

첫 베트남 여행에 좋은 인상을 남겨준 호이안에 최고의 숙소입니다.자연에 치유 받는 느낌이였습니다.친절하신 호스트와 방 곳곳에 예술적인 작품,바디워시와 샴푸,비누까지 모두 제 취향에 맞았어요
짧은 일정에 너무너무 아쉬워요.다음엔 오래 이곳에 머물고 싶어요 감사했습니다!

Thank you so much for hosting us in the Writer’s Room! We had such a lovely stay 🙏🏼 the space is not only cozy and beautifully designed (you can tell Tram is an artist), but the location is amazing too. We truly enjoyed our weekend in Hoi An. Tram was checking in with us a few times to make sure we had a great time, offering local cake and some activities around the area. For anyone looking for a peaceful, nature-connected place to stay, this is a 10/10 🫶🏼

A Truly Serene Escape – Highly Recommended!
This lovely homestay has a calming energy that instantly puts you at ease the moment you step inside. If you're looking for inner peace and quiet relaxation, this is absolutely the perfect choice.
The host was incredibly warm and welcoming, making us feel right at home. Their hospitality truly added to the tranquil atmosphere.
Highly recommend for anyone seeking a peaceful retreat away from the hustle and bustle. We left feeling refreshed and recharged!

처음 이용한 에어비앤비였는데 기대 이상이었습니다!
결혼기념일을 맞아 호이안을 방문하게 되었고, 후기가 많지 않아 걱정했지만 전반적으로 매우 만족스러웠어요. 숙소 곳곳이 하나의 작품처럼 느껴졌고, 특히 푹신한 침대와 깊고 큰 수영장이 인상 깊었습니다. 수영장 풍경은 정말 아름다워요.
호스트 탐과 제임스는 매우 친절하게 맞아주셨고, 언어가 통하지 않아 어려움을 겪을 때에도 언제나 먼저 도와주시고 세심하게 챙겨주셔서 감사했습니다.
특별한 날을 더 특별하게 만들어준, 잊지 못할 추억으로 만들어준 고마운 숙소였습니다
자연 속에서 여유로운 시간을 보내고 싶으신 분들께 강력히 추천드려요!

I couldn’t express how incredible the experience was. Tram is one of the best hosts I’ve ever met, and the place is absolutely stunning, a work of art! Do not hesitate to book and stay here, it will be worth it every second!

Très bel endroit calme et isolé. Reposant après des villes bruyantes.
Proche de la ville avec un peu de marche ou un grab.
Pour les amateurs de retraite calme et nature mais avec comfort ! (Avec les moustiques dépendant la saison)

Es ist eine ganz bezaubernde Unterkunft! Tram und ihre Familie sind super nett und ich habe mich sehr wohl und willkommen gefühlt 😊 Das Haus ist wunderschön ruhig und idyllisch gelegen und das Zimmer wunderbar hochwertig ausgestattet! Zudem hat Tram mir ein wundervoll duftendes Öl zubereitet, das ich jetzt schon vermisse!
Ich würde hier in jedem Fall nochmal her kommen ☀️

This place exudes a calm, rustic charm that invites introspection and slow living. The traditional elements — from the wooden furniture to the calligraphy curtains — blend beautifully with the soft natural light, creating a deeply serene atmosphere. Whether you’re journaling by the window or enjoying tea on the floor seating, it’s the kind of space that gently quiets the mind and nurtures creativity. It feels like a retreat for the soul — warm, thoughtful, and quietly poetic. The host is very friendly, thoughtful and enthusiastic

The host was incredibly friendly and the location is perfect! It's so convenient to be close to both the international airport and the city center. The workspace was also a huge plus—very cool and comfortable. Highly recommended for business travelers and tourists alike!
Hong姐姐是一个很漂亮的女孩，她认真地接待了我们，这个地方非常的有趣，很多的本地人可以让我们体验越南的生活，我喜欢岘港，喜欢这里的人，喜欢这里的美食，喜欢这里的一切！

The location was excellent, making it easy to explore the city. The view from the room was truly satisfying – we were lucky enough to enjoy both sunrise and sunset right from the balcony, and it couldn’t have made us happier. The host was extremely responsive and took care of everything we asked for, ensuring our stay was smooth and comfortable. Highly recommend for anyone visiting!
Phòng sạch đẹp hợp với giá tiền. Tuy nhiên phòng gần quán bar ngoài trời nên đêm rất ồn

진짜 최고였어요..!
밤 비행기라 프론트에 사람 없을까봐 걱정했는데 새벽인데도 직원분이 상주해 계시더라구요!
친절하시고 방 상태도 엄청 좋았습니다.
저는 욕실 청결을 중요하게 생각하는데 정말 깨끗하더라구요!🫶 (엄청 넓음)
하루만 있는게 너무 아쉬웠어요.
짐 보관 서비스도 있었어요.
Phòng đẹp và thoáng, view cũng đẹp. Ở trong 1 khu phố sầm uất nhưng không ồn ào về đêm, các bạn nhân viên hỗ trợ nhiệt tình

We extended our stay at this place because we were extremely happy with the room and people working at the reception! Langmandi is definitely a recommendation for your stay in Da Nang. It's close to everything you need.
It can sometimes be a little louder at night on the weekend, but we didn't mind.
All very nice, like the pictures. Clean, good location and friendly host.
정말 편하게 한달동안 쉬다 왔습니다. 리뉴얼된 호텔이라 깔끔하고 요금도 저렴하고 직원들도 너무 친절했습니다.
Nice place
bon séjour
Le séjour s’est très bien passé. Le quartier est animé le soir. L’accueil était excellent. L’appartement conforme à la description.
great stay and immediately responded to my needs.
I had a happy time because the staff were so kind.

One of the best accommodations that I have been to here in Vietnam. The room was everything you could ask for. Fresh seafood restaurants are within walking distance as well as the local eateries and convenience stores. It's a shame that I need to check out early because of the Bana Hills tour. I miss Da Nang already. Nonetheless, I will surely be back.
everything good

Incredible house, everything is decorated with taste. It feels just like home. I wish I stayed longer.
The owners are very caring and welcoming, full of good recommandations !
A restful and rewarding stay in Hoi An. James and Tram were more than accommodating and always eager to share their extensive knowledge of local arts and culture
Thank you!
Chỗ ở rất tiện ra sân bay, phòng decor đẹp và đầy đủ, vệ sinh sạch sẽ, Bình trả lời rất nhanh
Chỗ ở thuận tiện, chủ nhà rất nice, highly recommend mn đặt phòng ở đây nhaaa

Sure! I had a wonderful stay at Binh's place. The accommodation was clean and cozy, with all the necessary amenities. Binh was a very friendly and helpful host, making the check-in process smooth and easy. He provided great tips about the area, which made my trip even more enjoyable. The location was also convenient, close to major attractions. I would definitely love to come back. Highly recommended!

It is an amazing location. Hardly 5 min walk to the airport if you take the inside lane that takes you right in front of the airport parking. It accomodated 3 of us comfortably. We checked out at 4 in the morning for our flight  and it was hassle free and smooth.

숙소에서 너무 편안한 시간을 보냈고 에어컨도 잘 작동 했습니다. 야간에 도착해서 직원이 잠을 자고 있었지만 벨을 여러번 누르면 일어나서 응대해줍니다. (사실 좀 미안한 마음이 느껴집니다…..ㅋ…)
대체로 공항에 가깝고 생각보다 소음도 없고 층고도 높기때문에 답답하지 않습니다. 가격대비 만족스러운 숙소👍👍

It is a clean n cozy place near the airport. Just 5min walk to the airport. Just one block behind is the airport. Not too noisy. Room is spacious n clean. Bed is also large for a double bed. My room was with fridge n microwaves. Highly recommended for those who needs to stay close to the airport

this is one of the best places that we stayed in Vietnam and I would highly recommend staying here for a short or long-term stay the owner and manager was extremely nice and kind to my elderly mother and helped us with so many needs and I can't even begin to explain I am so grateful for all of the staff to help that there are not enough words to type for my appreciation
숙소의 위치가 좋고 호스트는 빠른 답장과 원하는 것을 빠르게 처리해줍니다
아주 편히 쉴 수 있었습니다. 덕분에 훌륭한 여행을 만들 수 있었어요! 감사합니다 :)

空港からも歩いて15分ほどの距離でとてもアクセスが良かったです。飛行機の音もそれほど気になりません。
写真と一つ違った点は、トイレとシャワールームを隔てるガラス扉がなかった点ですが、それほど大きな問題ではありませんでした。
飛行機が遅れ、チェックインが深夜になってしまいましたが、快く対応してくださいました。また深夜に使えるgrabなども教えてくださり、スタッフはとても優しかったです。
チェックアウト後、スタッフはすぐに部屋に忘れ物がないか確認してくれました。私は携帯の充電器を忘れていたのですが、それに気づいて追いかけて届けてくれました。
またダナンに訪れた際は利用したいと思います！
とても親切な対応ありがとうございます:))
다낭 공항하고 가까운 숙소입니다. 사전에 안내도 잘 해주시고, 밤 늦게 도착한 여행객들이 잠깐 머물기 좋은 숙소 같습니다. 공항에서 그랩타고 편하게 오시는걸 추천해요

部屋が清潔なだけでなく、ダナンの観光地やグルメも紹介してくれました！
メッセージでのやり取りもスムーズで、楽しい滞在になりました！
親切なホストで柔軟にチェックインも対応していただけます。少し道がわかりづらく、夜だと不安に思われるかもしれませんが安全に過ごすことができました。お部屋も綺麗で写真通りでしたが、少し特殊な匂いがしたので苦手な方は注意が必要です。

Great for easy access to airport (5 min walking distance). Check-in was very easy.
A few comments would be: my bedsheets were stained, bed was rock hard, loud in the communal areas.
But look, you get what you pay for and I think if you want something super cheap with easy airport access, I would recommend.
Although I do suggest ear plugs as it was loud on the streets & planes landing/taking off above.
Thank you!
호스트분이 너무 친절하셨고 숙소에서 편하게 머물었습니다 감사합니다
The place is clean and the price is reasonable. The host is really friendly too.
все было прекрасно, дружелюбный и отзывчивый владелец. расположение чудесное, можно дойти пешком от аэропорта. тихо, уютно и красиво, 10/10, все было прекрасно!
Clean and close to the airport! I walked to the airport at 7am! Check in and out were smooth. The hotels is really pretty!
Amazing stay! We arrived very late after a flight and the staff was so helpful. They again were very helpful in the morning. I would 100% recommend.
Lovely host, super clean place. Looked exactly like pictures and right near da nang airport!

A quick taxi ride from the airport. Too long to walk from the airport with all the luggage (it looks right next door on the map, but the path for pedestrians winds all the way around), so just pay $2 for a grab.
Excellent host & room was as described. All staff were very friendly & helpful.
The only knock would be that the bathroom window didn't have a screen (none of the windows in Vietnam do), so your options were to either be eaten alive by mosquitoes (I got some big bug bites my first night; not a great way to start the trip) or not properly vent the bathroom. There was no fan and the window to the bathroom was facing the hall/main staircase of the homestay so people in other rooms or walking by above can see and hear inside your bathroom.
Binh was super helpful and responsive.
공항 바로 앞이라 야간 비행 후 0.5박 해결하기 좋았습니다. 3명이서도 충분히 묵을 수 있는 크기입니다👍🏻

Отличное чистое жилье, соответчики фотографиям на 100%.
Рекомендую 😌
Worth its price.
Không gian, cảnh quan xung quanh yên bình. Vị trí thuận tiện, nhân viên nhiệt tình và cởi mở

The place is very nice and clean. It is quite peaceful and very friendly neighborhood. We always walked going to the Old Town proper since it's just near and good for exercise too. The place is very accessible to other restaurants but at the same time situated in a private space. Staff are very friendly and helpful. Thank you for letting us stay at your place!

Very comfortable, clean and great location not far from old town.  Thuong at the front desk was very friendly and helpful and the hosts welcomed us with good local information and things to do.   It is on the edge of an undeveloped area but didn't really matter we were mostly out exploring old town and getting great sleep in comfy room with AC.
Amazing. Perfect location and short walk to old town. Laundry service available and easy to rent scooter from hotel. Room was just as described and had a nice view from the balcony. Would stay again.

I stayed here for a few days and had a really great experience. The room was just like the photos—clean and cozy. The host was super friendly and quick to respond, always willing to help with anything. I genuinely felt at home and would love to come back next time.

Looked exactly like the pictures, hosts were friendly, helpful, and responsive throughout our stay.  Unit was clean and serviced daily, our cleaning staff were lovely! Thank you team, for a wonderful stay. 😊
L’alloggio è molto pulito e si trova in una bella posizione. I proprietari e il personale sono stati molto gentili nell’aiutarci a pianificare le tappe del nostro viaggio
Thuong was very friendly and helpful! 10 minute walk to old town, very peaceful location. Amenities were lovely!

Super Erfahrung!
Die girls am Empfang sind so lieb, wirklich toll und das Zimmer ist einfach makellos. Sehr schön mit Blick in die Natur.
Der Host hat sich persönlich mehrere Male bei uns erkundigt, ob wir zufrieden sind oder etwas brauchen. Wir bleiben nun für drei Wochen anstatt eine Woche.
Very friendly and interactive staff. Celebrated my wife’s birthday and they arranged for a beautiful cake within hours of request. Very clean and tidy rooms.
They stay was amazing and we really enjoyed it, the host was very kind and helpful. Walking distance from the market, really good deal.
Very clean, nice place. Close to old town and shops/restaurants. Good price.
非常的好，环境很不错，工作人员很好，亲切。
great place to stay, would stay again
The reception lady thuong was very helpful
Hôtel neuf, avec services. Chambre propre et hôte réactif. Location de scooter possible.
Everything was great!
The place was as advertised, however in the photos the pool looks way bigger than it actually is.
Great location
Excellent
Chỗ ở sạch sẽ, chủ thân thiện và thoải mái cho mình cảm giác như ở nhà
Thật may mắn vì tôi đã đặt được căn villa này giá siêu rẻ hơn cả những gì tôi mong đợi .
I really have a good stay here, the house is welcoming and cocooning. It just feels like home ! And Kim was really reactive, she was so sweet with us and really helpful. Thank you 😊

Our 6D5N family’s holiday at Danang, Jin is trusted, helpful & responsive on our stay.
The house is new & provided a joyful staying, like at home & comfortable. The Grab service can get easily within few mins.
Thank you Jin to make us have a great family’s holiday & helping to rent a wheelchair on sudden needed😇
Jin was very hospitable and respinsive and gave great recommendations for places to visit around the area. The house was clean and beautifully decorated with all amenities working. thank you!

I am very satisfied during my stay in this villa! <3 I love how friendly and helpful the host was. She really kind and its a nice place to stay. very quite place. loving the environment so much! looking forward to stay in this villa again in the future! highly recommended!!! 5 starrrr!!
非常棒的一间房子，地理位置优越，非常宁静，花园非常大，房东很热情，回复及时，满足我们的一切需求
Tuyệt vời
Great stay in Da Nang! The house was spotless, comfortable, and perfectly located. Highly recommend!

We had a truly amazing stay at Coco Villa 3 in Da Nang! The villa was cozy, beautifully decorated, and exceptionally clean—felt just like home. Every detail was thoughtfully arranged, and the atmosphere was peaceful and welcoming.
A special mention to the villa manager—she was incredibly kind, helpful, and always available, no matter the time. From assisting with small things to going out of her way to make us comfortable, her hospitality was exceptional. She truly made our experience unforgettable.
The location is great, and everything was smooth from check-in to check-out. We were very, very satisfied with everything—villa, staff, cleanliness, service, and comfort. It was one of the best Airbnb stays we’ve ever had!
If you’re planning a trip to Da Nang, we highly recommend Coco Villa 3. A perfect mix of beauty, comfort, and warm hospitality. We would love to return again soon. Huge thanks to the amazing host!
Host is really nice and house is small but very beautiful and has everything you need.

Wir durften einige Tage in einer traumhaft schönen Villa verbringen – mit liebevoll eingerichteten Details, einem großen Außenbereich und einer gemütlichen Außenküche, in der wir morgens ganz in Ruhe frühstücken konnten. Das Bett war super bequem, der Ort absolut ruhig und friedlich – fern vom Trubel der Stadt, aber trotzdem perfekt gelegen: Nur 5 Minuten mit dem Roller zum Strand und etwa 15 Minuten ins Stadtzentrum.
Ein ganz besonderes Highlight war Jin. Sie war nicht nur eine Gastgeberin – sie wurde für uns in kurzer Zeit zu einer Freundin. Mit ihrer offenen, hilfsbereiten und herzlichen Art hat sie uns sofort ein Zuhause-Gefühl gegeben. Sie war jederzeit erreichbar, hatte tolle Tipps parat und hat sich mit so viel Hingabe um alles gekümmert. Ein Abend mit ihr voller inspirierender Gespräche bleibt uns besonders in Erinnerung.
Es fiel uns wirklich schwer, wieder abzureisen. Diese Unterkunft ist ein Herzensort, und wir können sie aus tiefstem Herzen weiterempfehlen. Danke für alles ?
Responsive and comfortable stay for a family.
just ok for price
與圖片相符
Ok
Great value for good price. Thank for the great communication with manager!

Absolutely loved my stay at Mr. Đô and Ms. Ánh’s place! The room was spotless, cozy, and beautifully decorated. It had everything I needed — fast Wi-Fi, air conditioning, and a fully equipped kitchen. The location was convenient and easy to get around. The hosts were incredibly kind, responsive, and helpful throughout my stay. I felt right at home and would definitely come back again. Highly recommended!
非常完美的房间，客厅和卧室分离，还有个小厨房，最妙的是有个洗衣机。岘港比较热出去一趟就浑身出汗了，可以随时洗衣服顶楼晾衣服干的也很快，真的是非常好的一次入住体验。
Tuyệt vời, thân thiện
Fantastic stay at Mr. Đô and Ms. Ánh's! Clean, comfy, and well-equipped. The hosts were incredibly kind and responsive. Felt right at home – definitely recommend!
Все супер. Доволен. Квартира уютная все есть. Легко и удобно попасть. Я доволен! 😊

Đây là lần đầu tiên tôi đặt phòng qua Airbnb và may mắn được gặp bạn host Ky Anh rất thân thiện và siêu nhiệt tình, giải đáp tất cả các thắc mắc của tôi. Căn phòng rất mới, sạch đẹp và thoáng đãng, giống y như hình ảnh được đăng trên listing. Tất cả đã làm cho chuyến du lịch của tôi tuyệt vời hơn rất nhiều. Chắc chắn tôi sẽ quay lại nơi đây vào lần tới.
Tôi đã có kỳ nghỉ tuyệt vời tại đây . Chủ nhà thân thiện , mọi thứ đều tốt . Sẽ quay lại vào lần sau
Phòng sạch sẽ. chủ nhà thân thiện. sẽ quay lại lần sau
Great host and staff, peaceful location and spacious room. Easy transportation. Very friendly people!
Wonderful host and staff. Very friendly people. Lovely place, clean and spacious room, very good location. Highly recommended.
Everything said is true. Very nice host, receptionist ans security guard who are friendly. It is clean and 15min away from the old town. I recommend this place a 100% ✨

We totally enjoyed our stay with Ky Anh. Our room was very new and clean, full-equipped, from the window looking to quiet and green area, always fulfill of sunshine. Host Ky Anh always comes out to make sure our stay smooth and eager for sharing some local tips for your visit in Hoi An.
Phòng rộng rãi thoải mái hơn mong đợi, bạn nhân viên lễ tân rất nhiệt tình, kế bên có tiệm tạp hoá và quán ăn nên cần mua gì rất tiện lợi. Ra khu phố cổ chỉ tầm 5p đi xe máy

Was the perfect place to stay, the hosts communicated with us immediately and were always there to help. They gave us local recommendations and booked us on a tour. The breakfast was incredible as well. All in all a perfect stay would recommend to anybody stopping in Hoi An!

San was a wonderful host from the beginning. She gave me recommendations on local food, places to visit, and suit tailoring. She greeted me every morning for breakfast with a warming smile. The room was on the third floor so you will get your exercise. The view was very good.  It faced the afternoon sun but the air conditioner compensated. Complimentary breakfast was a good deal; did not have to travel for morning coffee or meal. Finally, the cleaning staff was always very friendly even when busy with cleaning rooms. I would definitely stay again.
Rèm có thể tối hơn chút thì tuyệttt

We had a wonderful stay here! It is away from the busy side of Hoi An yet is in a convenient location with lovely resturants and convenient stores nearby. A 20 minute walk from the old town so very close. The staff were lovely and were always happy to answer our questions and help us out. Breakfast was also very nice with your own choice of dishes as well as a buffet. The room was clean, well kept, spacious and had all the facilities we needed plus a top up of water and cleaning each day. Overall, would love to stay here again and highly recommend!

Looks exactly like the photos. Very clean and comfortable, pool area great and lovely being able to have breakfast on site. I didn’t realise how far from the old historic town it was though - it’s a 25 min walk, and not many exciting restaurants nearby. They do provide bikes if you’re happy to get around that way.

Our stay at Volar Hoi An was excellent! The owner was incredibly friendly and gave us a detailed introduction to possible excursions, recommended tailors, and more. The room was beautiful – tastefully decorated, very clean, and had a spacious balcony. Breakfast was also great. You could choose from a variety of à la carte dishes, and there was also a small buffet with fruit and a few sweet treats. We highly recommend this place!

Volar is a perfect stay in Hoi An. Its walkable to old quaters and has great local restaurants near by. The staff at the front desk are helpful and will give you great recommendations for food and things to do. They'll go out of their way to help you find things or anything else that you might need.

I really enjoyed my stay! The location is super convenient, just a short ride to the old town. The staff were attentive, quick to respond to any questions, and incredibly kind. The only issue I had was the shower drain, which was a bit slow, but aside from that, everything was great. I would definitely recommend this place!

A lovely place to stay in Hoi An. Hosts organised a transfer for us from Da Nang which went smoothly. The hosts were very lovely and friendly throughout the stay and had many local recommendations. Location is quiet and peaceful, a good in-between for both Old Town and An Bang beach. Quick walk to Old Town, and free bicycles to explore everywhere else. Great breakfast with a range of choices. Definitely recommend!

We loved our stay at Volar - it was perfectly located, within easy walking distance of old town, but in a quiet neighbourhood. Within minutes of cycling you’d be out into greenery, and beyond that the beach. The room was spacious, super clean, and had everything we needed. The staff were all very friendly too!

Gorgeous home stay with lots of extra amenities like bicycles that are easy to borrow, my room was very spacious and beautifully decorated and I was glad to have a nice big balcony. The reception staff were very friendly and helpful.
Had such a great stay here at Volar - such a great space, friendly staff and incredible location. Thank you so much for organising our laundry and airport transport too. Highly recommend!

Great place to stay for families and couples. A more private location out of the bustle of old town. Staff was great, breakfast was delicious, and plenty of good eats nearby (Bro Coffee for amazing local coffee with Italian beans, and Tintin for great local food). Would stay again!

Great place to stay, relatively close to all the attractions. Staff were friendly and helpful. Room was comfy and well designed. Only issue we had was that there were ants in the room (despite us not having food) and cleaning. It didn't affect us most of the time, just annoying.

This gem in Hoi An is definitely worth staying at! I loved the convenience of the location (close to many cafes, tailors, and Old Town), the small touches such as breakfast being included and the staff being super friendly, and the quiet and peaceful surroundings. The front desk helped me book a car to the airport at a fair price, and was always there to help me with any services I might need (such as luggage storage). Would highly recommend to anyone wanting a pleasant stay in Hoi An for a reasonable price.
The staff are really approachable and accomodating. The location is close to old town, with ~30k vnd grab car rate. the room is clean and spacious that it will make you feel right at home.

Perfect property in peaceful and calm neighborhood. I booked for only one night but felt like should have stayed for couple of nights more. They helped us to book few local trips as well at a reasonable price. They also provide. complimentary bicycles - perfect mode to explore Hoi An and its beauty.

This villa is very convenient, we can go anywhere in Hoi An within 20 min by bicycle. The staff are very kind, they always talk friendly even though I cannot speak in English fluently. So I enjoyed Hoi An, I strongly recommend it.

We loved every bit of our stay in Hoi An! ❤️ Sam was very helpful and accommodating. We felt like home. Her recommendation for suit tailoring was also great. The place was very serene, charming n walkable to ancient town. We will definitely come back!

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Volar, all the staff were so friendly and accommodating. The room was clean and spacious and cleaned everyday. Location was ideal, about 20 minutes walk from old town. Definitely recommend staying here

My partner and I had 3 nights here and it was a lovely stay. About 20 mins walk to the old town but a really nice walk, lots to see and do in Hoi an, we had a great time. Great breakfast daily, staff were super helpful and made us feel very welcome. Good spacious bedroom and bathroom, the only tiny problem was the bed being a bit noisy as you moved but still super comfortable. Thank you!

Had an amazing stay at Volar! The room looks exactly like in the pictures and the staff was very welcoming. A small breakfast was included and bikes are put at your disposition if you want to go for a stroll around the city. Steps away from Hoi An old town but located in a quiet area, I would absolutely stay at Volar again!

We loved our room.  Just like the picture. Great balcony too. Location made it easy to ride bikes to the beach or walk into town. Receptionists were very friendly and helpful. Wonderful time here. Would stay here again. Best airbnb in Vietnam so far.

We absolutely loved our stay here and wish we could have stayed longer! The room was spacious and perfect for what we wanted - the private kitchen was amazing, as was the projector to watch Netflix, and the bathroom was modern and clean. The host was very responsive and very welcoming, helping us to sort out bicycle hire and giving us a great list of recommendations for things to do around Hoi An. Overall, our stay here was very enjoyable, and we would highly recommend to anyone looking for a place to stay in Hoi An!
Very kind human and the property is very clear and worth it, loved staying there
Beautiful room. Spotlessly clean.
Great stay
It was very nice

Просторная светлая комната с балконом в тихом районе. Самый чистый дом, из тех что мы видели во Вьетнаме. Удобный рабочий стол и быстрый wifi. Близко - Мраморные горы, до моря 20 минут пешком. Рядом минимаркет и много местных кафе. Ди и Нган - потрясающие хозяева, мы действительно чувствовали себя как дома.
Nếu quay lại hội an vẫn muốn quay được ở tiếp Little pie nhiều lần nữa.

We had such a great time at Little Pie. The location in Tra Que village is perfect, peaceful and quiet but still easy to get to Hoi An’s old town. The house itself is gorgeous with beautiful interiors, arts and thoughtful touches everywhere, plus the breakfast was delicious. Really loved how artistic everything was, and the hosts were super friendly and helpful throughout our stay.

Really beautiful and artistic, love the well-designed decoration and the flowers so much. The whole experience was amazing like living in a dream, definitely worth recommending. You can also explore the garden and the pool.
The hosts are really helpful and friendly - I had a large suitcase and they helped me with it all the time.
Breakfast was great as well, tried both western and Vietnamese style, both really nice.
It made my whole trip magical and thank you for sharing this beautiful property with us. I already started missing it!
숙소는 조용하고 새소리가 들리는 나무와 꽃이 가득한 정원에 둘러쌓여 있습니다. 아름다운 새벽 풍경에 마음이 고요해지고 맑아지는 걸 느끼며 하루를 시작했습니다. 기분좋은 밤을 보내기에 꽤나 적절한 공간이고 아침식사도 맛있고 정갈했습니다. 어디에서 사진을 찍어도 그림같이 나오는 이곳이 정말 좋네요. 또 오고 싶어요.

평화로운 호이안을 즐길 수 있었습니다
조식 후 가볍게 아침 산책 공용주방에서 자유롭게 식사가능 하고 런드리 서비스를 받았는데 세탁물 깔끔하고 향도 너무 좋았습니다.
호텔이 아니다 보니 물에 녹물 냄새로 필터 무조건 사용해야 하고 호텔식 깔끔함 보다는 감성숙소라고 생각하시면 됩니다
다 좋았지만 원래도 동남아는 도마뱀이 많은데 시골이기도 하고 비까지 와서 도마뱀이 숙소 안에도 좀 많았습니다 ..ㅎ 근데 사람한테 안와요 유익한 동물이라서 첫 날 만 좀 신경쓰다가 둘째날부터 잘 잤습니다 ! 감사합니다 담에 또 방문하고싶습니다

リピーターです。いつも親切に対応していただきありがとうございます。
前回とは別の部屋に宿泊しましたが、こちらの部屋は更に眺めが良く、西陽が差し込む時間は特に美しいです。
毎朝の朝食は美味しく、周辺にはたくさんのレストランがあるので食事に困りません。午前中の涼しい時間に自転車でビーチまで行き、カフェで涼んで、暑い時間は部屋でのんびり過ごしました。
次回はまだ泊まったことのない部屋に宿泊したいです。

とても可愛くて素敵な場所でした！
遅い時間にチェックインしましたが、ウェルカムドリンクを用意してくれました。近くのおすすめのカフェやお店を聞いたら、親切に教えてくれてました。
朝食も美味しかったです。

The living space and kitchen are aesthetically beautiful & breakfast was tasty.
However, the space was not the cleanest. The towels, pillows and sheet had stains & we encountered several bugs such as termites and roaches in our room.
The location is close to old town but in a very small alley so not the easiest to get to.

This place was a dream to stay in! Wish we could have stayed longer… The attention to detail for each placement of object and furniture, the fresh flowers, the family and the beautiful scenery around us just made it perfect. I will HIGHLY recommend you to visit this place at least once in your life and get inspired ❣️Thank you for the unforgettable stay :)
超级漂亮的小房子，非常庆幸订了这家住宿，因为会安古镇其实有点无聊，little pie是我们整个会安行程的亮点。
아기자기하고 동남아 느낌보다 작은 유럽 속의 온 것같았어요! 1박이 너무 아쉬웠어요 :)
また行きたいホテルでした。みんな親切で居心地が良く、穏やかな時間を過ごす事ができました。心より感謝しています。see you again
すごくオシャレで素敵なホテルとスタッフでした。ベトナム、日本を見返してもなかなか出会わないセンスの良さが際立っていました。他の方のレビュー通りヤモリは確かにいますが、何もしてこないどころか近づくと逃げていくので無害です:)

とても素晴らしい滞在でした。
お部屋もプールも写真通りで、どこを切り取ってもSNS映え間違いなしで、宿泊の方もやっぱり女性が多かったです。
お部屋に冷蔵庫があったので、とても助かりました。
ランドリーサービスも利用できます。
ホストから提供された朝ごはんはどれも美味しいかったです。毎朝楽しみでした。
英語が得意でない私たちに、翻訳アプリを利用してコミュニケーションを取ってくださり、有り難かったです。
ぜひまた滞在したいです。
借りれる自転車はちょっと日本人には馴染みのないタイプなので、ちょっと乗りにくいかも。
宿の前は狭い道ですが、なんとかGrabで宿前までは入ってこれます。

7일간 리틀파이에 머물며 잘 쉬다 왔습니다.
기대를 많이 하고 갔던 만큼 좋은 점과 함께 아쉬운 점도 사실 많았습니다.
장점
1. 직원들이 친절합니다.
2. 조식이 맛있습니다.
3. 공용 공간인 주방/거실이 예쁩니다.
단점
1.노후화 된 곳이 없잖아 꽤 많습니다.
이로 인한 as문제도 있었는데요, 입실 당일부터 문잠금 장치가 제대로 작동되지 않아 바로 문의를 했고 빠른 시일내로 고쳐주겠다 말을 들었지만 7일의 기간 내에 결국 고쳐지지 않았습니다. 비교적 안전한 공간이었긴 하지만 종종 불안했습니다.
이 부분은 사실 문의를 하기 전에 직원이나 주인분이 확인을 했어야하는 문제라고 저는 생각을 합니다.
외로는 세면대가 제대로 고정되지 않아 심하게 덜걱거립니다.
위층으로 올라오는데 난간 부분부분이 부러져있었습니다.
빈티지 느낌을 좋아하지만 낡아서 고쳐야하는 것과는 별개인 거 같습니다.
2.편의적인 부분에 대해서 집을 이용하는 것에 대한 안내가 적었습니다.
홈스테이라는 것이 전체적으로 공유하며 쓸 수 있는 것인데 스텝의 공간인지 모두의 공간인지 조금 애매한 부분이 없잖아 있어서 눈치를 보며 이용했습니다.
간단한 안내 책자가 있었다면 번거롭지 않게 직원을 통하지 않아도 되어 좋았을 거 같습니다.
3. 고층이지만 커피포트가 없어 조금 힘들었습니다. 공용 주방에 커피포트가 있지만 왔다갔다하기에는 사실 힘든 부분이라 방에 비치를 해두면 좋지 않을까했습니다.
4. tv송신이 자주 끊깁니다. 오래 묵는 만큼 tv를 꽤 시청을 많이 했는데 10분마다 또는 5분마다 계속 끊깁니다. 바람때문인가했는데 바람이 불때는 아예 통신이 안 됐고 잠잠한 날에도 10분씩 끊겨 시청이 불가했습니다.
5. 이 숙소의 문제는 아닙니다만 마을의 수탉이 새벽부터 시도때도 없이 웁니다. 그리고 마을 주민들이 노래를 크게 부릅니다.(문화인듯)
직원들은 친절했기에 주인분이 체계적인 시스템을 갖추어 운영했으면 하는 바람입니니다.
숙박비가 싼편이 아니기에 꼭 정비할 부분입니다.

I’m not sure words can come close to how incredible our stay was with Pham at Little Pie - but I will try! The staff were so lovely from the second we arrived, with fruit and orange juice by the pool on our arrival. Breakfast every morning was the best food we had experienced in Vietnam (make sure to try the Cao Lau) with everything grown locally - you could taste the difference and it was absolutely incredible.
Our room was just beautiful, photos don’t even do Little Pie justice as it’s just so special. Make sure you take the time to visit their beautiful cafe located 15 scooter away, the most amazing treats and relaxing area - we loved playing with puppy Chay and kittens everyday.
The location also is a dream, located in Vegetable Village - we couldn’t have asked for a better stay. We can’t wait to come back again and again. Thank you so much to Pham and the team for everything 🤍

I think is place is a true gems for Hoi-an
the place is beautiful
breakfast is nice
place is so photogenic
I would definetely going back to stay again.
環境非常漂亮，餐點也好吃，如果可以真的很想住在那邊很多天！
예쁜걸로 다 용서가 되는 곳이에요 🥹

This place is amazing—every corner is beautiful, and the host is
just wonderful. The house is filled with art, and they even put fresh floral arrangements in the room, making it feel so homey. We did laundry, and it came back neatly folded—definitely not the kind of service we’re used to in the States. Breakfast every morning is delicious. I’ve done quite a bit of traveling, and I’ve never stayed at a place as beautiful as this. 10/10. Our only regret is not staying longer.
Nice little cute French country home in the middle of Tra Que village in Hoi An. Great idea if you want to get away from the hustle and bustle of the old town. It’s also very close to the beach.

初めてのホイアン滞在で利用しました。旧市街はgrabで10分ほど離れた田園地帯を抜けた場所に位置しており、アンバンビーチまでも車で同じぐらいの距離です。旧市街は人通りが多くガヤガヤとしていますが、この宿周辺は鳥の鳴き声だけが聞こえる自然豊かな地域で、ゆったりとした旅には最適の場所でした！お部屋、建物、全てがとても可愛いです。朝食もついており、前日のチェックイン時にインスタDMを通してメニューを決めました。朝食もシンプルですが最高でした。ホテルのような豪華さ、便利さはないかもしれませんが、ホイアンの街にぴったりの宿です。今まで滞在した宿で一番よかったです <3

Such a lovely place to relax and enjoy the space! Easily accessible to Hoi An old town by grab, but there’s a lot to enjoy in the beautiful surroundings and space on the property itself. Hosts were kind and always responsive to questions. Would love to come back here someday 💕
We had a wonderful stay at Pham’s place. It was so peaceful and calm. The interiors are so beautiful and we had a happy time staying there. Will definitely come back next time we visit Vietnam

Home rất sạch sẽ và đẹp, mọi người đều rất nhiệt tình và đáng yêu, thân thiện.
Đặc biệt đồ ăn sáng rất ngon 🫶🏻
Bọn m đã có 2 đêm tuyệt vời ở đây!
とっても穏やかな時間を過ごせました。別のお部屋にも泊まってみたいので、また、戻ってきます。素敵時間をありがとうございました‼︎

spent the most aesthetic and peaceful couple days at pham's bnb, hosts were all so friendly and helped handle our bags in between check in and check out times with care :) kittens were soso cute too! would definitely visit again

Little Pie is such a dream! I wish I could have stayed longer. Booking already included breakfast which is actually rare in Airbnbs.
The whole place is adorned with beautiful trinkets, fresh flowers and carefully selected linens. So beautiful and inspiring!

There was 2nd time for us to came back within 6 months and still be the place that we loving to come back to.
For relaxing is very recommended, nearby environment also recommended to walk around and do running in morning.
Place a home as expected.

Quite literally felt like stepping into a dream.
Pham and the staff were so sweet and helpful. We arrived hours prior to our checkin time and although it was a full house, they still managed to find a way for partner to lie down for a couple of hours.
The complimentary breakfast was amazing as well.
Highly recommend!
写真通りのとっっっても素敵な宿でした。朝食のメニューはチェックイン時にインスタのDMで送ってくださり、そこから選んで時間指定する流れなので焦らずに決められました。今回は利用しませんでしたが、自転車のレンタルもあるのでサイクリングがてら散策するのもめちゃめちゃ楽しそうです。またホイアンにきたら絶対に泊まります。ありがとうございました。

완벽한 숙소였어요. 위치는 올드타운에서 조금 떨어져 있지만 자전거를 대여해줘서 다니기는 괜찮았어요🚲
주변에 작은 텃밭을 키우는 마을이라 오히려 한적하고, 풍경이 좋아요.
조식메뉴 선택 폭도 넓어서 고르는 재미도 있었어요. 아침부터 저녁까지 수영할 수 있는 시간이 길어서 아무때나 들어갈 수 있어서 좋았습니다🏊‍♀️ 하루종일 숙소에 있어도 지루하지 않을 것 같아요.
다음에도 이 숙소때문에 호이안에 오고싶어요 :) 정말 사랑스러운 숙소 그리고 친절하고 감각적인 호스트! 고마워요💛
It was the best place to stay ever. They are very kind and friendly. We enjoyed pretty housing, lovely cats and flowers, and great breakfast :)) I strongly recommend booking this place.
美しくのどかで、非日常を感じられる空間でした。必要な備品はすべて揃っており、快適に過ごすことができました。朝食と飲み物も素晴らしく、毎朝起きるのが楽しみでした。

Chúng tôi có một kì nghỉ tuyệt vời tại Little Pie Hội An. Mọi thứ đều dễ thương, mỗi góc nhà đều được chủ nhà chăm chút, decor rất xinh và ấm cúng. Sân vườn xanh mát, và bể bơi trong sạch. Bữa sáng rất ngon và đẹp mắt ngay trong khu vườn. Anh chị chủ cực kì thân thiện.
Từ nhà chỉ mất 5p đến biển An Bàng và 7p đến Phố cổ Hội An.
can't recommend little pie enough - a dreamy, picture-perfect space, with lovely touches throughout, friendly hosts, & delicious breakfasts
너무너무 만족스러웠던 숙소입니다. 이 숙소때문에 호이안을 다시 방문하고 싶을정도…!

Séjour exceptionnel au sein de cet îlot potager loin de l’agitation d’Hoi An. Un vrai petit paradis et une décoration tellement élégante. Il n’y a rien qui est laissé au hasard et on se sent comme chez soi. Je recommande vivement ! Merci pour tout.

The days I have stayed here was a really wonderful experience I have had ever. I couldn’t wait for getting up in the morning and eating their breakfast as well. It was raining when I stayed there, but it still made me feel so comfortable. The room was clean and well organized, the host was all kind and gentle, and their communication was very good. It's a wonderful place that makes you feel like you're going home when you come back from Hoi An. It became such a place that I would definitely like to come back soon!

Very nice villa in a quiet location with lots of details that create atmosphere. We were offered welcome drinks and breakfast was served in the morning. The owner also made me a birthday cake which was very tasty. I would definitely come back here again.
是間很舒適安靜的房子，我們很喜歡在那的停留，只待一晚是絕對不夠的。很喜歡房子裡的花園植栽，房內擺放鮮花、陽光照射進房裡的光影，會讓人一直想拍照留住美好的一刻。早餐選項多元且豐盛，晚上很適合放鬆小酌。屋主員工很友善，房裡的小貓親人愛玩，下次若再訪會安，還是會想住這裡。

여기 숙소의 가장 큰 장점은 디자인입니다.
숙소가 아기자기 하고 자연친화적 분위기로 예뻐요.
조식도 주시고 과일도 주시고 커피도 만들어주십니다.
단점은 시설 안내가 없습니다 전혀!!!
이 부분은 개선 해야할것 같습니다.
후기를 보니 웰컴 과일과 주스를 주시는거 같은데 저희는 없었고, 수건을 달라고 연락 드렸으나 준비되지 않았고 직접 일하시는 젊은 남자분께 대면으로 말씀드렸으나 알겠다는 말만 하고 주지 않았습니다.
게스트를 배려하는 느낌이 전혀 없어요..
친절하지 않습니다…
비가 와서 그런지 침구도 눅눅해요! 적절한 환기시설이 필요해보입니다.
이거 빼고는 전반적으로 괜찮았으나 이가격이면 다른 숙소 갈거같아요
Beautiful hidden gem in a peaceful island. Every corner was photogenic. Breakfast at the communal space was good and homey. Bathroom can be elevated as there was no window or ventilation.

Pham and Tree built a home and am so grateful they opened it for guests to stay with them. One of the prettiest Homestay’s I’ve stayed in. Fresh flowers, cats, tasty food for breakfast and the silence!!!!!!!  Everything I was looking for. The room came with a steam iron, hair dryer,House slippers. Easy laundry service for a minimum price. The breakfast was tasty healthy and filling. Ben who helped us was absolutely sweet. Tree and Pham are such nice ppl. Wish both of them the very best. Tree is an awesome artist and it reflects in every corner of the house. So glad I found this place. They have one in Hanoi too, can’t wait to stay there too.

한국사람들 참고!!!
평화로움, 고양이, 호스트가 직접 만들어주는 조식까지 어느하나 빠짐없이 완벽했습니다
올드타운가 조금 떨어져 있고 숙소 주변에는 마트나 편의시설은 없지만
그랩으로 이동시 올드타운까지 2천원대, 배달도 너무 잘되었습니다!!
호이안에 다시가야할 이유가
생겼습니다
我入住的房间枕头有明显的汗味，我不知道是怎么回事，但反映给房东后及时给我更换了枕头，应该是通风不及时，但我觉得要减少这类问题，非常影响住宿体验；早餐很美味，盐咖啡好喜欢；老板以及员工们都非常好，入住和退房的时候都替我们拎沉重的行李，超级好；villa环境也特别法式梦幻，超级美～

Thank you so much Pham and other host for hosting! been really helpful
Love every surrounding feels like straight out from Pinterest, very private property! perfect for sweet escape.
and not to mention they have a lot of various breakfast list! all of them was delish!
Worth the experience!

写真で見ていたとおり、とても素敵な宿でした。
部屋も料理もプールも全てが最高でした。
インテリアも素敵で何もしなくても心地よい空間でした。

Host is friendly and speaks English. Wifi worked ok.  Bed was firm but comfortable.  The doors could be a little tricky but the host said she would improve that.  That was the only negative we could find overall it’s a great 5 star condo.  Walkable to beach and 2 different very nice coffee shops.

My stay here was absolutely fantastic! The space was spotless, cozy, and had everything I needed. What really made the difference was the host — super kind, quick to respond, and went out of their way to help whenever I had a question. It made the whole trip feel easy and stress-free. Would definitely stay again!

Excellent place, but even better people. Very good location, very quiet. Everything works well and everything you need is within a 10-15 min walk. Very impressed with the level of customer service and the desire shown to make sure things are perfect for guests. Highly recommended!
I loved the apartment, very cozy and wide, and the neighborhood is really calm. There is even a washing machine. I wished I could stay more, I would definitely come back there :))

It was such a great experience renting this apartment from Linh and her brother Van! We were personally met at arrival and he showed us the apartment and explained everything! There is everything you need in the apartment!
They gave us amazing recommendations about sightseeings, restaurants and bike rental! They were very helpful and kind!
Thank you so much, we are definitely coming back someday!

The apartment is spacious for a one bedroom. The mattress is firm if that’s what you prefer. Location is just a few streets over from the beach. About 20-25 minute walk to the main DaNang beach. Plenty of local places to eat on the main road. Not quiet, there is a boxing studio downstairs, but it is one of the most quiet places we’ve had in Vietnam. The host communicates very well, even brought me a dessert for international women’s day.
Very neat and hygienic room. All amenities were provided. Very helpful host. Overall a very good experience
Linh war ein super host. Wir haben es dort geliebt. Er war immer freundlich und hilfsbereit. die Unterkunft ist sauber und bietet viel Platz. wir empfehlen diese Unterkunft.

Very nice apartment for the money spent. Excellent air conditioning.
Location ok.
We are happy for having chosen this apartment.

Great place to stay, has everything you need for a stay.
Host was great, always responsive and very helpful.
Enjoyed my stay at this place and can only recommend it!!!
Great place in Danang, simple but with everything necessary for a comfortable stay. Helpful, friendly and responsive host.
Clean and cozy room away from the busy and noisy Danang. The room is quiet despite local renovations. Lihn is very responsive and proactive. A good value stay overall

A very nice and peaceful spot. As well as spacious.
I had a great two weeks here and slept very well.
Would stay again! :)

We really enjoyed our time in Da Nang at Linh's. The apartment is as described and matches the pictures.  We appreciated having a kitchen with clean dishes and nice appliances like a rice cooker, electric stove and large fridge with a freezer. Also there's a clothes washing machine in the bathroom. Linh was very accommodating, arranged furniture in the apartment before our arrival and helped us rent a motorbike. Location is on the southern end of the city not far either the riverfront or beach. It is a quieter part of town, but there are still plenty of restaurants within walking distance and a 24hr convenience store on the same block. You will be in good hands if you stay here the hosts are incredibly responsive and friendly. Glad we got to stay somewhere so nice for a month!

В комнате есть запах сырости, но в целом комната очень хорошая, просторная и светлая. В квартире есть все необходимое. Улица очень тихая. Мне очень понравилось что хозяева отзывчивые, быстро решают любые вопросы и всячески пытаются помочь.

It was the third apartment we have tried in Baliza Home!
Great apartment! It has everything you need. I liked the kitchen and amenities – even a microwave oven – which is a great plus!
I also liked that the bathroom had a separate place for the shower – so you don't take a shower near the toilet and have water everywhere in the floor.
The bed was huge!
The window doesn't look at the wall.
So, I definitely recommend it!

Linh and Binh were amazing hosts. The house is new and gives off a luxurious feeling. The high ceilings and the wooden floors and ceiling add a very warm and stylish touch. There's also a small but lovely balcony, perfect for enjoying a morning coffee.
Linh and Binh are very attentive and professional. They helped me rent a motorbike and even shared super useful lists of places to visit via WP. I can also say they are kind and respectful people.
The house is located in a developing, quiet, and safe neighborhood. As far as I know, many digital nomads and tourists stay around here. It's not super close to the beach, but I walked there a few times with no problem. Grab rides are quick and convenient anyway. Plus, being in the center of the island means you're equally close to many different spots.
I was really happy with both the place and the hosts. Highly recommended!
Lovely welcome, and they did everything to make sure my stay went smoothly. Area is quiet and I would definitely come back here if I was in Da Nang again

Absolutely loved the place! the host and the co-host made my stay very special, they were super friendly and helpful. the apartment is definitely worth the price. Felt at home right away.  would love to come back. thank you!

Die Kommunikation zwischeneinander war sehr gut und auch gastfreundlich, die Unterkunft ist such wie beschrieben und alles ist schön sauber. Wir mussten unsere Koffer wiegen und hab die Gastgeber nach einer Wage gefragt und diese waren sehr freundlich uns eine zu besorgen. Ich empfehle ihnen den Aufenthalt hier.

I have stayed in this host's house many times, the host is always very hospitable, quick to respond, and enthusiastic support. In addition, these houses are always neat and clean. One of the most enthusiastic hosts in Da Nang 😊

Absolutely fantastic stay. All of the hosts are very friendly and welcoming. The apartment was exactly as shown on the photos. They went out of their way to make sure we had a comfortable stay and we loved it very much. 10/10 we will be back to stay again 🙏❤️

good wifi
clean
mattress hard
very good the price
주변 상권은 좋지 않지만 그것 빼곤 가격대비 만족스러웠습니다. 호스트도 친절했고 방도 넓고 쾌적했어요!
Beautiful location, very clean, quiet, private. Pool is nice. Room was clean, well furnished. Great communication. Super walkable location to Hoi An old town. Would book again.

A wonderful lodging experience, the room was spacious, clean and decored-out in a clean and minimalist concept which I appreciate. It's situated at a quiet location and with just a few steps, one can get to the main street conveniently. Friendly and responsive host. Thank you for hosting me!
Wonderful stay! Nestled away from the busy streets, but in very close distance to everything. Beautiful place, very clean and spacious. Wonderful pool and bikes free to use.

The location was in a perfect spot that was easily walkable to everything that Hoi An had to offer. Plenty of good restaraunts and small shops to shop at. Thuy Nga was very responsive and accommodating. The housekeepers were nice and helped us when needed. Recommend this place for your next stay.

너무 예쁘고 깨끗한 숙소였어요
모녀여행이였고 엄마가 마음에 들어하셨어요
호스트분도 친절하고 답변이 빨라요😍

사진과 설명이 같았고 호스트님이 응답이 빨라서 불편함이 없었습니다. 주변에 먹을거리도 많고 올드타운도 걸거 갈 수 있습니다!
직원분들도 친절해요~ 세탁기 사용법도 친절하게 알려주시고 완료된 세탁물도 예쁘게 정리해서 담아주셔서 너무 감동이었습니다. 덕분에 깨끗한옷 입고 여행중 입니다~^^

I loved this place so much that I felt sad when it was time for me to leave. It was bright, spacious and slightly away from the tourist hubs yet conveniently located. I really enjoyed my stay and I hope to come back soon. Thank you so much!

Absolutely amazing stay! The Airbnb was beautifully designed with every detail thoughtfully curated—it felt like stepping into a warm, cozy sanctuary. It truly felt like home from the moment we arrived. The kitchen was spacious and fully equipped, perfect for cooking and gathering. The swimming pool was the absolute highlight—sparkling clean, relaxing, and a dreamy escape both day and night. What made our stay even more special was the host—easily the best we’ve ever had! Incredibly responsive, kind, and attentive to every need. We couldn’t have asked for a better experience. Can’t wait to return!

This place was perfect for our three days in Hanoi. Close to the old town and all the local restaurants, and the bikes were so handy. The bath was so nice to cool off in and the staff kept the place immaculate

My partner and I loved our stay here, the on deck spa bath was great as well as the pool to relax after a long day walking around.
So easy to get to Ancient Town and explore and Thuy was really responsive and supported with extending our stay very last minute.
Would definitely come back here!

조용하고 깔끔한 숙소였어요! 인테리어도 예쁘고, 청결 상태도 아주 만족스러웠습니다.
위치도 정말 좋아서 호이안 올드타운까지 도보로 7분이면 갈 수 있어요.
직원분들도 친절해서 편하게 지낼 수 있었습니다.
다음에 또 호이안에 오게 된다면 다시 머물고 싶어요 :)

Rigtig god og smuk bolig. Den ligger lidt tilbagetrukket så der ikke er larm. Men 10 minutter fra centrum af den gamle by. Rigtig god og imødekommende vært og personale. Værelserne og faciliteterne var rigtig gode og vi meget tilfredse.
Kæmpe anbefaling her fra!

Nous avons passé un excellent séjour ! L’hôte a été tout simplement incroyable : très réactif, à l’écoute et avec un vrai sens du service. Lorsqu’une fuite est survenue dans notre chambre à cause de fortes pluies, il a immédiatement trouvé une solution en nous relogeant dans une autre chambre. J’ai également dû modifier plusieurs fois les dates de notre séjour, et il a toujours fait preuve d’une grande flexibilité. Et pour couronner le tout, il nous a offert un cadeau avant notre départ, un geste que nous avons beaucoup apprécié. Merci encore pour tout, je recommande les yeux fermés ! 🥰🥰

Wir reisen seit 2 Monaten durch Vietnam und ich würde sagen das war die beste Unterkunft bis jetzt! Alles war sauber, es war ruhig und die Lage war perfekt! Vorallem der Pool ist sehr toll 😊
Wir kommen gerne wieder!

A very cute place , located in the heart of all the activity. Walkable distance from the old town.
The room was spotless and very comfortable. I would definitely recommend it !

Amazing stay! We were only a short walk from the ancient China town! Everything you need, aircon, bed we will be back!
Thank you
This accomodation is beautiful and has a lovely view of the city scape from the top floor. The pool was lovely and it’s very short walk the old city area.
Nice stay here! Very responsive host! Walking distance to everything. Very modern.

Thuý, the host, is very responsive and helpful — from our car pick-up from Da Nang to a very accommodating staff ushering us to the unit. Thuý asked if there’s anything else I need, and I answered, “Everything we need is here — actually more than what we need. Really great place!”
It’s extremely peaceful here as it is tucked in a minor road BUT only a few meters upon exiting the property, there’s already the bustling Hoi An where ATMs, street-side coffee, spas, etc. are — all conveniently within walking distance.
The property bicycles are free for guests’ use and if you opt to rent a scooter, Thuý has a contact for very reasonable scooter rental fee — cheaper than the ones you find outside.
After hours of walking/cycling around Hoi An, each night I relax in the al fresco bath and get a very restful sleep in their very soft bed. This is home!

Thuy was a great host and very responsive - any problems we had or questions she responded fast and we had a great stay.
Will be coming back for my next Hoi An holiday

It was really good
Host was really helpful
住宿整潔 步行至市中心十分鐘 推介！
Logement très bien situé (5min à pied du old hoi an) hôte très réactif ! Logement propre et moderne avec un charme ! Je recommande

The place is exactly how it looks in the pictures. The building is a hotel, has a lift, has all the listed amenities. The reception desk is responsive and helpful. I loved the room and the view was beautiful. Its very close by to a lot of popular places.
Whenever I come to Danang I am only staying at Langmandi Hotel & Apartment. I loved the vibe of the place. its sophisticated and semi-luxuries. great for the price that we paid.

Overall our stay was good. Check in was easy and we were allowed early check in which was a plus. Minor complaint is the noise. There is a very loud bar nearby that plays music very loudly well into the night that wasn't mentioned on the listing. Overall though a good place to stay.

Beautiful house, convenient location. The accommodation is designed for short stays, I would not live here for more than a week. There is a very noisy club nearby that works from evening until dawn - you will not be able to fall asleep (keep in mind!).
Location is good but a little bit far from the beach for me an 80 years senior.
if you want a place that’s located to almost anything, this is the best place to be. i would definitely stay here again if i ever have the chance to visit da nang again.

Great stay! I really enjoyed the room (I was on last floor). I loved the view and the ambiance of the building. Many cafes and restaurants in walking distance
Biggest benefit the internet speed 🙏🏼😌 (300mbs) if you need good internet this is your place
这是我住过服务最好的酒店
Great place! bigger then the pic shown. Would definitely stay agian
Place is in the best location 2 minutes from the beach ! Great view from the roof. Many restaurants, spas, activities right outside the front door super convenient

The apartment was as it is in pictures….it is very clean and the host is very helpful and responsive. The location is too good….we just walked to the apartment from the airport. The view  from the apartment is the airport…..it’s a great place to stay for people who love plane spotting. Overall a lovely experience. Would definitely recommend this place. Thank you Hang for taking care of us….😊😊
Bạn host siêu dễ thương ,phòng ốc thơm tho ,hướng dẫn nhận  phòng dễ dàng ,nhanh hỗ trợ khách ,ui ui một kì nghỉ siêu đáng nhớ ,tôi sẽ quay lại ở 😍😍😍
旅居主人很耐心回答我們的問題，入住時還有保安迎接你！民宿十分大，跟圖片一樣漂亮。但有些美中不足是樓上及附近時有裝修的聲音，床單方面有些污漬，還有設備方面可以更細心就完美了，例如：淋雨間內增設架子放東西，提供一次性拖鞋等。但這些都是小事情，整體民宿給人很放鬆自在的感覺！

Firstly, I’d have to compliment the hostess, Oanh, her attention to detail is impeccable and efficiency with replying messages.
The location of the stay is very convenient, interior still freshly renovated and clean. We were all very satisfied and I’ll highly recommend this place to friends and family.

This property was honestly one of my highlights. It was extremely clean and beautiful. Thank you for having us. The host was super friendly and easy to communicate with. I will definitely be returning.

Really lovely apartment and such a warm welcome from the host. The place was spacious, cozy, and well worth the price. Location couldn’t be better - right on a main road with easy access to everything. Surprisingly quiet too, even though it’s close to the airport - we slept super well. Definitely recommend if you’re looking for a great stay in Da Nang.

Nguyen's apartment was great value and spotlessly clean and new.
We enjoyed our stay here very much.
The space is big open and bright,the beds are very hard but we have since learnt that vietnamese like hard beds.
공항에서 가까운 위치에 있고 청결한 숙소 내부상태가 상당히 만족스러웠습니다. 다낭 방문시 다시 묵고싶은 숙소입니다.

진짜 해외여행 많이 다니는데 이렇게 깔끔한 숙소 처음보고 너무 좋습니다

Le logement était incroyable, spacieux, éclairé et clean. Dommage que c’était juste pour la nuit, si l’occasion on reviendra avec plaisir. De plus, l'hôte a fait preuve de proactivité lors de notre arrivée, ce qui fait que notre séjour se déroule comme je souhaitais.

숙소 깨끗하고 좋았어요

Good location and clean rooms. Highly recommend

Best place to stay in Danang

Đến Hội An vào ngày mưa bão là một trải nghiệm hoàn toàn mới nhưng sự thân thiện và chu đáo của chủ nhà khiến gia đình cảm thấy rất thoải mái tận hưởng không gian yên bình với những tiện ích trong nhà. Tôi rất hài lòng vì đã lựa chọn Tin và sẽ quay lại nếu có dịp ghé Hội An. Cảm ơn Tin và đội ngũ phục vụ của các bạn!

We had a wonderful stay! The place is really nice, clean, and cozy, just perfect for a relaxing trip. The staff were absolutely awesome, super friendly, helpful, and always ready to assist with anything we needed. we felt very welcome and comfortable throughout our stay. I would definitely come back again and highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a great place to stay!

I had a wonderful time in Hoi An with my friend’s family at this anb.
From the preparation stage, the host Chloe, provided clear and detailed guidance, arranged pick-up service, breakfast, and massages, and even shared travel information and recommendations for delicious nearby restaurants, which made our stay extremely comfortable.
As a host myself, I know how tiring and time-consuming those things can be, but Chloe always did her best to answer my questions, and I was truly impressed.
I highly recommend this place to families planning a trip to Hoi An. 👍

숙소가 청결한 편이며, 호스트 또한 굉장히 친절합니다.
더불어 수영장 관리를 깔끔하게 해주어서 깨끗합니다.
올드타운과 차량 15분 거리로 적당한 거리입니다.
여러모로 좋은 숙소입니다.

This villa was absolutely incredible. The pool is huge and spotless, the rooms are modern, spacious, and extremely clean. Everything felt fresh, comfortable, and well-designed.
Communication was flawless, with clear info and great local recommendations. We got help with tailoring, transport, rentals, and attractions – everything was smooth and easy.
Chloe was really helpful and very kind.
A perfect place to stay in Hoi An. Couldn’t ask for more. Highly recommended!

We had a most wonderful stay in this villa. it is very peaceful, very clean, great pool, the breakfast was delicious and the people were extremely helpful, friendly, communicative and did everything they could do to make our stay enjoyable. Highly recommended. Thank you Chloe and Tin!

호스트분과 일하시는 분들 너무너무 친절하고 잘 대해주셔서 너무 행복했어요
