從開始訂房之後，民宿主人回覆訊息就非常的快速，不管是景點的介紹，或是申請電子簽證時遇到的問題，民宿主人都很樂意的替我解答，讓我感到非常的安心。到達會安當天也很熱心的詢問大概幾點會抵達民宿，因為我們忙著跑行程，所以直到最後一天退房的時候，才有機會和民宿的主人Chloe見到面，她還很貼心的送給我們見面禮，在會安住的兩個晚上，我們覺得非常的放鬆，床非常的舒適，環境也非常的寧靜，整間民宿打掃得一塵不染，若要說一個小缺點，只能說蓮蓬頭出水量比較小，沒有辦法洗得很舒服。總之，這是一間CP值很高的民宿，如果大家有來會安，一定是最好的選擇❤️

Absolutely delightful visit. Tin and his team were kind and attentive. The house was a dream and the separate room entrances were perfect for our older children. The beds were super comfortable and the sheets were soft. The shared laundry option came in helpful as well!
We hope to come back to stay longer next time!! Thank you for your kindness.
4인가족 편안하고 쾌적하게 잘 쉬다 갑니다, 호스트님 너무 밝고 귀여워요 감사합니다

My family stayed at this villa (Hola 2) for 5 nights, and we had a great experience there. The location was close to all the famous spots in Hoi An. Breakfast was exceptionally good, with nine different menus to choose from. The staff members were super friendly and went the extra mile to make us feel comfortable — really appreciated that!
Chloe, the co-host, was very flexible and did her best to accommodate us in every way possible. If you decide to stay at this villa, she’ll be more than happy to help with activities like tours, motorbike rentals, and more. Moreover, the swimming pool was perfect for our family to have fun. We’ll definitely stay here again in the future. Appreciate you all! highly recommend!

Tin and Chloe were amazing hosts. They arranged lots for us and made great recommendations. They always responded and were so helpful- friendly and we felt right at home. They went above expectations to make our stay the best we could have imagined in Hoi An🥰

The villa was so nice and clean, amazing experience and so worth the price !
The response time was so quick and we got the best answers for every question we had.
We wish that the villa was available for more nights.
It’s in a quiet and private place that gives you amazing and private atmosphere.

먼저 너무나도 친절했던 Chloe 고마워요!
숙소는 사진처럼 쾌적하고 좋았습니다! 단독 수영장이 있다보니 물놀이 좋아하는 아이랑 와서 정말 매일매일 수영하고 놀았네요~ 코앞이 바다라 바다에서도 놀고 싶었는데 아이가 수영장이 더 좋다고 해서 바다는 스치듯 구경만 하고 왔어요 ㅠㅎㅎ 숙소에서 빈원더스나 올드타운 갈 때 픽업차량 구해주셨는데 호이안이 다낭만큼 그랩이 잘 잡히는 편이 아니다 보니까 이게 더 싸고 편하고 이동할 수 있더라고요. 그랩만 믿지 마시고 차량 요청하시는걸 추천드려요! 아 그리고 마사지샵은 블루기프트 추천합니다! 마사지 끝나고 주는 애플망고랑 요거트가 너무 맛있었어요~

다낭 7박8일 여행하면서 이틀만 지냈던게 너무 후회될 정도입니다 ㅠㅠ
사진과 동일하게 룸컨디션이며 숙소 다 만족했구요 걸어서 3분만 가면 마트 있어서 편리했어요
조식 신청도 맛있었고 저녁애 바베큐 꼭 이용해보셨으면 해요 이번에 저희 부부만 와서 이용했었는데 다음엔 가족들 다 모시고 또오려구요
원래 후기작성 이런거 잘 못하지만 여긴 꼭 하고싶어서 퇴실하자마자 작성합니다
오신분들은 후회하지 않으실거같아요 적극추천 드려요
주인분도 너무 친절하시고 ㅠㅠ 개인적으로 친분 쌓고 싶을정도로 너무 편하게 대해주셨어요
별 5점이 모자랄정도... 정말 감사했습니다
좋은 추억 만들고 가요 ㅠㅠ

어머니 70번째 생신을 위하여 대가족이 머물 숙소를 찾던중 가격이 좋아서 선택한곳~! 직접 머물러 보니 가격대비 너무 훌륭했다 호스트 클로에는 신속하게 응대해주었고 친절했으며 케이크를 준비해주어서 생신파티를 잘할수있었다
숙소 주변은 조용했으며 컨디션은 깨끗했고 비교적 신축이었으며 침대도 편안했다 수영장 깊이가 120으로 아이들 놀기 좋았으며 아이들이 이 집에 살고 싶다고 했다 세탁기 건조기 사용이 되어 일부러 옷을 많이 들고 가지 않아도 된다 그랩으로 아침에 반미를 시키고 야간에 피자배달을 시켰는데 잘되었다 아침에 끄어다이 비치를 산책했는데 파도가 세서 해수욕은 안되는듯함.근처 작은 마트 2개 보았고 로컬 커피숍이 있어서 커피 사먹어보았음.마지막날 조식을 먹어봤는데 두분이 오셔서 직접 만들어주시는데 쌀국수가 양도 많고 맛있었다 오믈렛 샌드위치도 아이가 잘먹었다 남편은 미꽝을 너무 맛있어했다 다만 bbq는 나는 맛있었지만 야채와 해산물을 먹지 않는 아이들이 먹기엔 안맞을수 있다 어머니 또한 입에 맞지 않아 별로 드시지 않았다. 인당 50만동이란 가격에 비해선 좀 아쉬운 부분이다.위치는 올드타운에서 차로 15분정도 걸리는듯 하다 바구니배 타는곳도 10분정도 걸렸음 대가족이라 이동할 차를 호스트가 불러주어서 편하게 이동했다.망고가 먹고 싶다 하니 끌로에가 사다주었다.
다음에 호이안에 갈 일이 있을때도 다시 이용하고 싶은 숙소이다. 대가족 숙소로 추천한다

예쁘고 청결한 숙소에서 편히 쉬었습니다.
깨끗하고 넓은 수영장에서 아기와 수영하기 너무 좋았어요. BBQ 서비스 와 조식서비스는 특히 강추입니다! 쉐프가 직접 준비해와 고기를 구워주어서 편히 먹었어요. 조식 또한 맛있습니다. 자연친화적인 환경이라 모기가 저녁에는 많아요.
근처 마트에서 모기향을 사와서 밖에서 피워먹으면 더 낭만있을것같습니다. 화장실문을 꼭 닫고 자세요. 화장실 문을 열고자면 방에 모기가 들어옵니다. 머무는 동안 불편한점은 없는지 호스트가 신경을 계속 써줘서 여행의
마지막 이틀은 아기와 편히 쉬다갈수 있었습니다. 끌로에 당신의 친절한 미소와 호의는 잊지않을게요.
숙소 크기부터 서비스 등 모든것이 5성급 리조트 같았는데 가격도 합리적이여서 다시 방문할 의사가 100% 이다. 또 호스트의 빠른 응답과 친절한 응대와 직원분이 매우 부지런하여 편하게 여행을 즐기고 올 수 있었다~~

작년 11월에 처음 방문했다가 너무너무 감동받아서, 지난주에 두번째로 방문한 HOLA2 는 여전히 아름답고,너무 깨끗하고,정답고,친절하고,사랑스러웠습니다. 😍😍😍
숙소에서 올드타운 구시가지 까지는 그랩으로 15분정도 거리에 있고, 안방비치도 10분 정도면 갈수있답니다. 어디든 이동하기가 편리하지만, 굉장히 조용하고 프라이빗한 동네에 위치하고 있어서~ 가족들만의 특별한 추억을 만들기에 최고의 숙소입니다.
숙소 1분거리에 작고,큰 마트들이 있어서 간단한 식료품이나 간식거리를 사기에 좋았습니다.
여행전부터 여행내내~친 자매처럼 열심히 챙겨주시고, 도와주시는 HOLA 가족들은 말이 잘 통하지않아도~ 서로 너무 뜨거운 마음을 느낄수있는 그런 친구들입니다.
이번에도 마지막날 HOLA 호스트 가족들과 헤어지면서 눈물이 나오는걸 참을수가 없었네요 😭😭😭
너무너무 보고싶을꺼예요🥰🥰🥰
숙소는 사진 그대로였고 수영장은 생각했던것보다 더 넓어서 좋았어요. 호스트분과 청소해주시는 분도 너무나 친절하셨고 조식도 정말 맛있었습니다. 머무르는 기간이 짧아서 숙소를 제대로 즐기지 못한게 아쉬웠어요.

Nous avons passé un merveilleux moment en famille. Tout a été parfait. Cette villa est tout simplement magnifique avec tout le confort que l’on peut souhaiter. Une mention spéciale pour Vicky et son équipe qui ont été aux petits soins pour nous tous tout le long de notre séjour. Nous reviendrons avec un très grand plaisir.

숙소는 아름답고 깨끗하게 관리되고 있습니다. 호스트는 빠르게 답해주고 우리에게 필요한 것들을 챙겨주었습니다. 빌라의 스탭들은 모두 친절했고, 우리를 세심하게 배려하고  도와주었습니다. 깨끗한 수영장에서 즐거운 시간을 보냈습니다. 셰프의 조식은 정말 맛있었습니다. 쾌적한 숙소에서 즐거운 시간을 보낼 수 있었습니다. 우리 가족 모두 홀라2를 그리워하고 있습니다. 기회가 된다면 꼭 다시 방문하고 싶습니다.

The host were very helpful. They went beyond what they need to do as host of the airbnb. We followed their local recommendations and had a great time. They even helped us to order grab delivery, resturant booking in Danang even though they are in Hoi An. The place is very comfortable too! We enjoyed our stay!

Wir hatten einen rundum gelungenen Aufenthalt! Die Unterkunft war genauso, wie in der Beschreibung angegeben, sehr sauber, liebevoll eingerichtet und mit allem ausgestattet, was man für einen angenehmen Aufenthalt braucht.
Die Lage war ideal, ruhig und trotzdem gut angebunden, mit Einkaufsmöglichkeiten und Restaurants in der Nähe. Besonders angenehm war der reibungslose Check-in und die freundliche Kommunikation mit dem Chloe 💕🌸🥰. Wir haben uns von Anfang an sehr willkommen gefühlt.
Wir würden jederzeit wiederkommen und können diese Unterkunft mit bestem Gewissen weiterempfehlen. Vielen Dank für die tolle Gastfreundschaft und ein großes Dankeschön an das gesamte Team. Ihr seid wirklich klasse 🫶🤩

Our stay here was amazing, it is also a hotel and the staff were incredibly helpful and inviting. We received refreshments on arrival and inclusive breakfast in the morning.
Overall we had the most wonderful stay here and would highly recommend to friends and family!
I absolutely enjoyed my stay in Da Nang thanks to this sweet space! It was clean and conveniently located. I really enjoyed all of the amenities— I will definitely come back to stay here again soon!

Beautifully designed hotel. The room is not big but has everything you need. Bathroom is very nice, big bath/shower. The bed is very comfortable. One thing to note is that the balcony for our room opened to the inside of the building, it was not very clear from the photos that this would be the case, so if you want a balcony to smoke on this wouldn't work for that.
The staff are all very friendly, breakfast is excellent with many options that change each day, and they offer free snacks and fruit for you to take with you.
I would definitely stay here again if I came to Da Nang again.

The hotel was really nice and well organized. The staff was really friendly and helpful and the room was clean and as spacious as expected.
The hotel is in a great location, and in 5min you are at the beach. The hotel offers you beach towels and offers to keep your room key while you go swimming at the beach, which is really convenient.
The highest aspect for us was the breakfast, really nice and delicious options. Really recommend this accommodation! :)

It’s a very nice place to stay. Same as the pictures, but not too spacious as I expected but just enough for 2 people. We enjoyed the bath tub, the toilet is so aesthetically pleasing. We have a small balcony. Air-conditioning is very good as well as the Wifi - good for those who are working. What we love the most was the breakfast!! So delicious and healthy! All staffs are friendly and welcoming, helped us with our luggage. There’s an elevator but very narrow. The place is accessible with everything, spas, pharmacy, restaurants and the beach! We will surely come back!
Fantastic stay at mine and my girlfriend’s first time visiting Da Nang. We loved our rooms and enjoyed taking alot of photos inside. Would love to stay again if we come back to Da Nang!
Love the place so much!! Thanks for serving! The staff were really nice and all of them were trying their best to make sure you have a nice stay at their place
Stayed here again. Same comments as last review. Want to say again that the staff are lovely and friendly and that the breakfast is excellent :)
Amazing staff (Alice is very sweet). Location and breakfast are excellent. Beautiful aesthetic and super comfortable bed. Loved the stay, very worth it

Great place with fantastic design and scents🩷I felt great coming back to the room and get into bed because it was so comfortable and smelt so nicely. The bathtub is my special weakness, it is like out of a dream ☁️ This is a place to relax and have a good time, close to the beach, restaurants abd stores.
Definitely the place to stay in Danang.  The hosts are friendly and very helpful. The place is near the beach and there are a lot of restaurants around. I highly recommend.
The place is beautiful and the staff are so sweet and friendly
Loved this Hotel! Bed was so comfy and it was in a great location.

penginapan ternyaman dan memberi kesan yang sangat baik sepanjang kami berlibur ke Vietnam. lokasinya strategis, butuh beberapa menit saja berjalan kaki menuju pantai. bahkan di sekitar pun terdapat banyak tempat makan, ataupun minimarket. staff sangat ramah, dan membantu. tidak ada kesulitan untuk berkomunikasi dengan mereka. salah satu hal yang membuat kami senang adalah ketika kami dapat memilih wangi apa yang kami suka untuk shampoo, conditioner, sabun mandi, dan sabun cuci tangan. sarapannya pun sangat lezat, kami menikmati makanan khas Vietnam dengan sangat senang. sangat merekomendasikan penginapan ini! saya pun senang dengan keindahan facade bangunan yang tampak indah. suatu keputusan terbaik memilih tempat ini ketika berkunjung ke Danang.
Thanks so much for having us stay awesome place and we loved our room. Would definitely be back!

the best stay so far in our vietnam trip. wonderful staff, great breakfast and quick room service.
would love to stay again

Stayed for six nights and was welcomed with a drink, towel, and a personal soap selection. The staff was both professional and personable, making me feel at home. The room was cozy, and while cleaning could be improved, the outstanding hospitality more than made up for it. Would definitely return!

A really welcoming and well designed hotel in a great location.
The staff are extremely friendly and accommodating. They take great pride in their work and making you feel at home.
The breakfast is amazing every morning and so are the drinks.
Overall a very pleasant stay.

It was a pleasant stay, unlike any other hotel. The unique structure provided a refreshing experience. The staff's service was exceptional, especially Emma, Alice, Ryan, Toan, and Hung Bao. Thank you all!
the interior of this place blew me away. Service and overall place was better than some of the 5 star hotels I’ve stayed at. Would recommend to anyone looking for a cozy and calming atmosphere
Great place to stay. It has a good location and amazing service!
Der Service war hervorragend. Super freundliches Personal. Das Zimmer war auch gut. Optimal für eine kurze Zeit hier in der Umgebung. Danke vielmals!

كان المكان جميلا و تعامل الموظفين رائع جدا
لكن قامو بإرتكاب خطاء و هو دخولهم الى الغرفه و اخراج حقائبي كامله للاسفل دون تواجدي و دون علمي كان هذا خطاء كبيرا منهم
لكن بقية الامور كانت جيدة جداً
Nice location and service
Mọi thứ đều giống như mô tả, phù hợp với đại gia đình nhiều người. Nhân viên hỗ trợ rất nhiệt tình về những dụng cụ cần thiết mà chúng tôi cần trong suốt chuyến đi.

Căn hộ rộng rãi và đẹp hơn trên ảnh rất rất nhiều. Vị trí ở giữa phố cổ và biển dễ dàng di chuyển có chỗ đỗ xe ô tô, bên dưới co cửa hàng cafe rất đẹp và brunch tuyệt vời. Khuyến khích bạn sử dụng nó phù hợp cho cả một kì nghỉ dài hoặc ngắn.

Chủ nhà và người thân rất nhiệt tình trong việc đón tiếp và hỗ trợ. Cô chú người thân của host khá thân thiện, chúng tôi cảm thấy như được ở nhà. Tràn ngập cảm giác bình yên để tận hưởng những phút giây bên biển.  Ga trải giường và phòng rất sạch sẽ, thoáng mát. Cảm ơn vì đã mang tới cho chúng tôi trải nghiệm thú vị.

As a newbie to Cham Island I think I was lucky to stay here because the host does everything to assist you with anything you might need.  The host's aunt nextdoor cooks wonderful meals and the hospitality is unmatched! The view from the house is nice with a cool temple and some ocean in view as well! The beach is so close! Walk outside and there it is! You should definatly hire a little round boat to take you snorkeling just a short ways to the south! The coral is amazing and you can see why this island is protected! I will stay here again when I return to Cham for another round of island paradise!

Cham Island is one of the most beautiful places on earth. You do not need fancy accommodation to enjoy. Thanks for having us and all your help.
Hope you get around to renovating it’s a little rough diamond 💕

Un lugar muy tranquilo y familiar en el que pasar unos días en contacto con la naturaleza realizando diferentes actividades y desconectando del mundo. Se agradece. Tienes tu intimidad y baño privado. Hay mucha fauna, ya que se trata de una isla. Puedes comer allí, pero sino tienes otras opciones muy cerca. Increíble isla 🌴
Einfache Unterkunft. In ruhiger Lage mit sehr freundlichen Hosts.. immer wieder gerne

A truly amazing place! I couldn’t recommend it more! Nguyen, auntie and uncle were so so friendly and kind for our whole stay. The location is so so beautiful and the house is authentic and clean. If you go to Hoi An or the Cham islands and don’t come stay here you’re missing out massively!

We had an amazing time the host was so welcoming!! They arranged a motorbike taxi in seconds when we realised we couldn’t fit all our bags our scooter.The location is amazing the town is so beautiful it was the most relaxing place!! Mama cooked dinner for us and it was one of the best meals of the trip. The room was simple but had everything we needed including air conditioning!! And they arranged a snorkelling tour for us on the coral reef. Overall couldn’t recommend this place enough absolutely loved it:))

We was there for three night and we had such lovely time.  Mama & Papa are very nice People and you can feel at home there.  If you need anything, they will help you. You can make a beautiful snorkeling trip. in this accomoditation are everything what you need. Nothing more, but thats enough. I highly recommend !!!!! 😍

Wow. What an experience. Mama Nhi welcomed us with open arms (literally). The room is humble, but has everything you need. Nguyen helped us organize motorbike transfer. We went snorkeling with another homestay, who are the same family as our hosts. Everyone we met was incredibly kind, happy and generous. Our night on Cham island was very spontaneous, planned only 12 hours in advance and it was one of my top 3 travel experiences of my life time. Thank you!

We had a lovely few days during our stay.  It was so nice to chill in the small village and we enjoyed the community very much. Tu, the host, checked in to see if we were ok and helped with local recommendations. Mamma and Pappa next door were so kind and welcoming. We had lovely food and all we needed for a perfect time. Thank you to your lovely family.

Nice holiday apartment on Cham Island. No frills but great!
A large room with air conditioning and a private bathroom. 50 meters from the sea in a fishing village and away from the masses of Asian tourists who take over the tranquility of the island during the day.
Next to a virgin beach 🏝️.
Right next to the apartment the owner's uncles have a homestay where you can eat at good prices.

If you want to enjoy the beauty of island but also want some privacy (which is difficult to have if doing homestay). This house is the one. It’s a nice beach front studio house 1 big bedroom with 2 queen beds, 1 bathroom. Perfect for couple or family.
Good food is server from Papa and Mama next door and local restaurant nearby.
Beach is nice and beautiful just 50m walk from the house, good coffee shop is 100m.
The village is nice and peaceful. I really enjoyed my stay here and will come back for a longer vacation.

un logement très simple en bord de plage et à 2mn des restaurants et café
Nguyen à tout organisé pour nous : réservation du hors-bord, les motos sur l'île pour nous amener au village, elle nous a téléphoné à notre arrivée pour savoir si tout allait bien.
Son oncle et sa tante sont des gens adorables, on a super bien mangé le midi chez eux.
on a pu faire de la plongée avec les tubas organisé par son oncle.
Bref, un super séjour chez l'habitant, très authentique !
un grand merci à Nguyen pour tous les services rendus et sa gentillesse !!

We had such a wonderful 2 nights with mama and papa ☺️ we were welcomed with hugs and mama cooked for us some lovely local dishes during our stay. Papa took us on a snorkelling trip to a private beach which was a great way to snorkel without coming into contact with all of the tour groups. They helped us to rent sup boards and a motorbike too! They couldn’t have done enough and the overall friendly and family feel was just very warm and welcoming. The location is great- very local vibes but still close to some great beaches! Host was so lovely- they have lots of recommendations and even called to make sure our stay was going well. We will definitely return! Highly recommend for a peaceful visit to Cham island away from all of the tour groups.

It was great to stay at Nguyen’s place
Papa and mama are such welcoming persons, the food and the whole hosting experience were awesome
Thank you!
We wanted to cancel our night but we already checked in, Nguyen was kind enough to accept in give us a full refund :)

Super hospitality and huge portions of food. Mom Nhi was always available for anything we needed. She was cheerful and kind and very generous.
We did not know that the boat would arrive quite far from the home. Be prepared for a very hilly motorbike ride to get from the dock and the main town to the home. Travel light. Location is wonderful. Dad brought us snorkeling via his fishing boat to the most amazing spot. It was beautiful.

Lovely place to stay if you want to experience small fishing village life, you will see people making nets and selling fish in the morning. You can have a beautiful sunrise boat ride with papa for a very affordable price.  Nguyen parents are very welcoming, they met us at the fairy landing stage and made sure that we are comfortable all through the stay..

The place looks freasher on the pictures. A lick of paint and a good dusting will do a lot! This review is purely on the accomodation. The hospitality, food, communication, chill vibe and  pickup where outstanding! Such a cool experiance. The sweer care of nhi and lo (the neighbours) make this so worth its while!

Nguyen place did not correspond to what we found. He has many rooms but only shows the best in the pictures. We thought we were renting a whole apartment and we found a small room in a shared apartment. Anyway, it's great if you want to live a real Vietnamese experience. Nguyen's parents were warm and we had good time with them. Thanks Mama and Papa!

Enjoy island life with the locals on quiet and beautiful Cham Island. The home stay has simple but comfortable rustic style. Thank you Mama and Papa for taking care of us. Cooking, cleaning and fishing or snorkeling tour. Transportation from the ferry was also arranged and hosts will be happy to offer advice. Look forward to coming again.
Be aware there is no ATM on the island so bring cash and the services mentioned do cost extra. Prices are higher than other places in Vietnam... especially for foreigners.

J’ai passé un agréable séjour dans la famille Nguyen. « Mama & Papa » ont pris soin de moi. La chambre est sommaire mais ce n’étais pas un problème pour moi. La seule chose c’est qu’il y fait vraiment très chaud malgré le ventilateur. J’ai trouvé que c’était un peu cher pour ce que c’était par rapport à tout ce que j’ai fait au Vietnam. Si vous recherchez de l’authenticité et de la simplicité c’est l’endroit idéal.

Place is on Cham island, super gorgeous spot. You get a narrow view of the ocean from the porch and practically none of the tourist rush from about 11-2 every day. Few restaurants with super fresh seafood, or mama nhi next door who runs a homestay will cook for you.
We had a fantastic stay at Nguyens place, Mama was extremely hospitable and made our stay really memorable.

It was a very comfortable stay. The host is very kind, helpful and responsive. The studio was new, clean and had everything we needed. Great location, if want to experience local culture. Famous attractions and the beach is a walking distance away from the studio. All in all, I can recommend this place, we had a great time staying here.
离机场很近，易于定位，可以自助入住。工作人员小姐姐很友好，因为没看到信息，送了我们越南的特产饼干。住宿地点离龙桥比较近，离沙滩步行30分钟，打车会更好。唯一有些需要注意的是，我们发现灶台上有很多的蚂蚁，不知道是从哪里来的（我们没有乱放食物），如果你在意的话需要注意这一点，其他都很好噢☺️

I had a great experience as this location is very near to Son Tra Night market and dragon bridge and also near Han river. The place is exactly as shown in pictures. The host were respectful and understanding.

We were so happy to of found this apartment, it was really so clean ans fresh with a really nice wrap around balcony, the host was also incredible and even helpled us find out nice stay. Can not recommend enough, also very near the dragon bridge (a must visit, especially the show at 9pm) and the night market.

J’ai adoré mon séjour dans cet AirBNB, la chambre si spacieuse et moderne, et on s’y sent tout de suite très à l’aise.
L’environnement est très calme, et légèrement excentré du centre ville, ce qui est absolument parfait 👍
De plus, les personnes qui s’occupe et des lieux sont adorables et très serviables.
Merci, tout était parfait 🙏🏻🙂‍↕️

I stayed there for 2 weeks.
It is a pleasant environment for 1 person working online.The balcony is a nice spot. There is nice co-working cafe around ‘one Sip’ .
Отличный выбор для тихого и спокойного пребывания в Дананге. Хозяева очень приятные и дружелюбные, все вопросы решали очень быстро и легко. Квартира новая и очень приятная. Однозначно рекомендую!
깔끔하고 시내근처라 데이트하기 너무좋았어요 호스트분도 너무좋습니당 자주이용할게요 😍😍

Our stay at Bao’s villa was absolutely fantastic! The beautiful villa and private pool were a huge win – we loved relaxing in the serene space after exploring Hoi An. The staff were so friendly and kind, always happy to help with any requests. We used many of their services, and everything was excellent, from housekeeping to transport. Their recommendations for Hoi An town were spot-on, thank you so much for a wonderful experience!

Bao was the perfect host! Nothing was too much effort. Amazing breakfast, fully stocked mini bar, which could be refreshed upon request. Private pool was spectacular! Perfect temperature, cleaned each morning. Bao also organised a spa treatment as well as a private transfer back to my apartment in Da Nang. Will definitely come back to stay on my next trip to Hoi An. Many thanks for an amazing break!

평화롭고 행복하고 자연친화적인 빌라였어요
다음에는 식구들과 방문하고싶은
고마웠어요 바오님과 직원분들 🙏🏻

Nice place with the necessary amenities. The pool was private and great! Had walkable areas along the river and a nice common area where breakfast is served. Also we were able to rent out a motorbike and go for an evening ride. The host was very helpful and friendly.
Great stay, extremely accommodating and responsive host. Highly recommend any traveller who is looking for a relaxed stay in Hoi An. Pool and room was cleaned regularly and promptly.

Our stay was fantastic and it all comes down to the manager Bao, he is so helpful and accommodating goes far and beyond to help with anything, the afternoon teas he supplies and breakfast are great, I don’t think we paid for a meal in 3 days.
Will definitely be back and would happily recommend this villa if heading to Hoi an.

The villa was immaculate, well kept and was beautiful. The services available for example the airport pickup was so handy. The customer service and breakfast was a highlight of our day. We also left some air pods and Bao organised a drop off to da nang for us for a very cheap price. Thank you so much

My husband and I highly recommend Bao’s beautiful villa.
All the ammenities were exactly as he described.
With our own private pool (which was cleaned daily)
Comfortable bed,daily room service and a delicious buffet breakfast.
Free bikes are supplied for a quick ride to the beach or into Hoi An’s ancient town.
Bao is an excellent Host and we will definitely visit again.
Thank you Bao

la permanenza è stata fantastica! abbiamo alloggiato in una delle villette del residence, in cui ci siamo potuti godere con grande tranquillità la piscina privata. La casa era pulita e fornita di tutto il necessario. Colazione e merenda ottime

제가 묵은 호실은 방1에 더블 침대, 방2에 트윈 침대가 있어 4인 가족에게 적합 합니다
개인풀도 넓어 가족이 와서 프라이버시가 보장되는 숙소입니다
무료아침식사도 정성이 깃든 요리로 배불리 먹을 수 있습니다
베트남식 개인 풀빌라를 원하는 분들께 추천합니다 그리고 직원들 모두가 친절 합니다 호실의 여유가 되면 early check-in도 가능하고 체크인시 베트남 쌀국수와 오후 3~5시까지 aftrrnoon tea 와 과일도 제공합니다. 저는 또 다낭역까지 drop off 무료 서비스도 받았습니다 정말 감동 이었습니다
Bao 와 호스트 분께. 한번 더 감사드립니다~^^♡

인생 최고의 숙소였습니다. 도착전부터 모든 답변이 빨랐고 지내면서도 바로 바로 답변을 해주어서 불편함이 없었습니다. 추천해준 레스토랑이 너무 맛있었고, 조식과 오후에 간식타임도 너무 훌륭했습니다. 수영장은 프라이빗하게 즐기기에 너무 훌륭했고 직원 모두 너무 친철해서 고마웠습니다. 정말 최고의 호스트입니다. 지내는 시간이 짧게 느껴져서 아쉽고 다시 또 방문하고 싶습니다. 마지막까지 모든 배려와 서비스에 감동입니다. 감사합니다

Amazing place with great attention to detail! Bao offered us so many extra services for 0 additional cost, we had free airport pick up, free ( and delicious) daily breakfast, free airport drop off and free laundry services!
The accomodation itself was so beautiful and peaceful, just like the photos with our own private pool and tub!! very easy and cheap to get to old town and major attractions!
Would happily recommend to anyone visiting Hoi An for a peaceful, cozy and well looked after stay!

Great place to stay. Bao was incredibly helpful with a flexible check in and was very quick to respond to any questions we had.
The place was exactly as described and the rest of the staff were lovely.

Absolutely had a blast here. Bao was great and recommended us so many things to do. Super hospitable and lovely.
Breeze restaurant nearby had amazing local food and the Massage was amazing. Went for massage everyday.
Definitely a 5 star stay

Our stay at palm view villa was fantastic! The room and pool were both very clean, with daily towel change and pool cleaning. A highlight for my partner and I was the free breakfast every morning, with a variety of delicious food and fresh fruit. Bao organised a free airport pick up for us also and gave many recommendations for places to visit and eat. Old town is only a 10 min motorbike ride away, and bikes were provided for free. Highly recommend this stay!

Thank you to Bao and Kim for having us. They were the most wonderful hosts. From the delicious beef pho and tea on arrival to the most delicious and fresh breakfasts. The villas are beautiful and private and we loved the private pool. We were very well looked after and felt right at home. We highly recommend and will definitely come back.

This villa was a dream come true - spacious, peaceful, and beautifully designed. We especially loved the private pool and the sunken indoor hot tub, which made every evening feel like a spa retreat. We felt completely relaxed from the moment we arrived.
The service was outstanding. Each morning started with a generous and delicious complimentary breakfast, and the free laundry service was a thoughtful bonus. Since we stayed 6 nights, we also received free airport pickup and drop-off, which made our arrival and departure completely stress-free.
Bao was an exceptional host—kind, responsive, and genuinely committed to making our stay perfect. His communication was clear and caring, and we felt truly looked after. We left with full hearts and can’t wait to return!

What a fantastic find Bao’s villa was, we loved having the privacy of our own courtyard and pool, villa has everything we needed for our weeks stay, easy to get to the old town and An Bang beach, Bao was always available to assist with any queries and recommendations, we used several of the restaurants he recommended and they were all very good. A big shout out to all of the staff on site, they always had a smile and were super friendly and helpful. Breakfast was excellent and nothing was too much trouble for them, great extras included free laundry service and airport pick up and drop off. We will definitely return to Palm Villa on our next trip to Vietnam, we would highly recommend Bao’s Villa’s we are sure you will enjoy it as much as we did!
Very welcoming hosts.  Quite hospitable and generous. Villa felt welcoming, safe and was in a nice quiet location. Easy to get a ride into town.

Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt, alle Mitarbeiter waren freundlich, Service war TOP , Bao hat immer schnell reagiert & und uns immer geholfen
Wir hatten einen tollen Aufenthalt gehabt
Vielen Dank
Linh

Nous avons passé un bon séjour. L’hôte est très accueillant. Nous sommes arrivés le soir, et il nous a offert un repas en arrivant.
Il nous a également aider pour prévoir un taxi jusque l’aéroport. Toujours disponible. Très bien

Une parenthèse magique, dans un écrin de verdure, de douceur, de gentillesse et de bienveillance...
Bao et l intégralité de son personnel, sont simplement parfaits...oeuvrant en permanence pour que notre séjour soit idyllique.
Encore 1000 mercis pour avoir fait de notre séjour un rêve.

Bao’s place was perfect. He went above and beyond to meet our wants and needs and ensured our stay was perfect. He arranged anything we needed all with a positive attitude and was super helpful with all questions. Breakfast each morning was fantastic and the staff are very friendly. I felt right at home in Bao’s place and would recommend it to everyone. We will definitely be returning back to his place when we visit Hoi An again in the future. Thanks for an unforgettable experience Bao!

One of the best homestay i've stayed at. Mr.Bao was spot on at every turns, anything you need no matter day or night, just send him a text and you will get it. Check in was quick and easy, he clearly explained every amenities in the room. Too bad we couldn't use the swimming pool cause of the weather, would definitely come back again in the summer though. Love it!

Một kì nghỉ hè vô cùng tuyệt vời. Với cá nhân tôi, Trang là một người vô cùng hiếu khách và vui tính. Tư vấn cho chúng tôi từ bữa sáng cho đến các địa điểm du lịch vô cùng chi tiết.
Bữa sáng ở đây thực sự là một điểm không thể nào chê được. Nó quá ngon!!!. Ngoài ra, chúng tôi còn được 1 ly đồ uống rất ngon nữa. Không những thế, giặt đồ hoàn toàn miễn phí. Điều này đỡ cho chúng tôi rất nhiều khoản chi phí ( vì tôi mang không nhiều quần áo ha ha )
Đây chính là kì nghỉ hè đáng nhớ nhất của tôi. Cảm ơn Coco Villa 6 và Trang đã cho tôi 1 kì nghỉ hè tuyệt vời.

Hữu duyên tìm được căn này mà mê luôn. Chủ nhà Trang siêu nhiệt tình và thân thiện, luôn sẵn sàng giúp đỡ. Phòng thì rộng rãi, sạch sẽ, giá còn siêu rẻ. Di chuyển đến các khu du lịch cũng tiện nữa. Siêu rcm nhaâ 🤩
Super clean and cozy place. Host was friendly and responsive. Highly recommend!
Place was clean and beautiful, felt comfortable staying here. Thank you

Happy Clam là homestay tốt nhất tôi từng ở. Phòng khách và phòng ngủ trang trí đẹp, tinh tế, sạch sẽ, đầy đủ tiện nghi. Phòng tắm và bồn tắm mới, siêu rộng. Nhân viên nhiệt tình, thân thiện, hữu ích, cung cấp địa chỉ quán ăn ngon. Vị trí homestay hoàn hảo, đi bộ ra biển 2 phút, đi vào phố cổ Hội An 20 phút, xung quanh nhiều nhà hàng, spa. Tôi hoàn toàn hài lòng khi ở đây.

Host was friendly and accommodative. The house is new, clean and cozy. Short walking distance to beach with many eateries nearby. However, if you were to book grab car or grab bike you have to walk to the main road which is just a short 1 min walk from the house. Highly recommend for anyone visiting Hoi An.

The house was as seen in photos.. very clean, fully equipped, comfortable beds, comfortable seating and the staff who look after the place were very friendly, helpfull and happy to answer any questions.. it’s a lovely house 50 meters from the beachand I would definitely recommend it as a lovely holiday home..👍🌅🙏

We had the best time ever staying at the Happy Clam! Both the home and the location far exceeded our expectations and we wish we could have stayed longer. We were so close to the beach (beautiful sea and sand, with sun loungers, umbrellas and a drinks service!) and to lots of great restaurants - all within walking distance. Hoi An old town was just fifteen mins in a cab.
Our host was very friendly, flexible and proactive, but we had total privacy for our stay. He also made some local recommendations, which turned out to be some of the best experiences of our whole Asia trip.
I would strongly recommend staying here if you have the chance, and I plan to do so again myself when I have the chance.

Wir hatten einen kurzen Aufenthalt bei Huong, das Apartment war sehr charmant und wirklich sauber!
Alles was man benötigt, ist vorhanden.
Sehr tolle und nette Gastgeber die einem sehr hilfsbereit alles erklären und gute Tipps für die umgeben kennen.
Jeder Zeit Zeit wieder!! ♥️🙏🏽😇

Vi nød virkelig vores ophold. Et af de bedste steder vi har været hvor det var privat og roligt. Ligger ganske kort til en dejlig strand på varme dage. Boligen var smukt indrettet og der var det vi skulle bruge, selv strand håndklæder. Der var også drikkevand til at tappe i køkkenet. Tæt på indkøb og gode små restauranter, et skønt kvarter.
Manager på huset var yderst hjælpsom. Vi blev hentet ved bussen og kørt til boligen, han sørgede for cykel udlejning og kørte til Da Nang og købte togbilletter til os.
Vi vil bestemt gerne komme igen og giver stedet vores varmeste anbefaling.

The Happy Clam guest house is a super stay for a couple. There are actually two apartments on the property with a shared entrance, we had the lower level. If you’re a bigger group you can book both apartments.
The decor is very tastefully done and there is a living space as well as separate bedroom, bathroom and kitchen with facilities for self catering. Washing machine also available. Living and bedroom space have ceiling fan and a/c.
Location is just super, on a quiet laneway away from the Main Street, and a 2 min walk to the beach. Also at quieter end of the beach too. Host is very responsive and can book airport taxi and tours, and has all the local spots to eat. If flying in, arrange airport taxi before arriving for easy transfer. Very responsive to messages.
A great stay had.

I think booking this place is so worth it more than any accommodations in Da Nang if you like a quiet place and near by the beach. The place is 50 meters to A Bang beach (so much better than Da Nang beach! And a good place for morning walks/jog and a cold plunge - we came here Feb!) and restaurants, mini mart, coffee shops, open market are all walking distance.
The house was perfect for us! It’s the little things that matter - they have yoga mat and weights for early morning exercise and stretching before hitting the beach for morning run, wide smart tv if you want to relax at night, the bathroom has a washing machine and a lot of hangers to dry clothes, a working desk with extension cord and a really good wifi (100mbps), a bread knife (!) to cut sourdough bread, cooking utensils are complete!
Linh also is the best host, her restaurant recommendations are always on point - we wanted local taste, not a lot of tourists, and she really gave us good places to eat! Always responsive!!!

Dilhan & Linh are great hosts. Very responsive and ready to help. We even got complementary breakfast on order if requested. We reached quite late and Dilhan helped us get inside without any hassle. It’s a beautiful house with all the amenities. The rooms were beautiful. It’s great for a long stay, especially for a large group. The beach is very close and Hoi An town is a 15 min Grab ride. Lot of eating places nearby and convenience stores.
别墅不太符合中国人的住宿习惯，所有卧室房门都是直接对外的，总觉得不安全。而且卫生间的墙有镂空的砖，这个设计有点反人类，对面别墅的人站在阳台能对我们的浴室一览无余。没办法只能找了个床垫立在墙外把镂空砖的镂空挡住。卧室私密性也不强，所有窗帘都有很大缝隙可以从外面直接看到房间内。在会安玩的话住这里还可以，但是去岘港有点远，Grab一次需要将近30万越南盾，交通成本巨大。

We had a wonderful getaway. Loved the proximity to Ang Bang beach. Loads of restaurants within a short walking distance.
The beds were a highlight - so comfortable.
A wonderful stay

Located just off the main road and a short walk (10 mins max) from An Bang Beach. Lots of amenities close at hand and only 10 mins in a taxi or 45 min speed march to Hue town centre.
Most will probably want to appreciate what both distinct areas have to offer and if you do visit Hoi An old town, have a look for Chickpea Restaurant, as they offer amazing cookery courses.
The accommodation is set up so you can take the whole house or just a room, and still get the same access to the kitchen, living space. Colonial style decor, but befitting of the area.
We loved Hoi An's relaxed vibe.

As someone who travels a lot around Asia, this was awesome quiet beach time and convenience to restaurants. The beach isn't too far, great restaurants and cafes within a short walk.
The bed was great! Big bathroom, connection to Wifi was easy (thanks Dilshan). I'm travel and work from my laptop, this was a must! No hesitation to stay here again next time I visit Hoi An.

Super comfortable stay with cozy beds and linen and lovely Hoi An-style decor that gave the villa a warm local charm.
The beach was just a quick 2 min stroll away, and we loved having so many great cafes and restaurants that were all within a 5-minute walk.
The old town of Hoi An was also just a quick taxi ride away and offered more of the Hoi An charm this area is known and loved for.

I had a wonderful stay. It suited all my needs perfectly. Easy walking distance to An Bang beach and restaurants and yet out of the way so was peaceful and relaxed.
It was nice and quiet at night ( it’s why I like the area). Also just a short grab ride to Hoi An if you want a bit more going on.
I’ll definitely stay again on my next visit.

I'm a remote worker, I am lucky enough that I get to combine work and holidays.
I couldn’t have asked for a better spot — lightning-fast internet, comfy workspaces, everything set up to keep the productivity flowing.
But it wasn’t just about work. A leisurely stroll took me straight to the beach, and I was spoiled for choice with cafés and restaurants around the place. Perfect rhythm: deep focus by day, chilled evenings with good food and salty air. Bliss! Definitely coming back for more.
Thank you Mia and Dilhan for having me here!
this house was large and spacious and in a great location.  The beds were extremely comfortable too.
Good stay inside the city. everything within 20-30 min distance

Absolutely wonderful stay at the Hoi An Beach Villa! From the moment we arrived, the check-in process was smooth and effortless, setting a relaxed tone for our vacation. The villa's location is just perfect—mere steps away from the serene beach, and surrounded by an exciting array of cafes and bars, offering a taste of the vibrant local scene.
The real highlight, though, has to be the comfort of the accommodation. The beds were incredibly comfortable, ensuring a deeply restful night's sleep after our days spent exploring and enjoying the sun. It's clear that no detail has been overlooked in making sure guests have everything they need to relax and rejuvenate.
Big thanks to the Hoi An Beach Villa team for making our stay so memorable. We can't wait to return!

La casa es hermosa , con todas las comodidades .
La anfitriona súper atenta 🥰

很棒的住宿體驗
附近有很多spa

Dịp này mình đi công tác, có thêm mẹ và các em bé, 2 Đồng Chý nhỏ nhà mình khá thích ko gian của LAGON, những lần sau ghé nếu thuận tiện cho công việc nhất định mình sẽ book LAGON.💝
Cảm ơn Khoa, 2bác là ba mẹ của bạn ấy và TEAM đã Support hỗ trợ nhiệt tình ạ!❤️
Mình thuê giùm em mình đến du lịch tại Đà Nẵng vừa nhận phòng rất ưng ý và bảo mình để lại đánh giá tốt và sẽ quay lại đây ở khi có dịp đến Đà Nẵng
Anh chủ & ba má anh chủ rất thân thiện, đáng để trải nghiệm. Mình và gia đình rất ưng ý trong chuyến đi vừa rồi. Recomment các bác home này nhé
Sạch sẽ. Gọn gàng, host nhiệt tình . Sẽ quay lại nếu có dịp
다소 관광지와 떨어져 있지만 조용하게 지내기 좋고 호스트가 적극적으로 필요를 채워줘서 만족합니다 ~

A wonderful and worthwhile getaway.
The apartment is located on the 4th floor of a quiet serviced area, just a few minutes from the airport and city center. It features two master bedrooms and one smaller room. The main bedroom stands out with its open view and abundant natural light every day.
The surrounding area is peaceful, with plenty of cozy local eateries nearby. The apartment is fully equipped, perfect for family vacations, where you can enjoy going out and still gather for home-cooked meals.
One minor downside: the bathroom has a slight odor, if improved it would be perfect.
The host is hospitable, friendly, and very thoughtful.
Definitely a place worth experiencing!

공항에서 그랩으로 10분이면 갑니다. 공항에 늦게 도착하시는 분들께 특히 좋을 것 같아요.
주변에 카페와 작은 마트들이 있어서 생활하기에 편리하고. 방 크기가 커서 여러명이 가도 공간이 충분합니다. 침구가 아주 깨끗해서 좋았어요. 잘 지내고 갑니다!

Khoa is very helpful and kind person. We had a very late check-in but we figured out everything easily because of very informative instructions in advance. When we had any issues or questions, he responded very fast and everything was resolved perfectly. The place is great to experience the local life in Da Nang. On the other hand, if you are not used to traffic noise, it feels too loud because of vivid Da Nang life below in the main street but closing windows and using AC or fans helps. Thanks for a comfortable stay!

Clean and accessible to different restaurants and karaoke
But spa nearby close very early
This 2/2 was a great price and accommodated 2 female travelers perfectly. Full kitchen with essentials and plenty hot water for showers. Easy to get anywhere via Grab

Khoa is amazingly responsive. We received great hospitality from him in terms of arranging for new bedsheets, water and detergent for our extended stay. The apartment is very cozy and have everything you need!
The place is within a local neighbourhood and it's a new experience to walk around there and get very affordable and bang-for-buck massages & hair saloon experience. The airbnb is above a shop lot and I feel very safe staying there.

Lived at Khoa apartment for 2,5 months, absolutely loved the area and apartment itself. Khoa was helpful all the way through, writes I'm perfect English, so no communication troubles – which is amazing.
The apartment is just as it's in the pictures, maybe a little restoration needed, because of a lot of rains in Da Nang.
Overall, we were absolutely happy to live there and very thankful to Khoa ❤️
여기는도심이랑거리도 가깝고 관광가기가편리합니다 독립된곳이라 조용합니다 벌레도없어서 좋았어요 단지 샤워할때물이 좀더 많이 나왔음좋겠어요 가격대비 사용하기 좋았어요 커피숍도 바로 옆이라 좋았습니다
Good and cooperative host
Ubicado en una zona céntrica,  se llega muy rápido a cualquier parte de la ciudad.
Nice Apartment
入住很顺利，房东人很好，所有事情都能够沟通，提供了很多帮助

Mình và gia đình có chuyến đi tới Đà Nẵng và rất may gặp Khoa. Chỗ ở của Khoa rất sạch sẽ, đúng như mô tả trong ảnh. Khoa cũng gửi cho mình một số hướng dẫn chi tiết về nhận phòng và các địa điểm ăn uống mua sắm xung quanh. Chỗ ở rất yên tĩnh và mình thật sự thích cái cảm giác thức dậy mỗi sáng vì có thể thấy được bình minh. Cảm ơn Khoa vì sự hiếu khách của bạn.
Phòng đẹp, dịch vụ tốt và chủ nhà cũng tận tình. Hơi khó tìm nhà một chút, chắc sẽ quay lại.
Overall the place is exactly same with the photos. Cozy to stay with family and friends. The host is friendly and helpful.
The apartment has exactly what we wanted for our long stay. It made us feel like home.

가족과 첫 자유여행으로  베트남에 왔어요. 첫날은 늦은 새벽에 도착하기 때문에 공항에서 가깝고 가성비가 좋은 숙소를 검색했습니다. 이 숙소는 정말 믿을 수 없이 싸고 훌륭한 숙소입니다. 호스트가 머무는 데 필요한 것들을 섬세하게 세심하게 구비해뒀어요. 채광 좋은 큰 방과 딱 좋은 크기의 작은 방도 깨끗합니다. 호스트가 친절하게 사전에 안내를 잘 해주세요. 잘 묵고 갑니다.
침구도 깨끗하고 가격대비 좋은 숙소 입니다. 호스트가 친절합니다

The little pie was a treat to say the least. Neatly tucked away behind picturesque views, while still within a 2 minute grab from all of the many sights and restaurants found in the cities old town. Each room offered a home away from home, particularly in tandem with the warm welcoming from staff, accommodating, attentive, this stay is so much more than the beautiful communal pool and Nordic inspired interior design. I couldn’t recommend it more - thank you again 🪷🪷🪷🪷

可愛らしい空間に癒されました。
８月の滞在は虫とヤモリに気をつけないといけなかったです。
持ち込んだ蚊取りが聞いたのかベット中に落ちていました🥹

This stay has been the best experience of our life, from the wonderful breakfast, the daily swim, the immersive nature and the wonderful staff. Everything about little pie hoi an has been a magical experience, truly almost like we are in a beautiful ghibli movie.
We truly appreciate the attention to care and detail and hope this place will exist forever.
You guys made our holiday perfect.
With lots of love,
Binh and Momo

Very nice place that matched the photos perfectly. The breakfast was delicious and the staff super warm and welcoming. It’s located just a short ride from the Old Town and there are bikes available or you can easily take a Grab. Would definitely stay here again!
老闆回訊息速度很快, 員工也很友善, 早餐也很好吃. 因為住宿地點的確實在大自然的地方, 蚊蟲無法避免.
非現実的なほど色鮮やかな自然に囲まれ、心穏やかに過ごすことができました。布団の上に小さな虫が多数落ちていたり、イモリの糞が落ちてきますが、最後にはそれを受け入れて自然と共存するマインドになれました。思い出深い経験が出来ました。

とてもゆったりした時間を過ごせました。
ご飯やウェルカムドリンクも美味しく頂き、
プールや可愛い猫に癒されながら素敵な
ステイをさせていただきました＾＾
大好きな空間なので次ホイアンに来たら
また泊まりたいと思います。
ありがとうございました♪

Incredibly beautiful house - I’m fully mesmerised here and so not want to leave in the end. Every corner is designed and decorated with pure love and dedication. Living here definitely makes one appreciate the beauty and romance of life. Not to mention the thoughtful welcome drinks and fruits, and absolutely delicious breakfast… The house is in the countryside, so expect bugs and sounds of nature in the surrounding. The tra que vegetable village the house is located in is a gem too. Will 10000% return!

The room was absolutely lovely, and the entire B&B was full of charming French flair. The host was warm and clearly passionate about life—the welcome fruit and breakfast they provided were delicious!
That said, due to the natural surroundings, there were quite a few insects in the room (spiders, geckos, etc.), which might be unavoidable given the location. Also, the walls are a bit thin, so we could hear the neighbor’s roosters in the morning.
Overall, a unique and cozy stay—just be prepared for a rustic touch!

너무 이쁘고 좋은숙소 였어요
조식과 커피가 너무 맛있었습니다
모든 공간이 다 좋았어요
귀여운 직원분과 사장님부부 모두 친절하십니다
숙소가 있는 마을의 작은밭들도 좋았어요
방에 도마뱀이 있었는데 저는 크게 불편하지 않았습니다
Very beautiful place, close to the beach. The breakfast coffee is also really good. It is a nice place where you can spend you day, relax, listen to the wind and and clear your mind.

まるでジブリの世界のような空間だった
非日常的なのに毎日そこで過ごしていたかのような心地よさもあり素敵な一日を過ごすことができました
Very cozy home, beautiful garden. Everything is greattt. The host did prepare super yummy breakfast during my stay. Loveee.

Очень понравилось проживание в мини филиале эстетики) девушка была очень рада тут оказаться для ее мини эстета душа очень радовалась.
Пинтрест дом) хозяйка дома приготовила очень вкусный завтрак, в целом смело могу рекомендовать это место. Большое спасибо!
베트남 호이안에 온다면 이유는 이 숙소때문입니다. 정말 행복한 시간이었어요

Charming home, amazing breakfasts! Hosts take great care in making the house cozy. Every detail, from flower arrangements, to choice of furniture, & table ware was so thoughtful. The Airbnb feel like a destination itself.
The breakfast menu had a good selection - local to western food, with a variety of drinks and fruits. It prepped me well for day ahead & I always look forward to it.

Such a lovely house! We enjoy every moment while stay here. The breakfast taste good. Very quiet place near the farm,but few steps walk to get foods, cafe and spa. Also near the beach, we rent the motobike to go to old town. definitely will be back to Hoian for this house:)

I booked this homestay while recovering from surgery, hoping for a supportive environment. Communication was poor from the start—Pham ignored the messesger service WA  and insisted on using Istgm , even for urgent matters. Breakfast was paid for but withheld the first day due to a bizarre ordering system she failed to explain. When I missed it again due to post-op pain, I was scolded as “wasteful” rather than checked on. The location was noisy—karaoke and roosters from 3am—and remote, with no mention of this in her listing. Despite agreeing in writing to refund me for unused nights, she later denied it. Airbnb eventually stepped in with a goodwill refund. I was treated rudely, accused of lying, and made to feel unsafe and unwelcome. This is not a warm family homestay—it’s a business focused only on money. I left early and moved to a hotel that was cheaper, more peaceful, and genuinely caring. I would never recommend this stay to anyone, especially those with health needs.

Their was the great place, if need to be rest at quite place, recommend!!
Good breakfast and cutest cat available for healing your holiday :D

breakfast is good . the interior is so beautiful .
the host who attend us is very friendly and helpful as well.
i wish i can come back to hoi an soon .
anyways the house located in narrow ally , which some grab driver will have difficulty to go in . but not a big issue for us .

ここに泊まりたくてホイアンに行きました。
まるで楽園のような場所で夢のような時間を過ごせました。ベトナム旅行は素晴らしい思い出になりました。
英語が話せない私たち日本人にとても親切にしていただきありがとうございました。
本当にありがとうございました。

今まで泊まったゲストハウスの中で間違いなくナンバーワンでした！
たっくさんおすすめしたいことがあるけれど、長くなってしまうので一言、ここに来て嫌な思いをする人はいません。
最高の旅を彩ってくれる素敵な空間です。
ぜひ迷わず泊まって欲しいです。

Staying at Little Pie was a real pleasure and we would not hesitate to stay there again.
The beautifully curated home is well located in the farming village outside of (but not too far from) the busy streets of Hoi An, the rooms are clean and neat, the breakfasts included with your stay are delicious, and the host family are extremely welcoming - they even prepared some lovely hot chocolates for us when the weather turned for the worse and it began to storm during our stay.
Thank you for everything and have a merry Christmas Little Pie!
在会安最喜欢的民宿，环境干净美好，房主夫妻温和友善，很用心打理的空间，早餐太好吃了，一步一景，已经在计划下次再来了

Location: great, you'll get winmart just down your apartment, 24/7 cafés nearby, good local restaurants. Riverside, good for walk in evening.
Away from tourists and bustling streets if you want to have peaceful living. No construct nearby, unlike most of places in Da Nang.
Accessible Location to most of places in Da Nang.
Home: Nice clean and tidy smart apartment, filled with amenities and all your needs. Host was really helpful during entire stay.
Decided to live here for more longer.
Nhà rất mới và sạch phòng đẹp hơn trên mô tả nữa siêu hài lòng ạ
호스트의 의사소통이 신속하며 아름다운 숙소. 밤이면 야시장으로 변하는 도로 끝에 있으며 조용합니다. 밤에는 차량 접근이 어려워요. 5분 정도 걸어나가야 차량을 잡을 수 있습니다.
Amazing accomodation. Perfect location - right by the night market. Construction next door was a bit loud but out of their control. Enjoyed our stay highly recommend. Just like the photos

A fantastic place to stay, perfect location in the old town, just round the corner from the night market but looking out over the river and peaceful and quiet. We were 3 so had the 2 rooms/ apartments on the first floor, one with a big balcony at the front with views over the river, the other smaller but both beautiful, clean and with very comfortable beds and spacious bathrooms. Thanh and Hannie couldn’t have been more helpful and responded very quickly to messages. You do have to time any arrival and departure by taxi to happen outwith markets times but that’s easy to do and the place is definitely worth it. I would recommend this place 100%.

Had an amazing stay at Thanh’s place. It is located in the Hoi An Ancient Town, right beside a river where you can see small fishing boats. Everything (restaurants and attractions) was within walking distance, which made it convenient for us to come back for afternoon naps. Most importantly, Thanh’s place was very clean (especially the toilet) and comfortable with an amazing river view. Although we were not able to check in early, we were allowed to leave our luggage in the staff room while waiting.
Overall, we had a great stay and would definitely recommend it to others.
Perfect stay, everything was clean and easy to reach. Also right next to the night market which made everything accessible from walkable distance.
super comfortable, very nice apartment nice and close to old town. I would stay here again.
The location is apt for family stay the rooms are well maintained. We wish we had a longer stay to enjoy the home and we will ensure to book again.

This apartment was the perfect place to stay during my trip to Hoi An. It’s located just steps from the night market and Old Town, making it super easy to explore the city on foot. The design of the studio is minimal yet warm, with beautiful natural touches like wood and clay that made it feel peaceful and unique.
The king-sized bed was incredibly comfortable, and the balcony overlooking the Thu Bon River was such a lovely spot to unwind with tea or a book. The kitchenette had everything I needed to reheat food or make a quick meal, and the bathroom was modern and well-stocked with shampoo, shower gel, and even a hairdryer.
Do note there’s no elevator, so you’ll need to take the stairs to the second floor—but honestly, the peaceful vibe and thoughtful touches more than make up for it. I’d definitely stay here again next time I’m in Hoi An!
Cutest little place with a wonderful balcony with the view on the river. Very good communication. Spacious and clean rooms.
호이안 야시장 끝편에 위치한 편안한 숙소 입니다. 잘 쉬다 갑니다.
Amazing place, beautiful views, seamless check in and checkout.
Замечательное жилье в очень тихом районе. Никакого постороннего шума. Квартиры очень красивые, чистые. Балкон - отдельная любовь❤️
房間和描述一致，乾淨整潔

위치도 좋고 깔끔했습니다.
방 2개가 문으로 구분되어 있어서 편했어요
Top. Klasse! Danke!

Chuyến đi của tôi trở nên trọn vẹn hơn nhờ chỗ ở tuyệt vời này. Phòng đẹp, sạch sẽ, trang trí tinh tế và đầy đủ tiện nghi. Vị trí yên tĩnh nhưng vẫn gần biển (họ đã bố trí xe đạp để đạp ra biển và đi dạo). Chủ nhà cực kỳ thân thiện, luôn sẵn sàng hỗ trợ bất cứ lúc nào. Rất đáng để quay lại lần nữa
Very nice Airbnb super clean, cozy and he host is super helpful and nice. even their drivers also very good. will definitely recommend this place and very nice for family to stay :)

Спасибо за заселение, хозяин очень оперативно отвечает на сообщения, это очень классно.
В целом жилье соответствуют фотографиям и цене-качеству.
Не смогу включить кондиционер, но мне все быстро показали и включили.
Спасибо!
The place is very clean and they are very friendly and helpful
Great location and worthy to the price paid
Ok ạ
Xung quanh nhìu quán xá, phòng sạch sẽ đủ đồ như sống ở nhà luôn

Simply the best property , Even it is near to restaurents and my khe beach felt like private ,very clean and wonderful view balcony ! host is very responsive and clear instructions finally i highly recommend this place .
Rất tốt

Cara’s place is right in the heart of Da Nang, just steps away from all kinds of restaurants, coffee shops, convenience stores, and even a pharmacy. The apartment is spacious, clean, and comes with a cool projector for movie nights. Cara was also kind enough to let us check in as early as 10 AM, which we really appreciated. One of our favorite spots was the aesthetic balcony where we enjoyed our morning coffee while watching the city come to life. If you’re looking for a big, affordable place to stay in Da Nang, I definitely recommend this one!
A great stay, fab location. Really liked the door code rather than a key. Comfy firm bed. Shower room can get a little slippy.
It's a great location to be at close with everything with tons of things to do around. Clean and nice.
Great place, I loved the room, the  balcony . Great location in-between the Mexican restaurant and tattoo parlor.
Excellent hôte hyper réactive toujours à trouver des solutions, cordiale et aimable.
很好的一次入住体验
A very nice apartment in a good area. Easy and fast communication with the host. Only bad thing was the strong smell of mold. Except that a very nice place
房东回应及时，房子宽敞明亮，设施齐全，连续住了3天，体验非常好
Good accommodation, kind and helpful host, the accommodation matches the photos, there are shops nearby, near the beach, near delicious places, I advise you!
Good accommodation, kind and helpful host, the accommodation matches the photos, there are shops nearby, near the beach, near delicious places, I advise you!
Muy buena ubicación !
Wonderful place! Great location, clean, great value etc… very good hosts.
Very good

I wish I had more than one night to stay! The apartment is brand new and spotlessly clean. The location is very peaceful with great local restaurants nearby. It's only a 5-7 minute walk along the riverfront sidewalk and you are in the heart of the ancient town. I highly recommend this place for anyone coming to Hoi An
Chỗ ở yên tĩnh, sạch đẹp, an ninh tốt. Chủ nhà thân thiện, nhiệt tình. Dịch vụ tốt, chuyên nghiệp. Khu vực xung quanh đẹp, gần biển và nhà hàng.

Hana House was fantastic in every way. The actual property is even better than the photos. The location is perfect with easy access to everything, and the beach is just a short walk away. The host was very responsive and resolved any questions promptly. Highly recommend for a comfortable and convenient stay.

Beautiful property. Thu was very responsive and courteous. I’d recommend staying here. Walking distance to the beach and great restaurants. Great deal it’s a steal to be honest. Anytime I’m in Da Nang I’ll stay here!
골목 안쪽에 있어 숙소를 찾기 어려울 수 있으나, 호스트가 안내를 자세히 해주셔서 바로 찾을 수 있었습니다. 또한 호스트는 응답이 매우 빠르고 친절하셨습니다. 숙소는 사진 그대로 크고 청결하여 좋은 시간을 보내기 딱이었고, 미케비치 거의 바로 앞이라 위치 접근성 너무 좋았습니다!

명시된 시설 완비되어있으며 최고로 빠른 피드백이 너무 좋음. 처음에는 숙소 찾는게 어려울것 같았지만 도로에서 너무나도 찾기 쉽게 되어있음 . 방도 사진으로 보는 것 그대로임 . 가성비 자체는 최고수준
필요한 것이 있을때 연락하면 거의 실시간으로 소통가능함. 시설 청결도 최상. 너무 더운 날씨였는데 실내 에어컨 컨디션 최고 . 전체적으로 넓고 크진 않지만 전혀 불편함이 없는 시설임 . 흡연실도 1층 뒷편에 아주 깔끔하게 되어있음 . 같이 간 흡연자도 전혀 불편함을 느끼지 못했다고 함. 바로 옆은 해변이 있으며 교통도 도로 옆에 있어서 그랩이나 택시 이용 편함. 여행이 끝난 뒤 같이 간 일행이 휴대폰 분실하고 왔는데 바로 확인 뒤 한국으로 배송해주심 . 한국이 아닌 나라에서 이런 경우 처음 겪음 . 호스트가 진짜 양심 있고 정직하며 헌신적인 듯 함. 필요한 모든 부분 해결해주는 해결사 느낌임 . 여행 기간 동안 날씨도 좋지 않고 너무 덥기도 했지만 숙소에 대한 불편은 아예 없었음. 마지막 날 항공권 시간이 오후 12시여서 예약없으면 약간의 비용으로 늦은 퇴실도 가능함. 다음에도 다낭을 다시 오게 되면 맘편하게 예약하고 싶은 숙소임

호스트의 응답이 빠르며 매우 친절했습니다.
내집처럼 편했으며 모든면이 만족스러웠습니다.
다만 바선생이 조금 있습니다. 이건 호텔아닌이상 어디든 나올수있는거라
잘 처리하지 못하시는분들은 고려하시면 좋을것같습니다.

Great accommodation for friends or family. Located right next to the beach in a residential area but still close to everything like restaurants, shops, etc.
Hoai was a very accommodating host, super helpful and responsive. We very enjoyed our stay and highly recommend this place! Would come back!

너무 깔끔하고 친절하게 대해주셔서 고마웠고,
피드백이 빨라서 좋았습니다.
잘 쉬다가 갑니다.
다낭에 또 온다면 무조건 여기 올거에요!
큰길가에 근처에 있어서 교통이 너무 편리하고 호스트 응답도 엄청 빨랐습니다. 그리고 체크인 할 때 마중 나와서 반겨주었습니다.  만약 다시 온다면 무조건 이 숙소를 찾을 것 입니다!

I with my friends great time in here, everything is new, the flowers and the back yard is very chill!!! It's near My Khe Beach, but unlucky that it's raining in Da Nang now. Love to book again in the next time come to Da Nang!
숙소가 너무 깨끗하고 좋았습니다  신경을 많이 쓴 기분을 받았고 체크인과 체크아웃을 도와주셨습니다.

현지 인들 집인근에 있는 깔끔한숙소라
현지감성도 느낄수 있어서 좋음
숙소는 매우 깨끗함

정말 모든게 만족스러운 airbnb였음.
다시 꼭 방문하고 싶음.
주변에 공사를 하는곳이 있는게 단점이지만 숙소 자체는 완전 만족입니다.
10 points so goodddddddd!!! Must try❤️
房间很好，有一种家的感觉，很适合那种想旅行的时候也能有像家一样的感觉的人，房东人非常好，有问题随时都可以提，这是我呆过最好的homestay，确实像home一样，但是它的硬伤就是离市区有点远，grab过去要半个小时以及60k，有条件可以租个摩托车或者电动车，一天只需要15k，岘港有很多好玩的地方，待个四五天完全没问题，这是我给不想住那种集体宿舍比如说青年旅社然后又想省点钱的人最好的方案

Anh and her family was very friendly and I really enjoyed my stay in their place. For backpackers like me, it's a great location, wonderful food, lot of mini eateries which I enjoyed. The people were very friendly and kind. I want to experience by staying in a middle class local neighborhood and this location was fantastic, this time because of personal reasons I left the place a bit early, I would certainly come back again to enjoy the hosts and the local hospitality, I wish them very well, finally I have to say, I love Vietnam. Thanks Anh, Son and little Sam.

Booked for my family and they were extremely satisfied with the stay.  The rooms were clean and the home was welcoming. The host was always responsive and helpful plus the check in/ check out process was really smooth. Highly recommended!
Great stayed. The room was clean. The host is responsive and friendly. Definitely recommend.
Comfortable, clean room! This was a really nice stay! Very easy check in instructions too!
ertesi gün uçağımız olduğu için bu konumu tercih ettik ve memnun kaldık. iletişimi iyiydi ve temiz ve rahat bir konaklama idi. teşekkür ediyoruz ☺️
这个房子是最完美的homestay，不像有的房子只是公寓
here i am, coming back once again.

This accommodation is really close to an bang beach and inside was amazing. You can do bbq right next to pool. The pool in villa was clean and pool cleaner comes regularly. Room was clean and aesthetic . I highly recommend you to stay here, and the host will welcome you and reply you really fast.

Excellent location. Very near beach. Excellent and very friendly host. Very responsive.
Clean and modern home with all facilities mentioned. . Flexible with checking out .
너무 좋았어요 아쉬운 점은 옆집과 수영장을 공용으로 쓰는 부분을 제외하고는 너무 이쁘게 잘되어 있는 빌라고 안방비치 와 가깝습니다

Excellent place to stay, centrally located with lots of cafes, bars and restaurants in the neighborhood. Short walk to the beach and easy access to the old town. The accommodation itself is modern, quiet, very clean and well laid out. I’ll stay there again!

Wow!  This stunning place felt like I was staying in an interior design magazine!  The Zen minimalist design with lovely gardens and tranquil spaces and pool made me want to stay forever!  Not just because of the serene beauty, but also because Quynh has thought of every possible convenience, providing comfort touches such as luxurious bathrobes and great smelling toiletries.   We were especially impressed with the quality bed linens and great pillows - even a special orthopedic neck pillow!The layout of the apartment was wonderful too.  There were three of us staying here (my husband and I, and our friend) and it was great to have two spacious bedrooms, each with its own private full bathroom (complete with garden!). The work desks in each bedroom were great as we needed to do some remote work during our stay and the internet was superb.  Communication with Trinh was fabulous and she was lovely at arranging everything we needed!
Nice place, close to everything. Host was very good and would recommend
all great! :)

This is a hidden gem along a very busy area in Hoi An’s old town. Despite the convenience, the accommodation was quiet safe and private yet steps away from great food and shopping. Sleeps 3 -4 perfectly and had basic but adequate amenities. The receptionist was very responsive and helpful.

This place is a beautiful cozy place tucked away in  bustling old quarter Hoi An. The owners of the property were amazing with quick responses to any questions we had and set us up with recommendations to amazing restaurants. They handled the booking of two shows for us and let us pay at the end through Air Bnb. Thank you guys for letting us stay we had a great time!

we had a beautiful stay at Tam’s place. it’s in the heart of Hoi An’s old town- so accessible to the best food spots, everything in walking distance etc. you’re really able to make yourself at home here, and we did just that! bonus tip: the tea house next door is incredible! couldn’t recommend this stay enough. thanks again for having us. 🙌⭐️

The place was amazing! It is walking distance to all the places we wanted to see while still quiet and peaceful. She met us when we arrived to help us get settled in and had hot tea ready as a welcome drink. She helped us book tours and shows for vacant days, without being too pushy. Definitely would recommend staying here.

Wir sind 4 Freunde und waren für zwei Nächte in der Unterkunft.
Tam hat super schnell auf Nachrichten reagiert und uns viele Tips für die Umgebung gegeben. Sie war jederzeit erreichbar. Die Unterkunft lag super zentral, sodass wir alles schnell erreichen konnten. Das Haus hatte auf jeden Fall viel Charme.
Das einzige was wir hatten war, dass es oben zum schlafen leider sehr warm war, aber das empfindet vielleicht jeder anders:)

This place is really cool! Great location right in the middle of the ancient quarter it’s walkable to everything, and easy to hire a bike or scooter to get further out. Hien was very friendly and available to answer any questions. At night, the laneway right outside fills with tables of locals eating at a popular chicken and rice restaurant - very vibey! The house feels very authentic and is just a nice place to hand out. Because it’s so old the shower situation is a bit “rustic” but not a major issue.

Tam er en super imødekommende vært.
Stemningsfuldt, autentisk hus. Smuk udsigt fra 1. sal. Dejlig stemning i huset.
Restaurant ved siden af satte borde op i gyden, lige uden for veranda. Støjede noget, gjorde det svært at have privatliv på veranda. Det var på samme tid sjovt, lokalt og irriterende.

The house is charming and thoughtfuly designed. Every detail whispers heritage, from the carved wooden doors to the beautiful roof. Clean, comfy bed, and strong WiFi.
The location is also great, near all the restaurants but tucked away from the bustle of ancient town.
The hosts are awesome too. They helped us booked our transfers and were responsive.
This house is a rare find. We were sitting in the ground floor patio and a few people who booked hotels away from ancient town asked us how we found this cute stay. We said Airbnb.
올드타운 중심에 위치한 숙소. 베트남의 전통적인 미를 담아냈고 독채를 모두 쓸 수 있습니다. 불편한건 하나도 없었고 모두 만족스러웠습니다. 호이안 다시 와도 여기 묵을 것 같아요.

We loved this experience, Hein was the best host I’ve ever had and I wish I had someone like her in every place I’ve stayed haha. She was very attentive and friendly and has great knowledge about the area. Thank you!

We spent 3 nights at the B&B and had great time. The location is perfect and quiet. The neighbour has a local cafe with magical atmposphere for the morning. The host was super friendly and proactive, helping us with good recommandations, activities, laundry and transport. Highly recommended!

Perfect location in the heart of the old town. Host extremely helpful. Only tricky thing for us Americans was hang drying our clothes, probably easier to take them to a laundry shop especially with the humidity of Hoi An making drying difficult. Otherwise easy 5/5 rating.

A lovely house in a quiet Hoi An laneway. The host was amazingly responsive and helpful, organising bikes, a food tour, Bamboo Circus tickets and a tailor suggestion in advance. We opted for the transfer from Da Nang and were dropped to within 20 metres of the property. Hien checked us in and was a WA message away throughout our stay. Hoi An can get busy at times, but La Maison is an oasis of calm and a short stroll from everything in Hoi An - if you wake up early enough, you can have it all to yourself (mostly).
Hien很热情，提前沟通抵达时间并在房源等待。房子位于会安古城内，打车下车后需步行5mins，步行可逛各个地方，很方便。房子有两层，一层有客厅厨房卫生间，二层有一个双人床和一个上下铺和一个可洗澡卫生间，二楼有阳台，一楼有个小院子，很chill可拍片。装修风格很喜欢，就是晚上有蚊子，记得准备防蚊用品。算是为数不多的古城内的民宿，推荐！

We had a wonderful stay! Beautiful house well located in the heart of the old town. The host was very responsive, and helped us hire bicycles and book tickets to the Lune Centre. I’d definitely recommend staying here for the true Hoi An experience ☺️

The old town is very close, which is fun and lively But the moment you enter the alley where the house is located, it has a peaceful atmosphere This is a place I would like to visit again I was very satisfied

This house is absolutely incredible! A perfect place to stay in Hoi An. A serene, private house  located right amongst everything in the centre of town. Tam is a fantastic host, recommending and giving advice for everything to do in this wonderful place. Organising cars, trips and things to do for us. Can’t recommend enough! Thank you Tam 🙏🏻

Very charming and rustic home in an unbeatable location. Beautifully decorated. All major attractions, shopping and restaurants are a few steps away. It was quite clean, however the upstairs bathroom was in need of some repair with a couple holes in the wall around the shower area and some bugs (although expected in this area). Definitely a learning curve with the shower head- it is only useable as handheld.
We brought bad weather with us as we ended up in a typhoon for most of our stay. Hien, our host, ensured we were dry and safe during this time. We did not get to enjoy the courtyard or balcony as we had hoped.
Our host was very responsive and kind and eager to help with any questions/concerns. The linens and towels appeared a little old but they felt clean. Space was a little tight between me and my mom. I would prefer to stay again by myself.
清潔で、街中にあるのに静か。朝のまだ静かな旧市街の散歩が楽しかった。2段ベッドも子連れには便利でした。

We really enjoyed staying at Tam’s place. It right in the old town, so everything is at walking distance. Hien was very responsive, always being available if we had questions. She definitely made the stay effortless. The house is very cozy.
Note: since the house has such a central location, it may get a bit noisy in the night.
Overall, we really enjoy our stay and can definitely recommend staying at Tam’s place.

we had a lovely stay at Tam's place. it looked just like the photos and was very conveniently located to the old town. she kindly helped organize transport to and from the airport and was ok with us checking in very late after our flight was delayed. it was the perfect size for me and my partner and our 11 month old baby. I would recommend.
Beautiful home. Tastiest chicken rice spot literally next door. Host was amazing ☺️
Good location. But we felt very hot during the summer month.
Very nice and perfect place! It near the main street but still very quiet.

We loved the place and the location was away from the busy town but just a quick grab would take you inside the downtown within 5 mins.
The place was even bigger than we expected and it was so homey and comfortable.
The hosts kept communication open even at night in case we needed anything. It was the best place that i have ever stayed so far. I highly recommend this place to other guests to enjoy their time in Hoi An.
Beautiful private villa just 10 mins out of the heart of Hoi An, many ammenities available and host super helpful and responsive. Amazing spot and lots of aesthetic moments to be captured here!

一切都很好
來越南峴港好選擇
good service，nice conditions.

Extremely clean. Hot showers!
One of the most beautiful beaches in the world is only a five minute walk away, and it's 150k/day for a motorbike rental to cross one of the bridges and explore downtown.
In over a decade of using the site, this was one of the best Airbnb rooms I've ever booked. Easily the best kitchen.
The staffs are very kind and helpful. The location is very close to the beach and also many restaurants.  The price was very cheap. The room was clean and they also provide dishes for cooking.

Vị trí khách sạn thuận tiện gần biển và các quán ăn. Phòng rộng rãi và khá mới, trang bị nhiều đồ dùng thuận tiện mặc dù có một số chỗ còn khác với ảnh ban đầu tôi được xem trước khi đến.

If you are in Da Nang, this homestay is incredible! Super clean, right by the beach, and the hosts are available 24/7. Everything is thought out by the hosts to make the stay as convenient as possible. The space itself is modern and decorated tastefully. I would highly recommend this spot!

Very beautiful and exactly as described. The space is cozy and fully equipped, perfect for families. The kitchen is clean, and the free laundry is a huge plus. Our family had a very comfortable and satisfying stay here. It’s only a few minutes’ walk to the beach.
A very minor downside is that the bathroom in our room didn’t have an exhaust fan, so there was an odor. The lighting setup around the sink area wasn’t ideal, making it a bit inconvenient for getting ready or doing makeup, the light wasn’t bright enough and caused glare when looking in the mirror. However, these are just small issues and didn’t really affect our overall experience. If we have the chance to visit Da Nang again, our family will definitely choose to stay here again!

The Anh family was an incredible home stay about 10 minutes outside the main walking area in Hoi An. The pool and patio were lovely and luxurious, and the room was exactly as expected with great AC. I would absolutely recommend this accommodation to anyone!

We stayed 12 nights and loved it! Our room was lovely, spacious and bed very comfortable. Staff were incredibly helpful and breakfasts were delicious. The location is perfect - tucked away on a back street, so nice and quiet but walking distance to a lot of restaurants and the Old Town.
Would recommend as a great place to stay in Hoi An!

Wir sind schon zum zweiten Mal in dieser Unterkunft und wurden wie Freunde empfangen. Die Gastgeber sind sehr hilfsbereit und sehr freundlich. Wir kamen spät nachts an und uns wurde trotzdem noch Essen zubereitet. Wenn wir wieder in Hoi An sind, dann kommen wir wieder zur euch!

We enjoyed our stay here. Ninh was very helpful and responsive both in person and on the phone whenever we needed anything.
The only downside is that we were staying in the downstairs room that is opposite the pool, so we did not have much privacy as people would sit right outside the doors. This meant we had the curtains shut for much of our stay. If the room has some privacy curtains we could have enjoyed it with sunlight in the room.
The bed is large and very comfortable, and the bathroom is clean with a nice shower. There was no complimentary bottle of water in the rooms but there was a fridge with drinks you could buy. We made good use of the bicycle rental and laundry service.
Overall I would recommend.

Wir hatten einen tollen Aufenthalt. Man kann gut zu Fuß in die Stadt laufen und brauch ca 20. Minuten. Die Kommunikation hat super funktioniert und es wurde immer schnell geantwortet. Wir haben uns sehr wohl in der Unterkunft gefühlt.

Stayed 4 nights at The Art House on our travels to Danang. Our host Truc was quick to revert on any queries. All instructions were clearly and offered a motorbike rental. The rental option was great and when I requested for a change of motorbike, they were highly responsive in organizing a replacement immediately without any hassle.
Highly recommend this place for all single or couple travellers looking for a great option within few meters to the beach, restaurants, cafes and social hangout areas.

The place is very nice and exactly as shown in the photos. The location is excellent — the beach is very close and there are plenty of dining options nearby. Truc Linh was very helpful; she assisted us in renting a motorbike and even allowed us to store our luggage after check-out, which was very convenient.
One thing to keep in mind: if you prefer to sleep in complete darkness, I recommend turning off the outside lights, as quite a bit of light comes through the windows. The balcony door didn’t close properly, and we noticed a bit of dust on the mirrors and lamps. However, overall everything was great. They also provided bottled water, toothbrushes, and clean towels, which was a nice touch.
Très charmant comme endroit!
